translation.cy: llyw.cymru
translation.en: gov.wales

translation.cy: Mae cyni Llywodraeth y Deyrnas Unedig yn parhau, ac mae pob dadansoddiad gwrthrychol o effaith bosibl gadael yr Undeb Ewropeaidd yn dweud y dylem baratoi i weld yr economi'n crebachu.
translation.en: Austerity imposed by the UK Government continues, and every objective analysis of the potential impact of Brexit says we should be prepared for a shrinking economy.

translation.cy: Pan fyddwn yn dechrau rhaglenni newydd i gyflawni ein haddewidion, bydd rhaid inni roi terfyn ar rywbeth arall i dalu amdano.
translation.en: Where we start new programmes to fulfil our pledges, we must stop something else to pay for it.

translation.cy: Rydw i am weld Cymru ddiogel sy’n ffynnu, Cymru iach ac egnïol, Cymru uchelgeisiol sy’n dysgu, Cymru unedig a chysylltiedig.
translation.en: I want to see a Wales which is prosperous and secure, healthy and active, ambitious and learning, united and connected.

translation.cy: Bydd y Llywodraeth hon yn canolbwyntio ar ymyriadau effeithiol sy'n rhoi mwy o sicrwydd ariannol i fusnesau ac unigolion er mwyn sicrhau twf a ffyniant.
translation.en: This Government will focus on effective interventions which deliver greater financial security for businesses and individuals to build growth and prosperity.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn buddsoddi'n sylweddol mewn trafnidiaeth ledled Cymru er mwyn sicrhau bod modd i bobl deithio'n rhwydd i gyrraedd at swyddi, ac er mwyn i fusnesau fasnachu'n esmwyth.
translation.en: We will make significant investment in transport right around Wales to ensure that people can travel easily to jobs and so that businesses can trade smoothly.

translation.cy: Darparu cymorth penodol ar gyfer cwmnïau cydweithredol a chydfuddiannol.
translation.en: Provide tailored support for co-operatives and mutuals.

translation.cy: Ffyniant i Bawb
translation.en: Prosperity for All

translation.cy: Parhau i gydweithio yn y tymor hir gydag adeiladwyr tai er mwyn cynyddu’r gyfradd adeiladu tai.
translation.en: Continue long term collaboration with house builders to deliver accelerated rates of house building.

translation.cy: Cymunedau Gwledig Llwyddiannus, Cynaliadwy
translation.en: Successful, Sustainable Rural Communities

translation.cy: Cefnogi datblygiad mwy o brosiectau ynni adnewyddadwy, gan gynnwys môr-lynnoedd llanw a chynlluniau ynni cymunedol.
translation.en: Support the development of more renewable energy projects, including tidal lagoons and community energy schemes.

translation.cy: Mae'r heriau hyn yn gofyn am amrywiol ymatebion, a hynny o enedigaeth hyd at henaint er mwyn sicrhau’r iechyd a’r llesiant gorau posibl gydol oes.
translation.en: These challenges require a range of responses from birth through to old age maximising health and well-being throughout life.

translation.cy: Awn ati i symud mwy o ofal a gwasanaethau o ysbytai i gymunedau, gyda chymorth Gwasanaethau Iechyd a Gofal integredig a chynaliadwy a all ddiwallu'r galw heddiw ac yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: We will move more care and services from hospitals into communities, supported by integrated and sustainable Health and Care Services capable of meeting current demand and future need.

translation.cy: Gweithredu rhaglen Plant Iach Cymru i sicrhau cysondeb o ran darpariaeth gwasanaethau iechyd cyffredinol i blant hyd at saith oed.
translation.en: Implement the Healthy Child Wales programme to ensure consistent delivery of universal health services up to age seven.

translation.cy: Gweithio gydag ysgolion i hyrwyddo ymarfer corff i blant a phobl ifanc, ac ymwybyddiaeth ynghylch pwysigrwydd dewisiadau bywyd iach.
translation.en: Work with schools to promote children and young people’s activity and awareness of the importance of healthy lifestyle choices.

translation.cy: Parhau i hyrwyddo ymarfer corff a maeth, lleihau'r achosion o or-yfed alcohol a thorri cyfraddau ysmygu Cymru i 16% erbyn 2020.
translation.en: Continue to promote exercise and good nutrition, reduce excessive alcohol consumption and cut smoking rates in Wales to 16% by 2020.

translation.cy: Cyflwyno Bond Llesiant Cymru, gyda'r nod o wella iechyd meddyliol a chorfforol a lleihau achosion o ddiffyg ymarfer corff, diffyg maeth a gor-yfed alcohol.
translation.en: Introduce a new Wales Well-being Bond aimed at improving mental and physical health and to reduce sedentary lifestyles, poor nutrition and excessive alcohol consumption.

translation.cy: Cynnal cynllun peilot o fodel newydd o Ganolfannau Dysgu Cymunedol a fydd yn darparu ystod estynedig o wasanaethau megis gofal plant, cymorth i rieni, dysgu i deuluoedd a mynediad at gyfleusterau i’r gymuned, a hynny oll wedi’i ddatblygu o gwmpas y diwrnod ysgol.
translation.en: Pilot a new model of Community Learning Centres providing extended services with childcare, parenting support, family learning and community access to facilities built around the school day.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys cyfleoedd llawn amser a rhan amser a fydd o fudd i ddysgwyr o bob oedran, ynghyd â chyflogwyr a chymunedau.
translation.en: This includes both full and part-time opportunities that will benefit learners of all ages, employers and communities.

translation.cy: Cynnig y pecyn gorau o gymorth i fyfyrwyr yn y Deyrnas Unedig yn seiliedig ar argymhellion Adolygiad Diamond, gyda’r nod o roi’r argymhellion ar waith yn gynnar lle bo hynny’n briodol, heb gael effaith negyddol ar y gyllideb ar gyfer addysg uwch.
translation.en: Offer the best package of student support available in the UK based on the recommendations of the Diamond Review, with a view to early implementation where appropriate, and without negative effect on the higher education budget.

translation.cy: Fe ganolbwyntiwn ar ymyriadau economaidd a fydd yn rhoi mwy o sicrwydd ariannol i fusnesau ac unigolion.
translation.en: We will focus on economic interventions which deliver greater financial security for businesses and individuals.

translation.cy: Gweithio gyda llywodraeth leol i adolygu’r dreth gyngor i’w gwneud yn decach fel bod pobl ag eiddo sydd o werth isel neu gymedrol yn talu llai nag y maent yn ei dalu nawr.
translation.en: Work with local government to review council tax to make it fairer so that people with low and moderately valued properties pay less than they do now.

translation.cy: Nid oes gennym fonopoli ar syniadau da – ac ni allwn gyflawni ein hagenda heb gymorth.
translation.en: Just as we do not have the monopoly on good ideas, we cannot deliver our agenda alone.

translation.cy: Fe weithiwn ar draws y sector cyhoeddus a chyda chymunedau i gyflawni’r Gymru yr ydym yn dymuno ei gweld.
translation.en: We will work across the public sector and with communities to deliver the Wales we want.

translation.cy: Mae Symud Cymru Ymlaen yn nodi’r pedwar maes y gallwn gael yr effaith fwyaf ynddynt, ynghyd â’r prif gamau y byddwn yn eu cymryd.
translation.en: Taking Wales Forward sets out the four areas where we can have the biggest impact and the headline actions we will take.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd 04
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 04

translation.cy: Cwricwlwm gweddnewidiol
translation.en: A transformational curriculum

translation.cy: Ni fwriedir iddynt fod yn faes llafur hollgynhwysfawr, nac yn ganllaw ar gyfer trefnu amserlenni.
translation.en: It is not intended to be a comprehensive or exhaustive syllabus, nor a guide for organising timetables.

translation.cy: • y disgwyliadau eang ar gyfer dysgwyr ar bob cam cynnydd ym Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Mathemateg a Rhifedd.
translation.en: • the broad expectations for learners for the Mathematics and Numeracy Area of Learning and Experience at each progression step.

translation.cy: Mae mathemateg ffurﬁol wedi ei seilio ar wirioneddau sylfaenol ac mae’n datblygu drwy resymu rhesymegol trylwyr dros ben.
translation.en: Formal mathematics is founded on basic truths and develops through rigorous logical reasoning.

translation.cy: Ac mae dealltwriaeth o’r symbolau a’r systemau symbolau a ddefnyddir mewn mathemateg, a’r gallu i’w defnyddio, yn hanfodol yn hyn o beth.
translation.en: And essential to this is comprehension of, and proﬁciency with, the symbols and symbol systems used in mathematics.

translation.cy: Drwy hyn fe ddônt yn ddysgwyr uchelgeisiol, galluog sy’n barod i ddysgu drwy gydol eu hoes.
translation.en: Thus they become ambitious, capable learners, ready to learn throughout their lives.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn ategu gwaith modelu a rhagfynegi rhifyddol er mwyn annog ffordd o feddwl entrepreneuraidd.
translation.en: It also supports numerical modelling and forecasting to encourage entrepreneurial thinking.

translation.cy: Mae’n annog meddwl clir, gan alluogi dysgwyr i ddeall a gwneud penderfyniadau rhesymedig.
translation.en: It encourages clarity of thinking, allowing learners to understand and make reasoned decisions.

translation.cy: Mewn mathemateg a rhifedd, daw dysgwyr ar draws cyd-destunau sy’n cynnwys iechyd a chyllid personol, a byddant yn datblygu’r sgiliau i reoli eu cyllid eu hunain, gwneud penderfyniadau gwybodus a dod yn ddefnyddwyr beirniadol.
translation.en: In mathematics and numeracy, learners encounter contexts involving health and personal ﬁnance, and develop the skills needed to manage their own ﬁnances, make informed decisions and become critical consumers.

translation.cy: Rhifau yw’r system o symbolau ar gyfer disgriﬁo a chymharu meintiau.
translation.en: Numbers are the symbol system for describing and comparing quantities.

translation.cy: Tebygolrwydd yw’r broses fathemategol o astudio siawns, er mwyn gallu rhagfynegi’r tebygrwydd y bydd rhywbeth yn digwydd.
translation.en: Probability is the mathematical study of chance, enabling predictions of the likelihood of events occurring.

translation.cy: Mae rhesymu gan ddefnyddio ystadegau a thebygolrwydd, a gwerthuso eu dibynadwyedd, yn meithrin y sgiliau dadansoddi a meddwl beirniadol sy’n hollbwysig wrth wneud penderfyniadau egwyddorol a gwybodus.
translation.en: Reasoning with statistics and probability, and evaluating their reliability, develops critical thinking and analytical skills that are fundamental to making ethical and informed decisions.

translation.cy: Yr hyn sy’n bwysig wrth gynllunio ar gyfer addysgu unrhyw bwnc penodol yw sefydlu pa wybodaeth ﬂaenorol sydd ei hangen ar y dysgwyr er mwyn gallu astudio a deall y pwnc newydd.
translation.en: What is important when planning to teach any speciﬁc topic is to work out the prior knowledge the learners need in order to be able to access and understand the new topic.

translation.cy: • Rhesymu rhesymegol.
translation.en: • Logical reasoning.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn hefyd gynnwys cysylltu rhannu a ffracsiynau (h.y. ½ = 1 ÷ 2) a defnyddio termau megis rhiﬁadur ac enwadur.
translation.en: This could also involve linking division and fractions (i.e. ½ = 1 ÷ 2) and using terms such as numerator and denominator.

translation.cy: Datblygu cwricwlwm eang a chytbwys
translation.en: Developing a broad and balanced curriculum

translation.cy: Llythrennedd
translation.en: Literacy

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr hefyd yn defnyddio ac yn meithrin eu sgiliau llythrennedd ar ffurf ysgrifenedig er mwyn disgriﬁo prosesau mathemategol, megis rhesymu.
translation.en: Learners will also use and develop their literacy skills in a written form in order to describe mathematical processes, such as reasoning.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gellir cymhwyso’r defnydd o ganrannau at gyfraddau canrannol blynyddol (APR) er mwyn dangos bod y defnydd hwnnw yn berthnasol i lythrennedd ariannol.
translation.en: For example, the use of percentages can be applied to annual percentage rates (APRs) to demonstrate their application to ﬁnancial literacy.

translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 12

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd 14
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 13

translation.cy: Gallai hyn hefyd hyrwyddo a chefnogi dysgu trawsgwricwlaidd.
translation.en: This could also promote and support cross-curricular learning.

translation.cy: Helping Children Learn Mathematics (National Research Council, 2001)
translation.en: Helping Children Learn Mathematics (National Research Council, 2001)

translation.cy: Dengys data’r Sefydliad ar gyfer Cydweithrediad a Datblygiad Economaidd (yr OECD) fod y rheini â sgiliau rhifedd gwael ddwywaith mor debygol o fod yn ddi-waith.
translation.en: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) data indicates that those with poor numeracy skills are more than twice as likely to be unemployed.

translation.cy: Mae cynnydd dysgwyr o ran gyrfaoedd a phroﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith yn rhan o gontinwwm dysgu ar gyfer dysgwyr rhwng 3 ac 16 oed.
translation.en:
Learner progression relating to careers and work-related experiences is part of a continuum of
learning for learners aged 3 to 16.

translation.cy: • gwerthuso risg wrth ddatblygu syniad busnes ac ystyried gwahanol ffyrdd o sefydlu a chynnal menter.
translation.en: • evaluating risks when developing a business idea and exploring different methods of setting up and sustaining an enterprise.

translation.cy: Gall ategu cynnydd dysgwyr ymhellach er mwyn galluogi dealltwriaeth o’r farchnad lafur a thueddiadau yn lleol, ledled Cymru, yn genedlaethol ac yn fyd-eang.
translation.en: It can further support learner progression to enable an understanding of the labour market and trends locally, pan Wales, nationally and globally.

translation.cy: Rhaid ymgymryd â chyfarwyddyd mathemateg effeithiol mewn amgylchedd sy’n annog cyﬂawniad cyfartal i fechgyn a merched mewn mathemateg.
translation.en: Effective mathematics instruction must be conducted in an environment that encourages equal achievement in mathematics for boys and girls.

translation.cy: Dylai athrawon ddewis gweithgareddau sy’n cysylltu gweithgareddau mathemateg â gyrfaoedd mewn ffyrdd nad ydynt yn atgyfnerthu stereoteipiau rhywedd sy’n bodoli eisoes a dylent ddewis gweithgareddau sy’n tanio chwilfrydedd cychwynnol tuag at fathemateg.
translation.en: Teachers should choose activities connecting mathematics activities to careers in ways that do not reinforce existing gender stereotypes and select activities that spark initial curiosity about mathematics.

translation.cy: Dylai athrawon pob grŵp oedran annog cydraddoldeb rhwng y rhywiau mewn mathemateg a hyrwyddo dewisiadau gyrfa diduedd.
translation.en: Teachers of all age-groups should be encouraging gender equality within mathematics and promoting career choices which show no bias.

translation.cy: Bydd angen gwneud penderfyniadau pwysig am strwythur a dilyniant agweddau mathemateg a rhifedd, a dylai’r penderfyniadau hyn fod yn seiliedig ar natur hierarchaidd a chysylltiedig cysyniadau mathemategol, er mwyn sicrhau yr adeiledir ar sylfeini a bod cyswllt rhwng y proﬁadau.
translation.en: Important decisions will need to be taken about the structure and sequence of mathematics and numeracy topics, and these decisions should be informed by the hierarchic and connected nature of mathematics concepts, in order to ensure foundations are built upon and experiences are connected.

translation.cy: Mae gwybodaeth a gallu ym maes rhifau a meintiau yn hanfodol ar gyfer cyfrannu i’r byd, ac yn cynnig sylfaen ar gyfer astudio pellach a chyﬂogaeth.
translation.en: Knowledge of, and competence in, number and quantities are fundamental to conﬁdent participation in the world, and provide a foundation for further study and for employment.

translation.cy: Cymhwysedd strategol:
translation.en: Strategic competence:

translation.cy: Rhuglder:
translation.en: Fluency:

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cael proﬁad o ffracsiynau mewn sefyllfaoedd ymarferol gan ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o gynrychioliadau.
translation.en: I have experienced fractions in practical situations, using a variety of representations.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwyf wedidefnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am ffeithiau a pherthnasau rhifau i ddatrys problemau mewn cyd-destunau mathemategol a rhai bywyd go iawn.
translation.en: I have used my knowledge of number facts and relationships to solve problems in mathematical and real-life contexts.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio ystyr rhifau negatif mewn cyd-destunau ystyrlon a dilys.
translation.en: I have explored the meaning of negative numbers in meaningful and authentic contexts.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi arddangos dealltwriaeth o dalgrynnu a gallaf ddatrys problemau sy’n gofyn am dalgrynnu i’r uned, y 10, y 100 a’r 1,000 agosaf.
translation.en: I have demonstrated an understanding of rounding and can solve problems requiring rounding to the nearest unit, 10, 100 and 1,000.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi datrys problemau sy’n ymwneud â chymhareb a chyfran mewn cyd-destunau bywyd go iawn, ac rwyf wedi defnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am amcangyfrif a thalgrynnu i ragfynegi fy atebion,a’u gwirio.
translation.en: I have solved problems involving ratio and proportion in real-life contexts, and I have used my knowledge of estimation and rounding to predict and check my answers.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi atgyfnerthu fy nealltwriaeth o gilyddion wrth rannu ffracsiynau.
translation.en: I have consolidated my understanding of reciprocals when dividing fractions.

translation.cy: Mae algebra yn defnyddio systemau symbolau i fynegi strwythurau’r perthnasau rhwng rhifau, meintiau a chydberthnasau.
translation.en: Algebra uses symbol systems to express the structures of relationships between numbers, quantities and relations.

translation.cy: • Mae’r cysylltiadau rhwng rhifyddeg ac algebra yn datblygu adnoddau a sgiliau ar gyfer rhesymu haniaethol o oedran cynnar.
translation.en: • The connections between arithmetic and algebra develop tools and skills for abstract reasoning from an early age.

translation.cy: Celfyddydau Mynegiannol
translation.en: Expressive Arts

translation.cy: • Ffracsiynau mewn cerddoriaeth, rhythmau.
translation.en: • Fractions in music, rhythm.

translation.cy: • Talgrynnu.
translation.en: • Rounding.

translation.cy: • cynrychioli a chyfathrebu â chyfanrifau
translation.en: • represent and communicate with whole numbers

translation.cy: • archwilio elfennau a chywerthedd rhif, a dysgu am werth lle
translation.en: • explore composition and equivalence of number, and learn about place value

translation.cy: • ymestyn eu dealltwriaeth a’u defnydd o’r system rifau, drwy amrywiaeth eang o broﬁadau,i gynnwys rhifau negatif, degolion a ffracsiynau
translation.en: • extend their understanding and use of the number system, through a broad range of experiences, to include negative numbers, decimals and fractions

translation.cy: • defnyddio rhesymu cyfrannol i gymharu dau faint, gan ddefnyddio meddwl lluosol, ac yna’n cymhwyso hynny mewn sefyllfa newydd
translation.en: • use proportional reasoning to compare two quantities using multiplicative thinking, and then apply this to a new situation

translation.cy: ddyfnach o ddefnyddio rhifau cymarebol ac anghymarebol
translation.en: deepen their understanding of how to use rational and irrational numbers

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf hefyd amnewid gwerthoedd a newid testun fformiwla pan fydd y testun yn ymddangos mewn un term.
translation.en: I can also substitute values and change the subject of a formula when the subject appears in one term.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio hafaliadau ac anhafaleddau, a grafﬁau perthnasol, i fodelu a datrys problemau mewn cyd-destunau go iawn a chyd-destunau mathemategol, gan gynnwys y rheini sy’n disgriﬁo cyfrannedd a thwf esbonyddol, a gallaf ddefnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am y byd go iawn a’m synnwyr rhifau i ragfynegi a gwirio fy nehongliadau ohonynt.
translation.en: I have used equations and inequalities, and relevant graphs, to model and solve problems in real-life and mathematical contexts, including those which describe proportion and exponentiation, and I can use my knowledge of the real world and number sense to predict and check my interpretations of these.

translation.cy: • Mewn ystadegau, caiff fformiwlâu cyffredinol eu hysgrifennu drwy ddefnyddio algebra.
translation.en: • In statistics, general formulae are written using algebra.

translation.cy: • Cyfrannedd union a gwrthdro.
translation.en: • Direct and inverse proportion.

translation.cy: • archwilio, llunio ac adnabod patrymau aﬂinol, ac yn eu mynegi ar ffurf algebraidd a grafﬁgol
translation.en: • explore, generate and identify non-linear patterns, and express them algebraically and graphically

translation.cy: • modelu sefyllfaoedd go iawn gan adnabod y newidynnau a llunio polynomialau.
translation.en: • model real-life situations, identifying variables and constructing polynomials.

translation.cy: Mae geometreg yn canolbwyntio ar berthnasausy’n ymwneud â phriodweddau siâp, gofod a saﬂe, ac mae mesur yn canolbwyntio ar feintioli ffenomena yn y byd fﬁsegol.
translation.en: Geometry focuses on relationships involving properties of shape, space and position, and measurement focuses on quantifying phenomena in the physical world.

translation.cy: Cyfathrebu â symbolau:
translation.en: Communication with symbols:

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, dylai ffeithiau, perthnasau a thechnegau a ddysgwyd ynghynt fod wedi’u hymsefydlu’n gadarn, yn goﬁadwy ac yn ddefnyddiadwy.
translation.en: As a result, facts, relationships and techniques learned previously should become ﬁrmly established, memorable and usable.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall a chymhwyso iaith amser mewn perthynas â’m bywyd beunyddiol ac mewn perthynas â digwyddiadau sy’n digwydd o’m cwmpas, gan gynnwys enwi dyddiau’r wythnos, misoedd y ﬂwyddyn a’r tymhorau, a’r cyfan mewn cyd-destunau ystyrlon.
translation.en: I can understand and apply the language of time in relation to my daily life and in relation to events that happen around me, including naming the days of the week, the months of the year and the seasons, all in meaningful contexts.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio ac wedi enwi siapiau dau ddimensiwn a tri dimensiwn mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I have explored and named two-dimensional and three-dimensional shapes in a range of contexts.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddidoli a chategoreiddio siapiau dau ddimensiwn rheolaidd ac afreolaidd mewn gwahanol ffyrdd yn ôl eu priodweddau.
translation.en: I can sort and categorise regular and irregular two-dimensional shapes in different ways, according to their properties.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio amrywiaeth o weithgareddau ymarferol i archwilio perimedr ac arwynebedd siapiau.
translation.en: I have used a range of hands-on activities to explore the perimeter and area of shapes.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio onglydd i fesur a llunio onglau.
translation.en: I can use a protractor to measure and draw angles.

translation.cy: Cysylltiadau o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn
translation.en: Links within this area of learning and experience

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn awgrymu lle gellid cyfoethogi dysgu drwy wneud cysylltiadau rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig ar draws Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Mathemateg a Rhifedd.
translation.en: This section suggests where learning can be enriched through drawing links between other what matters statements across the Mathematics and Numeracy Area of Learning and Experience.

translation.cy: Mae geometreg yn canolbwyntio ar berthnasau sy’n ymwneud â phriodweddau siâp, gofod a saﬂe, ac mae mesur yn canolbwyntio ar feintioli ffenomena yn y byd fﬁsegol.
translation.en: Algebra uses symbol systems to express the structures of relationships between numbers, quantities and relations.

translation.cy: • Defnyddir fformiwlâu a hafaliadau algebraidd i gysylltu cysyniadau geometrig trionglau â mesuriadau onglau ac ochrau.
translation.en: • Algebraic formulae and equations are used to connect the geometric concepts of triangles with measures of angles and sides.

translation.cy: Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu
translation.en: Languages, Literacy and Communication

translation.cy: • defnyddio iaith cyfeiriad, lleoliad a saﬂe.
translation.en: • use the language of direction, location and position.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ, deall neu allu:
translation.en: Learners need to experience, to know or be able to:

translation.cy: • defnyddio technolegau digidol i archwilio siâp a gofod, gan ddatblygu a phroﬁ dyfaliadau
translation.en: • use digital technologies to explore shape and space, developing and testing conjectures

translation.cy: Mae ystadegau yn cynrychioli data, mae tebygolrwydd yn modelu siawns, ac mae’r ddau yn cefnogi casgliadau a phenderfyniadau gwybodus.
translation.en: Statistics represent data, probability models chance, and both support informed inferences and decisions.

translation.cy: Dysgu
translation.en: Learning

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi grwpio setiau o wrthrychau neu luniau yn gategorïau, drwy broﬁadau ymarferol, a gallaf eu dosbarthu yn ôl un neu fwy o feini prawf.
translation.en: I have grouped sets of objects or pictures into categories, through practical experiences, and I can classify by one criterion or more.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio dulliau digidol a dulliau nad ydynt yn ddigidol i gofnodi a chyﬂwyno data mewn amrywiaeth o ffyrdd, gan gynnwys defnyddio siartiau marciau rhifo, tablau amlder, a grafﬁau bloc lle y darperir echelinau a graddfeydd priodol.
translation.en: I have used digital and non-digital methods to record and present data in a variety of ways, including the use of tally charts, frequency tables, and block graphs when appropriate axes and scales are provided.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddehongli a dadansoddi grafﬁau, siartiau a data.
translation.en: I can interpret and analyse graphs, charts and data.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio dulliau priodol er mwyn ateb fy nghwestiynau drwy gasglu, dadansoddi a chrynhoi fy nata a dehongli fy nghanlyniadau.
translation.en: I have used appropriate methods to answer my questions by collecting, analysing and summarising my data and interpreting my results.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi chwarae gemau sy’n cynnwys taﬂu darnau arian, rholio dis a defnyddio troellwyr,er mwyn efelychu a thrafod siawns.
translation.en: I have played games that involve ﬂipping coins, rolling dice and using spinners in order to simulate and discuss chance.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddewis rhagdybiaeth synhwyrol er mwyn ymchwilio ac rwyf wedi dangos dealltwriaetho’r dulliau y gallaf eu defnyddio i gasglu data perthnasol a phriodol.
translation.en: I can choose a sensible hypothesis to investigate and I have demonstrated an understanding of the methods I can use to collect appropriate data.

translation.cy: Gallaf lunio barn ystyrlon go iawn yn seiliedig ar ganlyniadau data arbrofol a risg.
translation.en: I can make meaningful real-life judgements based on outcomes of experimental data and risk.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn awgrymu ymhle gellid ystyried gwahanol elfennau o ddysgu gyda’i gilydd er mwyn cefnogi dysgu sy’n fwy holistaidd.
translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.cy: • Cyfartaleddau ac amrediad.
translation.en: • Averages and range.

translation.cy: • defnyddio dulliau digidol priodol a dulliau priodol nad ydynt yn ddigidol i ddadansoddi, cynrychioli a dehongli data
translation.en: • use appropriate digital and non-digital methods to analyse, represent and interpret data

translation.cy: • drwy amrywiaeth eang o broﬁadau o fewn cyd-destunau lleol a byd-eang perthnasol ac ysgogol, ddefnyddio cylch trin data dilyniannol i ofyn cwestiynau, casglu a didoli amrywiaeth o ddata pwrpasol
translation.en: • through a broad range of experiences in stimulating and relevant local and global contexts, use a sequential data-handling cycle to pose questions, collect and sort a variety of purposeful data

translation.cy: • ehangu eu dealltwriaeth o siawns drwy fynegi tebygolrwydd damcaniaethol ar ffurf rifyddol.
translation.en: • extend their understanding of chance by expressing theoretical probability numerically.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr sy’n gwrando ac yn darllen yn effeithiol yn barod i ddysgu drwy gydol eu hoes.
translation.en: Learners who listen and read effectively are prepared to learn throughout their lives.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr sy’n siarad ac yn ysgrifennu’n effeithiol yn barod i chwarae rhan lawn mewn bywyd a gwaith.
translation.en: Learners who speak and write effectively are prepared to play a full part in life and work.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, wrth arfer yr hawl honno, bydd rhaid iddynt roi sylw i ganllawiau statudol a gaiff eu cyhoeddi gan Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: However, in considering the exercise of that discretion, they must have regard to statutory guidance issued by Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Yn ymarferol, golyga hyn y dylent ddilyn y canllawiau statudol oni bai bod ganddynt reswm da i beidio.
translation.en: In practice, that means they should follow the statutory guidance unless they have good reason not to.

translation.cy: • yr hyn y dylai lleoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir ac ysgolion roi ystyriaeth iddo wrth lunio’u cwricwlwm, a sut y gellir ei strwythuro
translation.en: • what funded non-maintained settings and schools should take into account in designing their curriculum and how it could be structured

translation.cy: At hyn, mae sgiliau Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu yn allweddol o ran galluogi dysgwyr i fynegi eu hunain yn effeithiol, ac mae dysgwyr sy’n gallu cyﬂeu eu teimladau a dehongli teimladau pobl eraill mewn gwell sefyllfa i feithrin cydberthnasau cadarnhaol ac felly i ddod yn unigolion iach, hyderus sy’n barod i fyw bywyd gan wireddu eu dyheadau fel aelodau gwerthfawr o gymdeithas, sy’n gallu cadw eu hunain ac eraill yn ddiogel, boed ar y we ac oddi arni.
translation.en: Furthermore, Languages, Literacy and Communication skills are key to enabling learners to express themselves effectively, and learners who are able to articulate their feelings and interpret those of others are better equipped to develop positive relationships and thus to become healthy, conﬁdent individuals, ready to lead fulﬁlling lives as valued members of society, able to keep themselves and others safe, both ofﬂine and online.

translation.cy: Maent yn fodd i ddehongli’r hyn a glywn, a ddarllenwn ac a welwn er mwyn datblygu ein dealltwriaeth, ein hempathi a’n gallu i ymateb yn effeithiol.
translation.en: They enable us to make sense of what is heard, read and seen, and thus to develop understanding, empathy and the ability to respond effectively.

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Y berthynas rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig mewn Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu
translation.en: Relationships between what matters statements in Languages, Literacy and Communication

translation.cy: Mae cyswllt agos iawn rhwng y pedair elfen a nodwyd fel yr hyn sy’n bwysig o ran Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu.Mae gwrando a darllen, yn ogystal â siarad ac ysgrifennu, yn perthyn i’w gilydd ac nid ar wahân i’w gilydd.
translation.en: The four areas identiﬁed as what matters in Languages, Literacy and Communication are highly interconnected. Listening and reading as well as speaking and writing exist in relation to each other and not separately.

translation.cy: Gwëir y ddau ddatganiad arall o’r hyn sy’n bwysig trwy bopeth a wnaed mewn Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu.
translation.en: The other two what matters statements can be seen woven throughout everything we do in Languages, Literacy and Communication.

translation.cy: Iuerirtihcoueludmd,fLolryWthraelensne2d0d22a:CHhuymfaatnhirteiebsu 10
translation.en: Hmuumnaicnaittiioens 09

translation.cy: Bydd datblygu sgiliau ysgrifennu yn helpu dysgwyr i fynegi ystyr a dibenion mewn nifer o feysydd.
translation.en: The development of writing skills will support learners to articulate meaning and purposes across a range of areas.

translation.cy: Gallai proﬁadau cyntaf dysgwyr o ddefnyddio rhifedd godi drwy weithgareddau megis rhigymau rhif, wrth iddynt ddechrau ymateb a dadansoddi testunau, ac yn gwneud cynnydd a datblygiad pellach i wneud sylwadau ar ddehongliadau gwahanol o faterion a syniadau, gan ddefnyddio testunau i ategu barnau.
translation.en: Learners’ ﬁrst experiences and application of numeracy may be through activities such as number rhymes, as they begin to respond and analyse texts, and further progress and develop to comment on different interpretations of issues and ideas, using texts to support opinions.

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i GymruD2r0a2ft2C:

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i GymruD2r0a2ft2C:
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 202D2r:aLftaCnugruriacguelusm, LfioterrWacayleasnd20C2o2m:

translation.cy: Creadigrwydd ac arloesi
translation.en: Creativity and innovation

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn datblygu eu heffeithiolrwydd personol a’u hunanymwybyddiaeth wrth ddefnyddio ieithoedd a fydd yn eu tro yn cefnogi dysgu ar draws y cwricwlwm cyfan.
translation.en: Learners will develop their personal effectiveness and self-awareness when using languages which will in turn support learning across the whole curriculum.

translation.cy: Mae’n hanfodol i ddysgwyr gael gafael ar wybodaeth o ansawdd uchel am yrfaoedd a’r farchnad lafur ac iddynt feddu ar ddealltwriaeth o’r hyn y mae hynny’n ei olygu iddynt, er mwyn gwneud penderfyniadau gwybodus a chynaliadwy am eu gyrfa.
translation.en: It is vital for learners to access high-quality careers and labour market information and have an understanding of what this means to them, in order to make well-informed, sustainable career decisions.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae’r sgiliau a ddatblygir, megis y gallu i ddarllen ac ysgrifennu’n glir, cynnal ymchwil, rhoi cyﬂwyniad, cyfathrebu’n glir a rhoi sylw i fanylion, yn cael eu gwerthfawrogi gan amrywiaeth eang o gyﬂogeion, gan gynnig amrywiaeth eang o gyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr.
translation.en: However, the skills developed, such as the ability to read and write clearly, to undertake research, to give a presentation, to communicate clearly and to have attention to detail, are valued by a wide range of employers, providing a wide range of opportunities for learners.

translation.cy: Mae meysydd lle mae’r galw am bobl sydd â sgiliau dwyieithog yn cynyddu yn cynnwys addysg, iechyd, gofal plant, gofal cymdeithasol, busnes a thechnoleg gwybodaeth, twristiaeth a hamdden, y cyfryngau a’r celfyddydau perfformio, ieithyddiaeth, ieithyddiaeth gyfriﬁannu ac amaethyddiaeth.
translation.en: Areas where the demand for people with bilingual skills is increasing include education, health, child care, social care, business and information technology, tourism and leisure, media and performing arts, linguistics, computational linguistics and agriculture.

translation.cy: Mae hyn wedi golygu cynnydd yn y galw am bobl sy’n gallucyfathrebu’n dda yn y ddwy iaith.
translation.en: This has meant a rise in demand for people who can communicate well in both languages.

translation.cy: Gallai llwyddiant i ddysgwr ifanc ysgol gynradd gynnwys:
translation.en: Success for a young primary school learner could include:

translation.cy: • y gred y gallant gyﬂawni unrhyw swydd – gan fynd i’r afael â stereoteipiau rhyw
translation.en: • belief that they can do any job – tackling gender stereotyping

translation.cy: • cyfathrebu â phobl yn eu cymuned am y gwahanol swyddi y maent yn eu gwneud a’r boddhad a all ddeillio ohonynt.
translation.en: • communicating with people in their community about the different jobs they do and the rewards that a job can bring.

translation.cy: • dangos a chymhwyso’r sgiliau a ddysgwyd mewn perthynas â’r byd gwaith
translation.en: • demonstrating and applying the skills learned in relation to the world of work

translation.cy: • datblygu’r sgiliau ar gyfer ffurﬁo cydberthnasau rhyngbersonol llwyddiannus, gan gynnwys cyﬂeoedd i fod yn rhan o drafodaethau a thrafod cysyniadau allweddol
translation.en: • develop the skills for forming successful interpersonal relationships, including opportunities to collaborate in discussion and debate key concepts

translation.cy: • gwerthuso’r ffyrdd y mae cysyniadau’n cael eu creu a’u cyﬂwyno i ddatblygu barn ystyriol o gymdeithas a’r heriau y mae’n eu hwynebu
translation.en: • evaluate the ways in which concepts are created and presented to develop a considered view of society and the challenges it faces

translation.cy: • archwilio a thrafod y defnydd o derminoleg addas i fynegi eu hunain yn gywir gyda goddefgarwch a pharch.
translation.en: • explore and debate the use of suitable terminology to articulate themselves accurately with tolerance and respect.

translation.cy: Deall rhywedd
translation.en: Understanding gender

translation.cy: • adnabod rhagfarn a bwriad mewn iaith a llenyddiaeth er mwyn gwneud penderfyniadau diogel wrth rannu gwybodaeth
translation.en: • identify bias and intent in language and literature in order to make safe decisions in sharing of information

translation.cy: • datblygu agwedd gadarnhaol tuag at ddysgu ieithoedd er mwyn ymgysylltu’n effeithiol ag eraill a gwella iechyd meddwl
translation.en: • develop a positive attitude towards learning languages to engage effectively with others and improve mental health

translation.en: Learners can:

translation.cy: Yr egwyddor hon hefyd sydd wrth wraidd y Siarter Iaith sy’n rhoi fframwaith ar gyfer galluogi defnydd ehangach dysgwyro’r Gymraeg.
translation.en: This is the principle also at the heart of the Welsh Language Charter which provides a framework for enabling learners’ wider use of Welsh.

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i GymruD2r0a2ft2C:
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 202D2r:aLftaCnugruriacguelusm, LfioterrWacayleasnd20C2o2m:

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu wedi’i gynllunio i sicrhau bod dysgwyr, fel dinasyddion Cymru ddwyieithog a byd amlieithog, yn gallu defnyddio Gymraeg, Saesneg ac ieithoedd rhyngwladol.
translation.en: The Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience is designed to equip learners, as citizens of a bilingual Wales and a multilingual world, with the ability to use Welsh, English and international languages.

translation.cy: Gallaf weld cysylltiadau rhwng patrymau geirfa a geiriau cytras yn yr ieithoedd rwy’n eu siarad
translation.en: I can see links between vocabulary patterns and cognates in the languages I speak and those

translation.cy: Gallaf weld cysylltiadau rhwng ac ar draws ieithoedd, a gallaf ddangos gwerthfawrogiad a dealltwriaeth o amrywiaeth ieithoedd.
translation.en: I can see connections between and across languages, and can show an appreciation and understanding of the diversity of languages.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o iaith idiomatig a chywair priodol mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can use a range of idiomatic language and appropriate register in a variety of contexts.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall bod dysgu am y cysylltiad rhwng iaith a diwylliant, gwerthoedd a chredoau yn fy mharatoi ar gyfer dinasyddiaeth fyd-eang.
translation.en: I can understand that learning about the association between language and culture, values and beliefs is preparing me for global citizenship.

translation.cy: • Esblygiad ieithoedd (dylanwadau cymdeithasol).
translation.en: • Evolution of languages (societal inﬂuences).

translation.cy: • Hunaniaeth ac iaith.
translation.en: • Relationships developed through communication.

translation.cy: • Gwneud penderfyniadau gwybodus.
translation.en: • Making informed decisions.

translation.cy: • Defnyddio caneuon a rhigymau i addysgu rhifedd cynnar.
translation.en: • Use of songs and rhymes to teach early numeracy.

translation.cy: (o Gam cynnydd 1)
translation.en: (from Progression step 1)

translation.cy: • y cyﬂe i glywed gwahanol acenion a thafodieithoedd, gan ddechrau gydag acenion a thafodieithoedd lleol a chyfarwydd
translation.en: • the opportunity to hear different accents and dialects, beginning with local and familiar accents and dialects

translation.cy: • ein bod, drwy ddysgu gwahanol ieithoedd, yn caffael sgiliau ieithyddol sy’n atgyfnerthu sgiliau yn ein mamiaith
translation.en: • through learning different languages we acquire linguistic skills that reinforce skills in our ﬁrst language

translation.cy: Cynllunnir y proﬁadau cyfoethog ac amrywiol hyn er mwyn datblygu gallu dysgwyr i ddod yn greadigol ac yn fentrus wrth ddefnyddio Cymraeg, Saesneg ac ieithoedd rhyngwladol.
translation.en: The rich and varied nature of these experiences will be designed to improve learners’ ability to become creative and enterprising in their use of Welsh, English and international languages.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd
translation.en: Principles of progression

translation.cy: Caiff cynnydd mewn gwrando a darllen yn yr ieithoedd rhyngwladol ei nodi o Gam cynnydd 3, tra bo cydnabyddiaeth fod hyn yn adeiladu ar yr wybodaeth a’r sgiliau ieithyddol a ddysgwyd o Gam cynnydd 1.
translation.en: Progression of listening and reading in international languages is shown from Progression step 3, while recognising that it builds on language knowledge and skills learned from Progression step 1.

translation.cy: [Datganiad Cymraeg] Gallaf sylwi bod rhai llythrennau’n treiglo ar ddechrau geiriau.
translation.en: [Welsh-medium statement] I can recognise that some letters mutate at the beginning of words.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio gwybodaeth am odlau, sillafau, llythrennau a’r berthynas rhwng synau a symbolau er mwyn darllen geiriau a phennu ystyr.
translation.en: I can use knowledge of rhymes, syllables, letters and sound–symbol relationships to read words and establish meaning.

translation.cy: [Datganiad Cymraeg] Gallaf sylwi bod rhai llythrennau’n treiglo ar ddechrau geiriau.
translation.en: [Welsh-medium statement] I can recognise that letters mutate at the beginning of words.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddod o hyd i wybodaeth o wahanol destunau y byddaf yn eu darllen, cymharu’r wybodaeth honno a’i defnyddio.
translation.en: I can ﬁnd, compare and use information from different materials that I read.

translation.cy: [Datganiad Cymraeg] Gallaf ddefnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am fathau cyffredin o dreigladau i bennu ystyr.
translation.en: [Welsh-medium statement] I can use my knowledge of common mutation types to work out meaning.

translation.cy: Darllen
translation.en: Reading

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio ystyron sydd ymhlyg mewn testun a chasgliadau cymhleth, a gofyn cwestiynau wrth werthuso cynnwys testunau y byddaf yn eu darllen.
translation.en: I can use complex inference and deduction, and ask questions when evaluating the content of what I read.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddangos fy mod yn deall cwestiynau agored ar amrywiaeth o bynciau drwy ddarparu’r wybodaeth fanwl sydd ei hangen mewn ymateb.
translation.en: I can show my understanding of open questions on a range of subjects by providing the detailed information required in response.

translation.cy: [Datganiad Cymraeg] Gallaf ddefnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am bob math o dreigladau i bennu ystyr.
translation.en: [Welsh-medium statement] I can use my knowledge of all mutation types to work out meaning.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio sgiliau trawsieithu yn annibynnol i’m cefnogi wrth i mi ddysgu a chyfathrebu yn Gymraeg, yn Saesneg ac mewn iaith ryngwladol, a, lle bo hynny’n berthnasol, yn ieithoedd y cartref/gymuned.
translation.en: I can use translanguaging skills independently to support my learning and communication, in Welsh, English and an international language, and, where applicable, home/community languages.

translation.cy: [Datganiad Cymraeg] Gallaf ddefnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am bob math o dreigladau i bennu ystyr.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall cwestiynau manwl neu estynedig.
translation.en: I can understand detailed or extended questions.

translation.cy: Gallaf wrando ar yr hyn a ddarllenir i mi ac ymateb.
translation.en: I can listen and respond to what is read to me.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod a darllen geiriau aml eu defnydd a dysgu geirfa ac iaith idiomatig newydd.
translation.en: I can recognise and read high-frequency words and learn new vocabulary and idiomatic language.

translation.cy: Darllen
translation.en: Reading

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod geiriau cyfarwydd sydd wedi eu treiglo.
translation.en: I can recognise familiar words which have mutated.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am wreiddeiriau, teuluoedd o eiriau, cystrawen a’r ffordd y caiff testunau eu trefnu er mwyn fy helpu i ddeall.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of word roots, word families, syntax and how texts are organised to support my understanding.

translation.cy: Iuerirtihcoueludmd,fLolryWthraelensne2d0d22a:CHhuymfaatnhirteiebsu 37
translation.en: Hmuumniacnaittiioens 36

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod, yn annibynnol, gyﬂeoedd i roi fy sgiliau trawsieithu ar waith er mwyn cyfoethogi’r modd rwy’n dysgu a chyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can independently identify opportunities to apply my translanguaging skills to enhance my learning and communication.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio gwybodaeth am wreiddeiriau, berfau, cystrawen a dulliau trefnu testun i ategu uwch sgiliau darllen.
translation.en: I can use knowledge of word roots, verbs, syntax and text organisation to support higher-order reading skills.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddarllen yn feirniadol er mwyn llunio safbwynt gwybodus a chytbwys.
translation.en: I can read critically to reach an informed and balanced perspective.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi meithrin gwybodaeth a sgiliau yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg, ac mewn ieithoedd cartref a chymunedol lle bo hynny’n berthnasol, sy’n cynnig sail ar gyfer dysgu iaith ryngwladol (ieithoedd rhyngwladol).
translation.en: I have developed knowledge and skills in both Welsh and English, and in home and community languages where applicable, and these skills are a foundation for my learning of international language(s).

translation.en: [Welsh-medium statement] I can use the most common mutations when speaking.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio atalnodi cyfarwydd yn gywir.
translation.en: I can use familiar punctuation correctly.

translation.cy: Gallaf fod yn uchelgeisiol wrth ddewis geirfa a chystrawen, gan gynnwys geirfa pwnc-benodol a geirfa ar gyfer cyd-destunau penodol.
translation.en: I can make ambitious vocabulary and syntax choices, including subject-speciﬁc andcontext-speciﬁc vocabulary.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod y prif bwyntiau drwy grynhoi’r hyn rwyf wedi’i glywed.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio dulliau meddalwedd i wella’r canlyniadau ar gyfer cynulleidfaoedd penodol.
translation.en: I can use software tools to enhance the outcomes for speciﬁc audiences.

translation.cy: Gallaf drefnu, dethol a defnyddio ffurﬁau a strwythurau iaith amrywiol a phriodol er mwyn creu effeithiau.
translation.en: I can organise, select and use varied and appropriate language forms and structures to create effects.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio amrywiaeth eang o strwythurau brawddeg wrth ysgrifennu.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5

translation.cy: Gallaf bennu ystyron a dod i gasgliadau gan ddefnyddio ystyron sydd ymhlyg.
translation.en: I can draw meanings and conclusions by using inference.

translation.en: I can use sophisticated vocabulary to write in a range of styles and forms to convey meaning convincingly.

translation.cy: Gallaf ystyried effaith fy ngwaith ysgrifennu mewn ffordd wrthrychol.
translation.en: I can consider the effects of my writing objectively.

translation.cy: Gallaf fabwysiadu rôl yn ailadrodd iaith gyfarwydd.
translation.en: I can adopt a role, repeating familiar language.

translation.cy: Ysgrifennu
translation.en: Writing

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio amrywiaeth eang o eirfa a chystrawen gywir i gyﬂeu ystyr ac i ennyn diddordeb y gynulleidfa.
translation.en: I can use a wide range of vocabulary and correct syntax to convey meaning and to engage the audience.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o strwythurau brawddeg, gan gynnwys rhai brawddegau cymhleth.
translation.en: I can use a range of sentence structures including some complex sentences.

translation.cy: Gallaf siarad gyda hyfedredd gan ddefnyddio ystod o dechnegau gan gynnwys amrywio mynegiant ac ystum.
translation.en: I can speak with proﬁciency, using a range of techniques, expressions and gestures.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi meithrin gwybodaeth a sgiliau yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg, ac mewn ieithoedd cartref a chymunedol lle bo hynny’n berthnasol, sy’n cynnig sail ar gyfer iaith ryngwladol (ieithoedd rhyngwladol).
translation.en: I have developed knowledge and skills in both Welsh and English, and home and community languages where applicable, and these skills are a foundation for my international language(s).

translation.cy: Bydd y Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu yn cynnig proﬁadau llenyddol i ddysgwyr a fydd yn ennyn eu diddordeb a’u dychymyg fel darllenwyr, gwrandawyr, gwylwyr, awduron a llenorion.
translation.en: The Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience will provide learners with literary experiences that will engage their interest and imagination as readers, listeners, viewers, writers and creators.

translation.en: I can discuss the plot, character, theme and context of the literature I hear, view or read, expressing my ideas and opinions.

translation.cy: Gallaf sôn am y plot a’r cymeriadau yn y llenyddiaeth Gymraeg a glywaf, ac a welaf ac a ddarllenaf, gan fynegi fy marnau yn Gymraeg gan ddefnyddio iaith gyfarwydd.
translation.en: I can talk about plot and characters in Welsh literature I hear, view or read, expressing my opinions in Welsh using familiar language.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi meithrin gwybodaeth a sgiliau sy’n addas i’r cam cynnydd yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg, ac mewn ieithoedd cartref a chymunedol lle bo hynny’n berthnasol, sy’n cynnig sail i mi ddysgu iaith ryngwladol (ieithoedd rhyngwladol).
translation.en: I have developed stage-appropriate knowledge and skills in Welsh and English, and home and community languages where applicable, which are a foundation for international language(s).

translation.en: This section suggests where learning can be enriched through drawing links between other what matters statements across all the areas of learning and experience.

translation.cy: • trafod yr hyn y maent wedi’i ddarllen a dod i ddeall testun yn llawn

translation.en: • opportunities to take risks and challenge thinking within the context of real and imagined experiences

translation.cy: Iechyd a Lles
translation.en: Health and Well-being

translation.cy: Mae’r ffordd rydym yn gwneud penderfyniadau yn effeithio ar ansawdd ein bywydau ni a bywydau eraill.
translation.en: Our decision-making impacts on the quality of our lives and the lives of others.

translation.en: Glossary 56

translation.cy: • y disgwyliadau eang ar gyfer dysgwyr ar bob cam cynnydd ym Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Iechyd a Lles.
translation.en: • the broad expectations for learners for the Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience at each progression step.

translation.cy: Drwy ddeall yr amodau sy’n hyrwyddo ac yn effeithio ar iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol, caiff dysgwyr eu cynorthwyo i ymdopi â’r proﬁadau y byddant yn dod ar eu traws yn ystod eu bywyd.
translation.en: Through understanding the conditions that promote and impact on mental health and emotional well-being, learners will be supported to manage the experiences that they encounter.

translation.cy: Iechyd a Lles 07
translation.en: Health and Well-being 07

translation.cy: Mae hunanymwybyddiaeth yn galluogi dysgwyr i fod yn agored i dderbyn emosiynau ac i fyfyrio arnynt, ac mae hyn yn eu helpu i addasu eu hymddygiad a’u gweithredoedd i wahanol sefyllfaoedd.
translation.en: Self-awareness allows learners to be receptive and reﬂective, which helps them to adapt their behaviour and actions to different situations.

translation.cy: Drwy gydnabod a dilyn normau cadarnhaol, gall dysgwyr fod yn aelodau llawn a gweithredol o amrywiaeth o grwpiau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: Recognising and following positive norms enables learners to be full and active members of a range of social groups.

translation.cy: Maent yn cyfrannu at ein hymdeimlad o berthyn a’n lles emosiynol.
translation.en: They contribute to our sense of belonging and emotional well-being.

translation.cy: • Gwneud penderfyniadau mewn cyd-destun ar-lein.
translation.en: • Making decisions in an online context.

translation.cy: • Defnyddio ffynonellau ar-lein er mwyn gwneud penderfyniadau a dod o hyd i wybodaeth a chymorth.
translation.en: • Using online sources to make decisions and seek information and support.

translation.cy: • Normau ac agweddau o ran cyswllt priodol a chynnwys priodol ar-lein.
translation.en: • Norms and attitudes about appropriate online contact and content.

translation.cy: • Defnyddio llwyfannau ar-lein er mwyn eirioli.
translation.en: • The use of online platforms for advocacy.

translation.cy: • Nodweddion cydberthnasau niweidiol ar-lein.
translation.en: • The characteristics of harmful relationships online.

translation.cy: deall yr un cysyniad ond yn fanylach (ailystyried gwybodaeth/sgiliau ond ar lefel ddyfnach);
translation.en: the same concept being understood with increasing depth (revisiting knowledge/skills but at a deeper level);

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn echdynnu ac yn dehongli gwybodaeth o amrywiaeth o ddiagramau a grafﬁau er mwyn dod i gasgliadau am ffactorau a all ddylanwadu ar eu hiechyd a’u lles, neu’n syml er mwyn olrhain a chofnodi eu cynnydd wrth wneud gweithgareddau corfforol.
translation.en: Learners will extract and interpret information from a range of diagrams and graphs to draw conclusions on factors which may inﬂuence their health and well-being, or simply track and record their progress in physical activity.

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad CCwwrricicwwlwlwmmDDrraafftftiiGGyymmrruu22002222::IeIecchhyyddaaLLleless 13
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022: Health and Well-being 13

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr feithrin ymdeimlad cadarn o’u hunain yn ogystal â dealltwriaeth o’u statws ar lefel leol, genedlaethol a byd-eang.
translation.en: Learners need to gain a strong sense of self as well as an understanding of their position on a local, national and global level.

translation.cy: Caiff dysgwyr hefyd eu helpu i ddatblygu ymatebion a datrysiadau i broﬁadau y byddant yn eu hwynebu ac i gynnal dadansoddiad beirniadol o’r ffactorau sy’n dylanwadu ar y penderfyniadau a wneir, megis gwerthoedd, credoau a thuedd.
translation.en: Learners are also supported to develop responses and solutions to experiences they encounter and critically analyse the factors that inﬂuence decision-making, such as values, beliefs and bias.

translation.cy: • Cynllunio a threfnu cyllid a gweithio’n unol â chyllideb.
translation.en: • Planning and organising ﬁnances and working within a budget.

translation.cy: • Mae deall yr amodau sy’n hyrwyddo ac yn effeithio ar iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol yn helpu dysgwyr i ymdopi â’u proﬁadau ac i ymddwyn gan ddangos empathi, cydymdeimlad a charedigrwydd tuag atynt hwy eu hunain ac eraill.
translation.en: • Understanding the conditions that promote and impact upon mental health and emotional well-being helps learners manage their experiences and act with empathy, compassion and kindness for themselves and others.

translation.cy: Dysgu o wybodaeth am yrfaoedd a’r farchnad lafur
translation.en: Learning from careers and labour market information

translation.cy: Gallai llwyddiant i ddysgwr cynradd ifanc gynnwys:
translation.en: Success for a young primary school learner could include:

translation.cy: • deall ac arddangos y mathau o ymddygiad y mae cyﬂogwr yn dymuno eu gweld mewn cyﬂogai da
translation.en: • understanding and demonstrating the behaviours an employer looks for in a good employee

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad CCwwrricicwwlwlwmmDDrraafftftiiGGyymmrruu22002222::IeIecchhyyddaaLLleless 16
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022: Health and Well-being 16

translation.cy: Mae arweiniad gyrfaoedd effeithiol yn hanfodol er mwyn sicrhau’r llwybr mwyaf priodol ar gyfer dyheadau dysgwyr, gan eu hysbysu am yr amrywiaeth o bwyntiau mynediad a’r llwybrau amrywiol i mewn i’r byd gwaith.
translation.en: Effective careers guidance is essential in securing the most appropriate route for learners’ aspirations, informing them of the diversity of entry points and the various pathways into the world of work.

translation.cy: Cydberthnasau
translation.en: Relationships

translation.cy: • Deall a pharchu y caiff hunaniaeth, gwerthoedd, agweddau ac ymddygiad pobl eraill eu llywio gan eu grwpiau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: • Understand and respect that others’ identity, values, attitudes and behaviours are shaped by their social groups.

translation.cy: • Parch, tegwch a chydnabod hawliau eich gilydd mewn cydberthnasau.
translation.en: • Respect, equity and recognising each other’s rights in relationships.

translation.cy: hunaniaeth a newidiadau fﬁsiolegol mewn perthynas ag emosiynau.
translation.en: identity and physiological changes in relation to emotions.

translation.cy: • Deall sut i ymateb yn briodol mewn sefyllfaoedd niweidiol neu anniogel.
translation.en: • Understand how to respond appropriately in harmful or unsafe situations.

translation.cy: • Yr effaith ar iechyd corfforol ac iechyd meddwl a lles emosiynol.
translation.en: • Impact on physical and mental health and emotional well-being.

translation.cy: Cyfoethogi a phroﬁadau
translation.en: Enrichment and experiences

translation.cy: Mae enghreifftiau o ganlyniadau proﬁadau o’r fath yn cynnwys gwell annibyniaeth, hyder, hunan-barch, hunaneffeithiolrwydd, effeithiolrwydd personol a strategaethau ymdopi.
translation.en: Examples of outcomes include improved independence, conﬁdence, self-esteem, self-efﬁcacy, personal effectiveness and coping strategies.

translation.cy: Gellir gwneud hyn drwy osod llais y dysgwr wrth wraidd gwaith cynllunio a dylai gweithwyr proffesiynol hefyd geisio cydweithredu ag amrywiaeth o arbenigwyr a rhanddeiliaid wrth ddatblygu eu cwricwlwm.
translation.en: This can be done by placing the voice of the learner at the centre of planning. Professionals should also seek to collaborate with a range of experts and stakeholders in developing their curriculum.

translation.cy: YR HYN SY’N BWYSIG MEWN IECHYD A LLES
translation.en: WHAT MATTERS IN HEALTH AND WELL-BEING

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn ei dro yn cyfrannu at ddatblygu synnwyr o hunanwerth yn y dysgwyr ac yn cyfrannu hefyd at eu hwyliau’n gyffredinol ynghydâ’u lefelau egni.
translation.en: These behaviours in turn will contribute towards developing learners’ sense of self-worth and their overall mood and energy levels.

translation.cy: Mae’r maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yn cydnabod y modd y mae datblygiad corfforol yn cydberthyn yn agos i ddatblygiad gwybyddol gydol oes, er enghraifft y modd y mae’n helpu i ddatblygu lleferydd ac iaith yn ystod y blynyddoedd cynnar.
translation.en: This area of learning and experience recognises how physical development is closely interrelated with lifelong cognitive development, for example how it supports speech and language development during the early years.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi dod i ddeall y bydd fy nghorff yn newid wrth i mi dyfu.
translation.en: I have developed an awareness that my body will change as I grow.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi dod i werthfawrogi fy ngallu i symud a’m hiechyd corfforol ac rwy’n hyderus y gallaf gwrdd â heriau corfforol.
translation.en: I have developed an appreciation of my movement ability and physical health and I am conﬁdent in my ability to meet physical challenges.

translation.cy: Mae’r ffordd rydym yn prosesu ein proﬁadau ac yn ymateb iddynt yn effeithio ar ein hiechyd meddwl a’n lles emosiynol.
translation.en: How we process and respond to our experiences affects our mental health and emotional well-being.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgu Cymraeg, Saesneg, addysg grefyddol, addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb, a’r tri chyfrifoldeb trawsgwricwlaidd, sef llythrennedd, rhifedd a chymhwysedd digidol, i gyd yn ddyletswyddau statudol.
translation.en: There will be statutory duties to teach Welsh, English, religious education, relationships and sexuality education, and the three cross-curricular responsibilities of literacy, numeracy and digital competence.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr sy’n gyfranwyr mentrus, creadigol sy’n barod i chwarae eu rhan yn llawn yn eu bywyd a’u gwaith yn croesawu heriau o’r fath, oherwydd cânt eu hannog i gymryd risg, i arloesi a gwerthuso, a dysgu sut i daro ar atebion.
translation.en: Learners who are enterprising, creative contributors, ready to play a full part in life and work embrace such challenges, as they are encouraged to take risks, to innovate and evaluate, and learn to develop solutions.

translation.cy: Felly, gallant ddod yn ddysgwyr mwy gwydn a phwrpasol ar draws yr holl feysydd dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: Thus, they can become more resilient and purposeful learners across all areas of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Fel rhan o broses ddylunio sy’n canolbwyntio ar y defnyddiwr, rydym yn datblygu syniadau, yn rheoli ac yn lliniaru risg, ac yn lleihau cymhlethdodau cymaint â phosibl.
translation.en: As part of a user-centred design process, we develop ideas, manage and mitigate risks, and minimise complexities.

translation.cy: Mewn Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg, rydym yn adnabod bod pethau byw yn amrywiol, yn rhyngweithio â’u hamgylchedd ac yn esblygu dros genedlaethau.
translation.en: In Science and Technology, we recognise that living things are diverse, interacting with their environment and evolving over generations.

translation.cy: Mewn Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg, mae deall mater a’i briodweddau yn ein galluogi ni i gydnabod y rôl y mae cemeg yn ei chwarae yn y byd o’n cwmpas.
translation.en: In Science and Technology, understanding matter and its properties enables us to recognise the role that chemistry plays in the world around us.

translation.cy: Wrth i ni wedyn ddatblygu dealltwriaeth ddyfnach o fater a’i briodweddau, gallwn ddylunio a chreu sylweddau a defnyddiau newydd sy’n cyfoethogi ein bywydau.
translation.en: As we then develop a deeper understanding of matter and its properties, we can design and create new substances and materials that can enrich our lives.

translation.cy: Mae deall grymoedd ac egni yn ein helpu i ragfynegi a rheoli ymddygiad ein hamgylchedd.
translation.en: Understanding forces and energy helps us to predict and control the behaviour of our surroundings.

translation.cy: Mae’r berthynas rhwng grymoedd ac egni a sut mae’n effeithio arnom yn dod i’r amlwg yn y pumed datganiad o’r hyn sy’n bwysig.
translation.en: The relationship between forces and energy and how it impacts on us is set out in the ﬁfth what matters.

translation.cy: Bydd llafaredd, boed hynny ar ffurf dadleuon neu drafodaethau grŵp, yn ategu sgiliau ysgrifennu dysgwyr ac yn rhoi llais iddynt wrth ysgrifennu, yn enwedig pan fyddant yn cael eu herio gan gysyniadau anodd.
translation.en:
Oracy, whether as group discussions or debates, will support learners’ writing and give them a
voice into their writing, particularly where they are challenged by difﬁcult concepts.

translation.cy: Mae Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg yn gyfoethog o ran geiriau arbenigol, y mae i lawer ohonynt ddifﬁniadau pob-dydd yn ogystal â rhai technegol.
translation.en: Science and Technology is rich in specialised words, many of which have both everyday as well as technical deﬁnitions.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae’n bwysig cydnabod nad y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yw’r unig un sy’n canolbwyntio ar gymhwysedd digidol nac yn cynnig cyﬂe i feithrin y sgiliau hyn.
translation.en: It is important to recognise, however, that this area of learning and experience is not the sole home of digital competence, nor the only opportunity to develop these skills.

translation.cy: Dylent hefyd archwilio dulliau electronig o gyfathrebu a phenderfynu pa rai sydd fwyaf effeithiol ar gyfer sefyllfaoedd penodol.
translation.en: They should also explore methods of electronic communication and identify which are the most effective for given situations.

translation.cy: Byddant yn meithrin eu sgiliau hunanwerthuso drwy brosesau meddwl yn feirniadol.
translation.en: Learners will develop their self-evaluation through the critical-thinking processes.

translation.cy: Byddant yn gallu gwerthuso eu cynnydd a’u canlyniadau’n feirniadol er mwyn gwella eu syniadau a’u deilliannau ymhellach.
translation.en: They will be able to critically evaluate their progress and results to further improve their ideas and outcomes.

translation.cy: Drwy hyn gallant lunio gwerthoedd clir a chadarn, sy’n llywio nodau bywyd cyraeddadwy, er mwyn iddynt ddatblygu’n ddinasyddion effeithiol.
translation.en: Through this they can form clear, strong values which inform achievable life goals, and enable them to develop as effective citizens.

translation.cy: Felly, yn ogystal â deall am gyﬂogaeth, hyfforddiant a phrentisiaethau, dylid rhoi gwybodaeth i ddysgwyr am ddarparwyr dysgu a chynnig y cyﬂe iddynt ymgysylltu ag amrywiaeth o ddarparwyr o’r fath.
translation.en: Therefore, as well as understanding about employment, training and apprenticeships, learners should be provided with information and the opportunity to engage with a range of learning providers.

translation.cy: Gall stereoteipiau a thybiaethau anghywir, a all arwain at stigma a gwahaniaethu, fod yn niweidiol i les unigolion a thorri eu hawliau dynol.
translation.en: Incorrect assumptions and stereotyping, which may lead to stigma and discrimination, can be harmful to individuals’ well-being and violate their human rights.

translation.cy: Drwy hyn, bydd dysgwyr yn gallu deall efallai na fydd hunaniaeth rywiol unigolyn bob amser yn cyd-fynd â’i ryw ﬁolegol.
translation.en: Through this, learners will be able to understand that a person’s gender identity may not match their biological sex.

translation.cy: Mae archwilio a phroﬁ’r byd drwy ymchwil (gan gynnwys gwaith maes, archwilio amgylcheddau dan do ac awyr agored mewn ffordd ddiogel a systematig) yn hanfodol i bob dysgwr.
translation.en: Exploration and experience of the world through inquiry (including ﬁeldwork, investigating indoor and outdoor environments in a safe and systematic way) are crucial for all learners.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn meithrin dealltwriaeth well o faterion amgylcheddol gwahanol ac yn dysgu sut i ddangos gofal, cyfrifoldeb, ystyriaeth a pharch tuag at bob peth byw a’r amgylchedd o’u cwmpas.
translation.en: Learners will enhance their understanding of different environmental issues and learn to demonstrate care, responsibility, concern and respect for all living things and the environment in which they live.

translation.cy: Bydd angen i leoliadau ac ysgolion ddefnyddio Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg gan sicrhau bod pedwar diben y cwricwlwm yn greiddiol i’r broses o gynllunio’r proﬁadau, yr wybodaeth a’r sgiliau y bydd dysgwyr yn dod ar eu traws.
translation.en: The Science and Technology Area of Learning and Experience will need to be used by settings and schools with the four purposes of the curriculum central to the planning of the experiences, knowledge and skills learners will encounter.

translation.cy: Gall yr hyn a ddysgir mewn un agwedd atgyfnerthu a chefnogi gwaith o fewn gwahanol ddisgyblaethau mewn modd amserol.
translation.en: The learning undertaken in one aspect can reinforce and support work across different disciplines in a timely manner.
