translation.cy: Cynnwys Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Contents Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae dinasyddion gwybodus, hunanymwybodol yn mynd i’r afael â’r heriau a’r cyﬂeoedd sy’n wynebu dynoliaeth, ac yn gallu cymryd camau ystyrlon, egwyddorol a chynaliadwy.
translation.en: Informed, self-aware citizens engage with the challenges and opportunities that face humanity, and are able to take considered, ethical and sustainable action.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, gall dysgwyr ac athrawon gyfeirio at ddisgyblaethau ategol eraill, megis y clasuron, economeg, y gyfraith, athroniaeth, gwleidyddiaeth, seicoleg a chymdeithaseg, os a lle y bydd hynny’n briodol.
translation.en: Likewise, learners and teachers may reference other complementary disciplines, such as classics, economics, law, philosophy, politics, psychology and sociology, if and where appropriate.

translation.cy: Bydd yn hyrwyddo dealltwriaeth o’r ffordd y mae pobl Cymru, ei chymunedau, ei diwylliant, ei thirwedd, ei hadnoddau a’i diwydiannau yn ymwneud â gweddill y byd.
translation.en: It will promote an understanding of how the people of Wales, its communities, culture, landscape, resources and industries interrelate with the rest of the world.

translation.cy: Cwricwlwm gweddnewidiol
translation.en: A transformational curriculum

translation.cy: Y cynnig yw y bydd gofyn i leoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir ac ysgolion ddarparu cwricwlwm eang a chytbwys sy’n bodloni pedwar diben y cwricwlwm ac sy’n cynnwys y chwe maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: The proposal is that funded non-maintained settings and schools will be required to provide a broad and balanced curriculum that meets the four purposes of the curriculum, and comprises the six areas of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Yn ymarferol, golyga hyn y dylent ddilyn y canllawiau statudol oni bai bod ganddynt reswm da i beidio.
translation.en: In practice, that means they should follow the statutory guidance unless they have good reason not to.

translation.cy: Maent yn nodi:
translation.en: It sets out:

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 06
translation.en: Humanities 06

translation.cy: Mae meddwl ymholgar yn ysgogi ffyrdd newydd a chreadigol o feddwl.
translation.en: An enquiring mind stimulates new and creative thinking.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn myfyrio’n ofalus er mwyn gwella eu methodoleg ac ehangu neu ddyfnhau eu hymholiad.
translation.en: Learners carefully reﬂect in order to improve their methodology and extend or deepen their enquiry.

translation.cy: Yn wir, mae’r broses ymholi yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i hunanfyfyrio sy’n ychwanegu ystyr at eu bywydau eu hunain ac yn cyfrannu at eu hymdeimlad o’u lle yn y byd.
translation.en: Indeed, enquiry enables self-reﬂection which adds meaning to their own lives and contributes to their sense of place in the world.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn archwilio amrywiaeth o gredoau ac athroniaethau am y byd naturiol, a sut y maent yn dylanwadu ar y modd y mae’r byd â’i bobl yn rhyngweithio.
translation.en: Learners will explore a range of beliefs and philosophies about the natural world, and how they inﬂuence people’s interactions with the world.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn archwilio’r cysylltiadau rhwng y cymdeithasau hyn yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: Learners will explore the connections between such societies in the past and present.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr hefyd yn gallu cyﬁawnhau eu penderfyniadau wrth weithredu mewn ffordd gymdeithasol, wleidyddol, economaidd ac entrepreneuraidd.
translation.en: Learners will also be able to justify their decisions when acting socially, politically, economically and entrepreneurially.

translation.cy: Llythrennedd, rhifedd a chymhwysedd digidol
translation.en: Literacy, numeracy and digital competence

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gall dysgwyr gasglu data rhifyddol, drwy ddulliau ymchwil sylfaenol ac eilaidd a phortreadu data mewn sawl ffordd amrywiol.
translation.en: For example, learners can collect numerical data, through primary and secondary research methods, and represent data in a variety of ways.

translation.cy: • deall y gallant, mewn byd amrywiol, deinamig sy’n newid, wneud gwahaniaeth cadarnhaol, gan helpu i greu byd tecach a diogelach i bawb
translation.en: • understand that, in a diverse, dynamic and changing world, they can make a positive difference helping to build a fairer, safer and more secure world for everyone

translation.cy: Cysylltu’r maes dysgu a phroﬁad â gyrfaoedd a phroﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith Dylid annog dysgwyr i ymgymryd â gwaith ymchwil ac ystyried y cysylltiadau rhwng y Dyniaethau a’r llwybrau gyrfa a fyddai ar gael iddynt.
translation.en: Linking the area of learning and experience to careers and work-related experiences Learners should be encouraged to undertake research and to explore the links between Humanities and the career paths these would open to them.

translation.cy: • chwarae rôl ar gyfer amrywiaeth o wahanol swyddi
translation.en: • acting a variety of different jobs through role play

translation.cy: Y corff dynol a’i ddatblygiad
translation.en: The human body and development

translation.cy: Bydd ysgolion gwirfoddol a gynorthwyir sydd â chymeriad crefyddol yn parhau i allu cyﬂwyno meysydd llafur eu henwad, a gall rhieni/gofalwyr dysgwyr sy’n mynychu ysgolion gwirfoddol a reolir barhau i ofyn bod eu plentyn yn astudio’r maes llafur enwadol yn hytrach na’r maes llafur cytûn lleol, os ydynt yn dymuno gwneud hynny.
translation.en: Voluntary aided schools with a religious character will continue to be able to deliver their denomination syllabi and parents/carers of learners attending voluntary controlled schools can continue to request that their child studies the denominational syllabus rather than the locally agreed syllabus if they wish.

translation.cy: Gall ymwneud yn ystyrlon â chymunedau fod yn rhywbeth pleserus a choﬁadwy.
translation.en: Meaningful engagement with communities can be enjoyable and memorable.

translation.cy: Dylent gael proﬁad o chwarae a dysgu mewn amgylchiadau cyfoethog dan do ac yn yr awyr agored a’u harchwilio.
translation.en: They should experience playing and learning in and exploring rich indoor and outdoor environments.

translation.cy: Fel mater o egwyddor, dylai ymarferwyr allu penderfynu ar y modd y trefnir y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn, a dewis y cynnwys fydd angen ei gyﬂwyno.
translation.en: As a matter of principle, practitioners should be free to decide on the organisation of this area of learning and experience, and the choice of content to be covered.

translation.cy: Dylai ysgolion ddethol cynnwys sy’n sicrhau amrywiaeth gynyddol wrth i ddysgwyr symud drwy’r ysgol, er mwyn i gysyniadau allweddol gael eu harchwilio’n fwy trylwyr.
translation.en: Schools should select content to ensure there is increasing range as learners progress through school so that the key concepts can be explored more thoroughly.

translation.cy: Dylai’r broses o ddylunio cwricwla ysgolion sicrhau y caiff cyd-destunau a phroﬁadau dysgwyr o’u hardal leol ac o Gymru eu hystyried fel pethau o bwys, ac yn greiddiol wrth gynllunio.
translation.en: School curriculum design should ensure that learners’ locality and Welsh contexts and experiences are seen as signiﬁcant and central to planning.

translation.cy: • ymdrin â digwyddiadau, pobl a phrosesau sydd wedi cael effeithiau sylweddol
translation.en: • covers events, people and processes that have had considerable effects

translation.cy: Bydd hyn hefyd yn paratoi dysgwyr i arbenigo ymhellach ym maes addysg bellach ac addysg uwch, ac yn y byd gwaith.
translation.en: This will also pave the way for further specialisation during further and higher education, and in the world of work.

translation.cy: Mae mynd i’r afael â chwestiynau yn rhoi’r modd i ddysgwyr ddeall proﬁadau dynol a’r byd naturiol.
translation.en: Engaging with questions empowers learners to understand human experiences and the natural world.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn dehongli a dwyn ynghyd gwybodaeth er mwyn adeiladu ar yr hyn a ddysgwyd eisoes a llywio eu dealltwriaeth o’r byd ymhellach.
translation.en: Learners interpret and synthesise information to build upon what they have already learned and further inform their understanding of the world.

translation.cy: • dyfnder gwybodaeth cynyddol, a nodweddir gan y gallu i gysylltu dysgu newydd â gwybodaeth ﬂaenorol, i feithrin dealltwriaeth fwy sofﬁstigedig, ac i ddatrys yr achosion o wrthdaro a all godi pan ddaw gwahanol safbwyntiau ynghyd
translation.en: • increased depth of knowledge, characterised by linking new learning to existing knowledge, developing a more sophisticated understanding and resolving the conﬂicts that can emerge from different points of view

translation.cy: Gallaf ofyn cwestiynau syml a chynnig atebion posibl yn seiliedig ar broﬁadau blaenorol.
translation.en: I can ask simple questions and offer possible answers based on previous experiences.

translation.cy: Gallaf roi esboniadau syml am fy nghanfyddiadau.
translation.en: I can give simple explanations for my ﬁndings.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddod i gasgliadau syml.
translation.en: I can draw simple conclusions.

translation.cy: Gallaf lunio a chyﬂwyno casgliadau ar gyfer fy nghanfyddiadau, a gallaf ddisgriﬁo penderfyniad
translation.en: I can draw and present conclusions for my ﬁndings, and can describe an evidence-supported

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio amrywiaeth o ffynonellau a thystiolaeth, gan gynnwys ffynonellau ysgrifenedig, gweledol, fﬁsegol a llafar sy’n deillio o’m gwaith ymchwil.
translation.en: I have used a range of sources and evidence, including written, visual, physical and oral sources that have been gained from my research.

translation.cy: Gallaf gyﬂwyno fy nghanfyddiadau a data, gan ddefnyddio dulliau cynyddol sofﬁstigedig.
translation.en: I can present my ﬁndings and data, utilising a range of increasingly sophisticated methods.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall fod yr holl bethau uchod yn elfennau gofynnol o fewn proses ymholi, a bod modd eu cymhwyso at amrywiaeth o gwestiynau sy’n ymwneud â’r Dyniaethau.
translation.en: I can understand that each of the above are required elements of a process of enquiry, which can be applied to a variety of Humanities questions.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cynnal ymholiadau yn annibynnol ac ar y cyd yn y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: I have undertaken independent and collaborative enquiries in Humanities.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cael y cyﬂe i fyfyrio ar y modd y mae fy ymholiad yn ychwanegu gwerth i’m bywyd
translation.en: I have had the opportunity for reﬂection on how my enquiry may add meaning to my own life

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi datblygu ac wedi arwain fy ymholiadau fy hun sy’n canolbwyntio ar fy nghredoau,
translation.en: I have developed and led my own enquiries focusing on my locality, Wales, and the wider world, now and in the past.

translation.cy: Gallaf fyfyrio mewn ffordd ystyrlon er mwyn cynnal gwaith ymchwil pellach neu ehangu’r ymholiad.
translation.en: I can make considered reﬂections for further research or extension of the enquiry.

translation.en: I can understand that Ultimate questions are complex, and answers are often partial and inconclusive.

translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.cy: Mae datblygu meddwl ymchwilgar a chael proﬁad o ymholiadau yn caniatáu i’r dysgwyr ymchwilio ac ystyried pob agwedd ar y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: Developing an enquiring mind and experiencing enquiries allows learners to investigate and consider all aspects of Humanities.

translation.cy: • Bydd tystiolaeth eilaidd a ddefnyddir mewn ymholiadau yn dangos amrywiol safbwyntiau, dehongliadau a chynrychioliadau.
translation.en: • Secondary evidence used in enquiries can illustrate varied viewpoints, interpretations and representations.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:

translation.en: • Literature as evidence for and a focus of enquiries.

translation.en: • gather evidence from a range of sources

translation.en: • arrange and present ﬁndings appropriately, using digital techniques when appropriate

translation.cy: • myfyrio ar ymholiadau, gofyn cwestiynau am y broses ddysgu, ac edrych ymlaen hefyd i weld beth fydd cam nesaf yr ymholiad
translation.en: • reﬂect on enquiries, ask questions about the learning process, and also look forward to where an enquiry is leading next

translation.en: • a range of stimuli that aim to enthuse and inspire them to imagine and be curious, and to explore, discover and question

translation.en: • the similarities and differences between enquiry methods in each subject area.

translation.en: • identify the relevance of the information collected to the speciﬁc context of the enquiry

translation.en: • engagement with philosophical questioning

translation.en: • enquiries focusing on learners’ locality, Wales and the wider world in the past and present

translation.cy: • gynnal ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar gwestiynau a materion rhyngddisgyblaethol yn ogystal â rhai pwnc-benodol
translation.en: • undertake enquiries that are focused on interdisciplinary as well as subject-focused questions and issues

translation.en: Religious education

translation.cy: YR HYN SY’N BWYSIG  YN Y DYNIAETHAU
translation.en: WHAT MATTERS IN HUMANITIES

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd yw’r sail ar gyfer datblygu’r deilliannau cyﬂawniad a dylent lywio dilyniant y dysgu o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: Principles of progression are the basis on which the achievement outcomes have been developed and should guide the progression of learning within the area of learning and experience.

translation.cy: • annibyniaeth gynyddol a gallu cynyddol i hunanreoli.
translation.en: • increasing independence and self-regulation.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf gydnabod y gall fy nheimladau, fy ngweithredoedd a’m barnau personol fod yn wahanol i deimladau, gweithredoedd a barnau personol pobl eraill.
translation.en: I can recognise that my feelings, actions and opinions can be different from those of others.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall fod pobl eraill yn egluro pethau mewn gwahanol ffyrdd, a gallaf ystyriedrhinweddau’r safbwyntiau a’r esboniadau gwahanol hyn.
translation.en: I can understand that other people explain things in different ways, and I can consider the merits of these different viewpoints and explanations.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi gallu dod i gasgliad am farnau, safbwyntiau a dehongliadau pobl o ffynonellau a thystiolaeth.
translation.en: I have been able to infer people’s opinions, viewpoints and interpretations from sources and evidence.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro’r rhesymau a all fod gan bobl neu y gall pobl eu defnyddio i egluro digwyddiadau a materion o bwys mewn gwahanol ffyrdd.
translation.en: I can explain reasons people may have or may use to explain events and issues in different ways.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro a dadansoddi amrywiaeth o resymau pam y mae gan bobl wahanol farnau am arwyddocâd pobl, digwyddiadau a phroﬁadau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol, a gallaf lunio, amddiffyn a chyﬁawnhau fy marnau fy hun ar eu harwyddocâd.
translation.en: I can explain and analyse a range of reasons why people have different opinions about the signiﬁcance of people, events and experiences in the past and present, and can form, defend and justify my own opinions of their signiﬁcance.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi dechrau herio fy ngwerthoedd a’m persbectifau personol.
translation.en: I have begun to challenge my own values and perspectives.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio gwahanol persbectifau i archwilio materion.
translation.en: I have used different perspectives to explore issues.

translation.cy: Gallaf gynnal gwerthusiad beirniadol o agweddau penodol ar grefydd a bydolygon, gan ystyried gwahanol ddehongliadau o ddysgeidiaethau crefyddol a’u heffaith arnaf i, ar unigolion eraill, ar gymdeithas leol ac ar gymdeithas fyd-eang.
translation.en: I can critically evaluate speciﬁc aspects of religion and world views, considering the different interpretations of religious teachings and the impact of these upon me, other individuals, local and global society.

translation.cy: Astudiaethau busnes ac astudiaethau cymdeithasol
translation.en: Business studies and social studies

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall fod amrywiaeth o ddehongliadau o faterion cymdeithasol yn llywio’r modd y mae cymdeithas yn cael ei strwythuro.
translation.en: I can understand that there is a range of interpretations of social issues that inform how society is structured.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn awgrymu ymhle gellid ystyried gwahanol elfennau o ddysgu gyda’i gilydd er mwyn cefnogi dysgusy’n fwy holistaidd.
translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.cy: • Gwahanol ddehongliadau o’r heriau a’r cyﬂeoedd allweddol sy’n wynebu dynoliaeth.
translation.en: • Differing interpretations of the key challenges and opportunities facing humanity.

translation.en: Humanities 39

translation.cy: • Canfyddiadau o’r byd naturiol.
translation.en: • Perceptions of the natural world.

translation.cy: • Dehongli data, h.y. tueddiadau economaidd.
translation.en: • Interpreting data, i.e. economic trends.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:

translation.en: • what opinions are, and recognise that they and others have opinions.

translation.cy: rôl busnes;

translation.cy: • archwilio haenau o ystyr o fewn cynrychioliadau symbolaidd.
translation.en: • explore layers of meaning within symbolic representations.

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o straeon symbolaidd, arferion, arteffactau, celf, dawns, drama, cerddoriaeth a bwyd.
translation.en: • a range of symbolic stories, rituals, artefacts, art, dance, drama, music and food.

translation.cy: • archwilio sut a pham y caiff dehongliadau eu llywio a’u ffurﬁo a sut y gallant newid dros amser
translation.en: • explore how and why interpretations are shaped and formed and how they can change over time

translation.cy: • sut a pham y mae haneswyr wedi llunio eu dehongliadau
translation.en: • how and why historians have come to their interpretations

translation.cy: • gymhwyso dulliau gwerthuso priodol wrth ystyried dilysrwydd dehongliadau hanesyddol.
translation.en: • apply appropriate methods of evaluating the validity of historical interpretations.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 47
translation.en: Humanities 46

translation.cy: Mae’r byd naturiol yn amrywiol a deinamig, ac mae dylanwad prosesau fﬁsegol a gweithredoedd dynol arno.
translation.en: Our natural world is diverse and dynamic, inﬂuenced by physical processes and human actions.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Gallaf ddisgriﬁo’r modd y mae gweithredoedd pobl a’r byd naturiol yn effeithio ar ei gilydd, a hynny yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: I can describe how people’s actions and the natural world impact upon each other, both in the past and present.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddisgriﬁo a lleoli lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau, gan gynnwys nodweddion a thirffurﬁau nodedig, gan ddefnyddio sgiliau mapio lle y bo hynny’n briodol.
translation.en: I can describe and locate places, environments and landscapes, including distinctive features and landforms, using map skills where appropriate.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddangos dealltwriaeth o achosion ac effeithiau y digwyddiadau a phrosesau fﬁsegol sy’n llywio lleoedd, amgylcheddau, tirweddau a phobl.
translation.en: I can show understanding of the causes and effects of the events and physical processes that shape places, environments, landscapes and people.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 51
translation.en: Humanities 50

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso amrywiaeth o arferion crefyddol ac anghrefyddol sy’n gysylltiedig â gofodau, lleoedd a ffenomena arwyddocaol yn y byd naturiol.
translation.en: I can evaluate a range of religious and non-religious practices associated with signiﬁcant spaces, places and phenomena within the natural world.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 52
translation.en: Humanities 51

translation.cy: Cysylltiadau o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn
translation.en: Links within this area of learning and experience

translation.cy: • Rôl a chyfrifoldeb unigolion wrth ddiogelu’r amgylchedd.
translation.en: • An individual’s role and responsibility in environmental protection.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 53
translation.en: Humanities 52

translation.cy: Cysylltiadau â meysydd dysgu a phroﬁad eraill
translation.en: Links with other areas of learning and experience

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i broﬁ ymdeimlad o barchedig ofn a rhyfeddod, ac i fyfyrio ar y byd naturiol a’u cysylltiad ag ef.
translation.en: • opportunities to experience a sense of awe and wonder, and to reﬂect upon the natural world and their connection to it.

translation.cy: • cyﬂeu eu teimladau a’u syniadau am nodweddion lleoedd cyfarwydd
translation.en: • communicate their feelings and ideas about the features of familiar places

translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.en: Learners need to know how to and be able to:

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: • describe how people’s beliefs inﬂuence the way they act towards the world

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr allu a gwybod sut i:
translation.en: Learners need to know how to and be able to:

translation.cy: • ddangos dealltwriaeth o nodweddion fﬁsegol lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach
translation.en: • show understanding of the physical features of places, environments and landscapes in Wales and the wider world

translation.cy: • disgriﬁo ystyr cynaliadwyedd mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau, megis y modd y gall ein gweithredoedd ni fygwth amgylcheddau os na fyddwn yn byw mewn modd cynaliadwy, yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach
translation.en: • describe what sustainability means in a variety of contexts, such as how our actions may lead to the creation of threatened environments if we do not live in a sustainable way in Wales and the wider world

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • bod ystod o brosesau fﬁsegol yn rhyngweithio er mwyn datblygu tirweddau penodol ar amrywiaeth o raddfeydd
translation.en: • that a range of physical processes interact to develop distinctive landscapes at a range of scales

translation.cy: • creu a defnyddio amrywiaeth o fapiau, a rhoi sgiliau mapio ar waith er mwyn canfod lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau yn gywir, a hynny drwy ddulliau digidol a dulliau eraill, gan gynnwys systemau gwybodaeth ddaearyddol
translation.en: • create and utilise a variety of maps, using their map skills to accurately locate places, environments and landscapes, and exploiting digital and other methods, including geographical information systems

translation.cy: • am ddylanwad grwpiau a sefydliadau gwleidyddol ar y byd naturiol
translation.en: • about the inﬂuence of political groups and institutions on the natural world

translation.cy: • cydsyniad cynaliadwyedd yng nghyd-destun strategaethau i leihau risg ac effaith prosesau fﬁsegol ar bobl a’u hamgylchedd, megis sut y gall llywodraethau, busnesau a sefydliadau eraill ymateb i faterion amgylcheddol
translation.en: • the concept of sustainability in the context of strategies to reduce the risk and impact of physical processes on people and their environment, such as the way governments, businesses and other organisations respond to environmental issues

translation.cy: • am fydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol am newid, ac am achos ac effaith, yng nghyd-destun y byd naturiol, a all hyn gynnwys syniadau am rhyng-gysylltedd a tharddiad dibynnol
translation.en: • about religious and non-religious world views about change, cause and effect regarding the natural world, which may include ideas about interconnectedness and dependent origination

translation.cy: • roi disgriﬁadau ac esboniadau cynhwysfawr o leoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau, gan gynnwys nodweddion a thirffurﬁau nodedig, a nodi mathau o gymunedau dynol a natur y cymunedau hynny
translation.en: • give comprehensive descriptions and explanations of place, environments and landscapes, including distinctive features and landforms, and type and nature of human communities

translation.cy: • egluro’r modd y mae amrywiaeth o fydolygon yn llywio barnau am gynaliadwyedd y byd, gan gynnwys bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol
translation.en: • explain how a range of world views inform opinions about the sustainability of the world, including religious and non-religious world views

translation.cy: Mae cymdeithasau dynol yn gymhleth ac yn amrywiol, ac maent yn cael eu llywio gan weithredoedd a chredoau pobl.
translation.en: Human societies are complex and diverse, and shaped by human actions and beliefs.

translation.cy: Mae’r esblygiad hwn yn cael ei sbarduno gan y rhyngweithio sydd rhwng amryw o ffactorau, gan gynnwys gweithredoedd a chredoau pobl, a grymoedd fﬁsegol.
translation.en: This evolution is driven by the interplay between a range of factors, including human actions and beliefs, and physical forces.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddilyniannu digwyddiadau a ddigwyddodd dros gyfnod byr o amser er mwyn dangos fy mod yn deall bod rhai pethau yn newid dros amser.
translation.en: I can sequence events that happened over a short period of time to show I understand that some things change over time.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddangos ymwybyddiaeth o bwy ydwyf ac fy mod yn debyg ac yn wahanol i eraill.
translation.en: I can show an awareness of who I am and that I am similar and different to others.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod rhai ffactorau sy’n cyfrannu at fy hunaniaeth a gwerthfawrogi’r ffyrdd rwy’n debyg ac yn wahanol i eraill.
translation.en: I can recognise some factors that contribute to my identity and appreciate the ways I am similar and different to others.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro amseroedd, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau arbennig yn fy nghymuned a’r byd ehangach a chyﬂeu fy nheimladau amdanynt.
translation.en: I can explain the importance of special times, events and traditions in my community and in the wider world, and can communicate my feelings about them.

translation.cy: • Ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar y ffordd y mae cymdeithasau yn amrywiol ac yn lluosog.
translation.en: • Enquiries focusing on how societies are diverse and plural.

translation.cy: • Dehongliadau hanesyddol.
translation.en: • Historical interpretations.

translation.en: Expressive Arts

translation.cy: Iechyd a Lles
translation.en: Health and Well-being

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i archwilio ac ymwneud â dathliadau, traddodiadau a ffyrdd o fyw allweddol yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach
translation.en: • opportunities to explore and engage with key celebrations, traditions and ways of life in Wales and the wider world

translation.cy: • ddatblygu map cronolegol o’r gorffennol a chreu cysylltiadau a chyferbyniadau rhwng nodweddion penodol gwahanol gyfnodau
translation.en: • develop a chronological map of the past and compare and contrast characteristic features of different periods

translation.cy: • ymateb yn sensitif i syniadau am gymunedau a diwylliannau.
translation.en: • respond sensitively to ideas about communities and cultures.

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i archwilio ac ymgysylltu â’u cymunedau a thu hwnt, drwy straeon, dathliadau,gwrthrychau, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau, a chyﬂeu eu teimladau amdanynt
translation.en: • opportunities to explore and engage with their communities and beyond, through stories, celebrations, objects, events and traditions, and to communicate their feelings about them

translation.cy: YR HYN SY’N BWYSIG  YN Y DYNIAETHAU
translation.en: WHAT MATTERS IN HUMANITIES

translation.cy: Bydd y Dyniaethau yn gwahodd dysgwyr i uniaethu a mynd i’r afael â heriau a chyﬂeoedd y gorffennol, y presennol a’r dyfodol sy’n eu hwynebu nhw eu hunain, eu cymuned leol, Cymru a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: Humanities will invite learners to identify and engage with past, contemporary and anticipated challenges and opportunities facing themselves, their local community, Wales and the wider world.

translation.cy: Daw dysgwyr hefyd i ddeall cynaliadwyedd economaidd, amgylcheddol a chymdeithasol, cyﬁawnder, rhyng-gysylltedd ac awdurdod, a sylweddoli arwyddocâd byw mewn cymdeithas decach a mwy cynhwysol, ac arwyddocâd cyfrannu at y gymdeithas honno.
translation.en: They will also come to understand the nature of economic, environmental and social sustainability, justice, interconnectedness and authority, and realise the signiﬁcance of living in and contributing to a fairer and more inclusive society.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro effeithiau penderfyniadau a wneir ar lefelau lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang ar bobla’r amgylchedd.
translation.en: I can explain the impacts of decisions made at local, national or global levels on people and the environment.

translation.cy: Gallaf asesu effaith a gwerthuso effeithiolrwydd fy ngweithredoedd arnaf i fy hun ac ar genedlaethau’r dyfodol, gan awgrymu gwelliannau.
translation.en: I can assess the impact and evaluate the effectiveness of my actions on myself and future generations, suggesting improvements.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Gallaf ddadansoddi achosion sylfaenol anghyﬁawnder ac anghydraddoldeb a’r modd y mae llywodraethau a sefydliadau anllywodraethol yn ymateb iddynt.
translation.en: I can analyse the underlying causes of injustice and inequality and how governments and non-government organisations respond to them.

translation.cy: Cysylltiadau o fewn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn
translation.en: Links within this area of learning and experience

translation.cy: • Ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar feithrin dealltwriaeth o’r heriau a’r cyﬂeoedd sy’n wynebu dynoliaeth.
translation.en: • Enquiries focused on developing understanding of challenges and opportunities facing humanity.

translation.cy: • Gwahanol ddehongliadau o’r heriau a’r cyﬂeoedd allweddol sy’n wynebu dynoliaeth.
translation.en: • Differing interpretations of the key challenges and opportunities facing humanity.

translation.cy: Mae cymdeithasau dynol yn gymhleth ac yn amrywiol, ac yn cael eu llywio gan weithredoedd a chredoau pobl.
translation.en: Human societies are complex and diverse, and shaped by human actions and beliefs.

translation.cy: • Ffyrdd o fynegi a chynrychioli’r themâu o hawliau, parch, cydraddoldeb a chyﬁawnder drwy
translation.en: • Ways of expressing and representing the themes of rights, respect, equality and justice through Expressive Arts.

translation.en: • Digital interdependence.

translation.en: justice and equality;

translation.cy: Mae ymwneud â Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol hefyd yn darparu sail ar gyfer dysgu gydol oes, mynediad i yrfaoedd a phroﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith ac, yn y pen draw, gall gyfrannu at economi lewyrchus.
translation.en: Engagement in the Expressive Arts Area of Learning and Experience also provides a basis for lifelong learning, entry into careers and work-related experiences, and can ultimately contribute to a thriving economy.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn datblygu talentau a sgiliausy’n hanfodol i ddyfodol a ffyniant Cymru.
translation.en: Learners will develop talents and skills that are fundamental to Wales’ future and prosperity.

translation.en: I can use research of a range of techniques, materials and resources, tools and technologies to positively inﬂuence my creative works and demonstrate my understanding of traditions, forms, styles and genres.

translation.en: I can create, produce, share and perform work showing an awareness of artistic intention and of audience.

translation.en: Within the Curriculum for Wales 2022 guidance, achievement outcomes are statements made from the learner’s perspective and expressed in terms such as ‘I have …’ and ‘I can …’ and provide descriptions of learning as broad expectations over two to three years.

translation.en: In developing Curriculum for Wales 2022 guidance, pioneer groups used the concepts of deep or secure learning which means learning that brings together a breadth of knowledge and skills which the learners can use and apply in new and challenging contexts.

translation.cy: O fewn canllawiau Cwricwlwm i Gymru 2022, nid yw’r deilliannau cyﬂawniad a fynegir ar gyfer pob cam cynnydd wedi’u bwriadu i fod y model ‘fﬁt orau’, hynny yw ni ddylid eu defnyddio fel meini prawf unigol ar gyfer barnu cyﬂawniad cyffredinol.
translation.en: Within Curriculum for Wales 2022 guidance, achievement outcomes articulated for each progression step are not designed to be used as a ‘best-ﬁt’ model, which means they should not be used as individual criterion to judge overall achievement.

translation.en: The way we plan our capital investment decisions can have a big impact on the economy, help different organisations to deliver their services in a single place, and minimise the individual’s need to travel.

translation.cy: Bydd y manteision economaidd yn aros yng Nghymru, ond gall ein pŵer prynu fod yn sbardun i greu mwy o werth ychwanegol i fusnesau sy’n perfformio’n dda, a hefyd i’w cadwyni cyflenwi, sy’n gallu allforio cynhyrchion ymhellach.
translation.en: The economic benefits will stay in Wales, but our buying power can act as a springboard to develop greater added value to high performing businesses, and their supply chains, who can export products further afield.

translation.cy: Bydd sgiliau o ansawdd uchel, rôl allweddol dinasoedd wrth sbarduno twf, a’r seilwaith digidol a thrafnidiaeth gywir oll yn ein helpu i gyflawni’r nod hwn.
translation.en: High quality skills, the key role of cities as engines of growth, and the right digital and transport infrastructure will all help us in achieving this goal.

translation.en: use our business support to build capacity and innovation within our home grown businesses including local supply chains, to enable more to be procured from businesses in Wales.

translation.cy: Rhaid inni ganolbwyntio ar gryfderau pob rhan o Gymru a’u defnyddio i sbarduno twf, gan sicrhau ein bod yn manteisio ar gyfleoedd newydd ac yn cefnogi canolfannau twf rhanbarthol cryfach.
translation.en: We must focus on the strengths of each part of Wales and use these as a springboard for growth, while ensuring that emerging opportunities are grasped and supporting stronger, regional centres of growth.

translation.cy: manteisio ar y cyfleoedd a ddaw yn sgil prosiectau seilwaith mawr, megis Wylfa Newydd a Morlyn Llanw Bae Abertawe.
translation.en: harness the opportunities of major infrastructure projects, such as Wylfa Newydd and Swansea Bay Tidal Lagoon.

translation.cy: Dim ond drwy arloesi y gall busnesau addasu a bod yn fwy cynhyrchiol a chynaliadwy.
translation.en: It is only through innovation that businesses can adapt and improve their productivity and sustainability.

translation.cy: Ar yr un pryd, mae angen inni greu amgylchedd sy’n meithrin busnesau’r dyfodol, ac sy’n ymateb i’r angen i ddatblygu mwy ar yr economi carbon isel.
translation.en: At the same time, we need to create an environment that nurtures the businesses of the future, and responds to the need to further develop a low carbon economy.

translation.cy: gweithio gyda phawb a fydd yn cael eu heffeithio i baratoi ar gyfer byd y tu allan i’r Undeb Ewropeaidd ac ar gyfer sector amaethyddol cadarn.
translation.en: work with everyone affected to prepare for a world outside of the European Union and for a resilient agricultural sector.

translation.cy: Ceir hefyd nifer o enghreifftiau o arloesi ar lefel leol o ran integreiddio a darparu gwasanaethau. Ond er mwyn sicrhau cynaliadwyedd hirdymor, mae angen cyflwyno modelau ar lefel ranbarthol neu genedlaethol lle gellir gwella’r gofal a ddarperir yn sylweddol yn y tymor hir.
translation.en: There are also many examples of local innovation in terms of integration and service delivery, but in terms of long-term sustainability, there is a need to accelerate a smaller number of models on a regional or national basis where the delivery of care can be significantly improved for the long-term.

translation.cy: Rhaid cyflymu’r newid hwn er mwyn sicrhau nad yw ysbytai ond yn trin cyflyrau nad oes modd eu trin mewn mannau eraill.
translation.en: This shift must accelerate, to ensure that hospitals are treating only conditions that cannot be dealt with elsewhere.

translation.cy: integreiddio iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol ymhellach, gan adeiladu ar waith yr Adolygiad Seneddol o Iechyd a Gofal Cymdeithasol, a chyhoeddi cynllun hirdymor ar gyfer y GIG a gofal cymdeithasol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: further integrate health and social care, building on the work of the Parliamentary Review into Health and Social Care, and publish a long term plan for the NHS and social care in Wales.

translation.cy: newid y modd y darperir gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal drwy eu darparu o fewn cymunedau ac mewn mannau heblaw ysbytai, gan newid y pwyslais o drin salwch i lesiant.
translation.en: deliver a tangible shift in the provision of health and care services into communities, and away from hospitals, and shift the emphasis from treating illness to well-being.

translation.cy: buddsoddi mewn cartrefi i’w gwneud yn gynhesach ac i sicrhau eu bod yn defnyddio ynni’n fwy effeithlon, er mwyn gwella iechyd a lleihau costau tanwydd.
translation.en: invest in homes to improve their warmth and energy efficiency, to improve health and reduce the costs of fuel.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r sgiliau a ddysgir yn yr ysgol fod yn sylfaen gadarn a pharatoi pobl ifanc ar gyfer bywyd.
translation.en: Skills learned in school must be a solid foundation, and equip young people for life.

translation.cy: Yn y tymor hwy, mae angen y cydbwysedd priodol o sgiliau a chyfleoedd ar economi Cymru. Ni ellir ond sicrhau hynny drwy bartneriaeth rhwng ysgolion, colegau, prifysgolion a busnesau.
translation.en: In the longer term, the Welsh economy requires the right balance of skills and opportunities, which can only be delivered through partnership between schools, colleges, universities and businesses.

translation.cy: Mae angen yr ysbryd uchelgeisiol ac entrepreneuraidd cywir i droi’r ymchwil honno’n werth economaidd i Gymru.
translation.en: Converting that research into economic value for Wales also requires the right ambitious and entrepreneurial spirit.

translation.cy: Dylai taith addysgol plentyn fod yn un o adegau mwyaf cyfoethog a gwerthfawr ei fywyd.
translation.en: A child’s educational journey should be one of the most enriching and rewarding times of their life.

translation.cy: Mae angen system addysg sy’n herio’r rheini sy’n cyflawni ar lefel uwch, ond nad yw’n gadael unrhyw blentyn ar ôl.
translation.en: We need an education system that stretches high achievers, and leaves no child behind.

translation.cy: Rôl y llywodraeth yw cefnogi dyheadau pawb, a gweithio gyda busnesau a darparwyr addysg a sgiliau i gynnig yr ystod gywir o gyfleoedd i bawb.
translation.en: The role of government is to support everyone’s aspirations, and work with businesses and education and skills providers to put in place the right range of opportunities for all.

translation.cy: Yn hanesyddol, mae addysg bellach yng Nghymru wedi cael ei ddarparu o fewn cymunedau, ac wedi darparu cyfleoedd i unigolion ddatblygu ac i wireddu eu huchelgais.
translation.en: Further education in Wales has historically been at the heart of communities, and provided opportunities for individuals to build and fulfil their ambitions.

translation.cy: darparu llwybrau datblygu cydlynol drwy a rhwng y sectorau addysg ôl-16 gwahanol, fel bod llwybr dysgu’r unigolyn yn diwallu ei anghenion a’i ddyheadau yn hytrach na chael ei ddiffinio gan ffiniau artiffisial rhwng llwybrau academaidd a galwedigaethol.
translation.en: deliver coherent progression through and between the different post 16 education sectors, so that the individual’s learning pathway meets their needs and aspirations and is not defined by artificial boundaries between academic and vocational routes.

translation.cy: Mae dysgu gydol oes yn bwysicach nag erioed ar gyfer ffyniant cenedlaethol a datblygiad unigolion.
translation.en: Lifelong learning has never been more important, both for national prosperity and individual development.

translation.cy: Unedig a Chysylltiedig
translation.en: United and Connected

translation.cy: Ni all y llywodraeth greu cymunedau, ond yn yr un modd â chyda’r economi, gallwn greu amgylchedd a fydd yn ehangu ac yn dyfnhau’r cysylltiadau hynny.
translation.en: Government cannot create communities, but just as with the economy, we can foster environments where these links are broadened and deepened.

translation.cy: datblygu cymunedau’n lleoedd sy’n cefnogi gwell iechyd a llesiant gan ddefnyddio dulliau fel presgripsiynu cymdeithasol.
translation.en: build the capacity of communities as places which support better health and well-being using approaches such as social prescribing.

translation.cy: treialu diwygiadau i’r broses ddemocrataidd, gan foderneiddio’r broses etholiadol a chefnogi pleidleisiau ar gyfer pobl 16 oed a hŷn.
translation.en: trial reforms to the democratic process, modernising the elections process and backing votes for those aged 16 and over.

translation.cy: Darparu seilwaith modern a chysylltiedig
translation.en: Deliver modern and connected infrastructure

translation.cy: yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i awdurdodau lleol, cyrff iechyd, cymdeithasau tai a phartneriaid allweddol eraill gynllunio cartrefi, cyfleusterau a seilwaith newydd mewn ffordd gydgysylltiedig.
translation.en: require co-ordinated planning of new homes, facilities and infrastructure by local authorities, health bodies, housing associations and other key partners.

translation.cy: parhau i ddatblygu Metro Gogledd Cymru a byddwn yn gwella trafnidiaeth mewn ffyrdd a fydd yn ei ategu.
translation.en: continue to develop the North Wales Metro and deliver transport improvements that complement it.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn sicrhau bod Cymru yn parhau i droi ei golygon  tuag allan a’u bod yn parhau  i chwarae rhan lawn ar y llwyfan Ewropeaidd a’r llwyfan byd-eang, gan feithrin cysylltiadau newydd ym  maes masnach a buddsoddi,  a hyrwyddo’r agweddau gorau ar ein cenedl ledled y byd.
translation.en: We will ensure Wales remains outward-looking and fully engaged on the European and global stage, fostering new relationships for trade and investment, and promoting the best of our nation world-wide.

translation.cy: Mae ymadael â’r UE yn newid ein hamgylchedd rhyngwladol yn sylfaenol.
translation.en: EU exit marks a fundamental shift in our international environment.

translation.cy: O fynd ati’n fwy egnïol i hyrwyddo Cymru, gallwn fanteisio i’r eithaf ar y cyfleoedd economaidd sydd ar gael inni, a helpu i sicrhau bod Cymru yn cadw’r manteision cystadleuol sydd ganddi ar hyn o bryd, ar ôl i’r DU adael yr UE.
translation.en: Promoting Wales with renewed energy will make the most of our economic opportunities, and help maintain Wales’ current competitive advantages after EU exit.

translation.en: modernise our global digital presence through a new digital gateway at wales.com, comprising of a network of integrated, international websites that promote a consistent story about Wales.

translation.cy: Rhieni sy’n cael y dylanwad mwyaf ar eu plant, a hynny o bell ffordd, ond gall rhianta, ar brydiau, fod yn brofiad sy’n llethu pobl.
translation.en: Parents have by far the greatest influence on their children, but it can at times be an overwhelming experience.

translation.cy: Dyna pryd y mae angen i gymorth a chefnogaeth fod wrth law, i’w helpu i greu amgylchedd lle mae eu plant yn cael eu cefnogi a’u cyfoethogi.
translation.en: This is when help and support needs to be on hand, in order to help them create supportive and enriching environments for their children.

translation.cy: deddfu i wahardd cosbi plant yn gorfforol.
translation.en: legislate to ban the physical punishment of children.

translation.cy: Pryd bynnag y bo modd, byddwn yn mynd i’r afael â’r hyn sydd wrth wraidd digartrefedd, gan gydnabod bod gan waith i’w atal ran fawr i’w chwarae er mwyn osgoi’r dirywiad graddol sy’n ganlyniad i golli cartref.
translation.en: Wherever possible, we will tackle the root causes of homelessness, recognising that prevention plays a major part in avoiding the spiral of decline caused by losing a home.

translation.cy: Mae angen y math priodol o dai arnom yn y mannau priodol ac mae angen iddynt weddu i anghenion pobl.
translation.en: We need the right kind of housing in the right place that matches people’s needs.

translation.cy: ei gwneud yn haws i bobl fforddio prynu cartref drwy’r cynllun Cymorth i Brynu a’r cynllun Rhentu i Brynu ac yn sicrhau, drwy’r cynllun Cymorth Prynu, fod modd i bobl prynu cartref mewn ardaloedd gwledig lle mae tai’n ddrud.
translation.en: make buying a home more affordable through the Help to Buy scheme and Rent to Own scheme and bring buying a home in high cost rural areas within reach of local people through Homebuy.

translation.cy: Rydym am weld sector gofal cymdeithasol cynaliadwy a safonol yng Nghymru, lle mae gwasanaethau ataliol ac integredig yn cael eu darparu yn y gymuned, gan helpu pobl i fyw bywydau annibynnol.
translation.en: We want Wales to have a high quality and sustainable social care sector, with preventative and integrated services in the community, supporting people to lead independent lives.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn fodd i leihau camdriniaeth ac esgeulustod ac yn golygu nad oes angen gofal ar gynifer o bobl.
translation.en: It also reduces abuse and neglect and leaves fewer people needing care.

translation.cy: Dylent fedru disgwyl i bobl wrando arnynt a dylent gael help llaw i feithrin perthynas gadarnhaol â phobl eraill.
translation.en: They should expect to be listened to and be helped to develop positive relationships.

translation.cy: sefydlu canolfannau lle bydd gwasanaethau cymorth, cyngor a thriniaeth yn cael eu cyd-leoli, gan fanteisio ar dechnolegau newydd arloesol.
translation.en: establish centres to co-locate support, advice and treatment services, taking advantage of innovative new technologies.

translation.cy: helpu darparwyr gofal i greu modelau gweithredu busnes cynaliadwy yng nghalon ein cymunedau, gan gynnwys manteisio ar gyngor a chymorth oddi wrth Busnes Cymru a Banc Datblygu Cymru.
translation.en: assist care providers to create sustainable business operation models in the heart of our communities, including advice and support from Business Wales and the Development Bank of Wales.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, pan fo angen cymorth mwy dwys ar bobl, mae angen system sydd ar gael yn hwylus ac sy’n hoelio sylw ar adnabod a thrin y cyflwr cyn  gynted ag y bo modd, cyn i faterion fynd i’r pen.
translation.en: However, when more intensive support is needed, we need a system which is easily accessible, and focused on identifying and treating as early as possible, before crisis point is reached.

translation.en: Older People

translation.en: deliver a new community perinatal mental health service and review the need for inpatient facilities in Wales, to stop post natal depression worsening and to allow mothers to form a strong early bond with their child.

translation.cy: Mae sgiliau da yn datgloi twf ac arloesedd mewn busnesau, sy’n golygu bod angen iddynt fedru recriwtio gweithwyr â’r sgiliau iawn.
translation.en: Good skills unlock growth and innovation for businesses, which means they need to be able to recruit workers with the right skills.

translation.cy: Mae cyfrifoldeb ar fusnesau hefyd i fuddsoddi yn eu gweithlu er eu budd eu hunain, ac er budd eu gweithwyr a’r economi ehangach.
translation.en: Businesses also have a responsibility to invest in their workforce to benefit themselves, their workers and the wider economy.

translation.en: The Explanatory Notes are not meant to be a comprehensive description of the contents of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ddeddf yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch dehongli a gweithredu deddfwriaeth Cymru, ac yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r Cwnsler Cyffredinol a Gweinidogion Cymru gymryd camau i wella hygyrchedd cyfraith Cymru:
translation.en: The Act makes provision about the interpretation and operation of Welsh legislation, and requires the Counsel General and the Welsh Ministers to take steps to improve the accessibility of Welsh law:

translation.cy: Yn benodol, argymhellodd fod Llywodraeth Cymru yn datblygu cynllun hirdymor ar gyfer cydgrynhoi deddfau Cymru, a bod y Cwnsler Cyffredinol yn gweithio tuag at lunio Deddf Dehongli ar wahân i Gymru.
translation.en: In particular, it recommended that the Welsh Government develop a long-term plan for consolidating the law in Wales, and that the Counsel General work towards producing a separate Welsh interpretation Act.

translation.cy: Yn ei adroddiad Ffurf a Hygyrchedd y Gyfraith sy’n Gymwys yng Nghymru (Comisiwn y Gyfraith Rhif 336, Mehefin 2016), argymhellodd Comisiwn y Gyfraith y dylai Llywodraeth Cymru ddilyn polisi o gydgrynhoi a chodeiddio’r gyfraith yng Nghymru.
translation.en: In its report Form and Accessibility of the Law Applicable in Wales (Law Com No 336, June 2016), the Law Commission recommended that the Welsh Government should pursue a policy of consolidating and codifying the law in Wales.

translation.cy: Ystyried Deddf ddehongli i Gymru (WG 32209, Mehefin 2017), a oedd yn ceisio barn ar fanteision cael Deddf Dehongli ar wahân i Gymru ac ar ddull gweithredu Deddf o’r fath.
translation.en: Considering an interpretation Act for Wales (WG 32209, June 2017), seeking views on the benefits of having a separate Welsh Interpretation Act and on the approach that such an Act should take.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn golygu y bydd rhwymedigaeth y Cwnsler Cyffredinol i gadw hygyrchedd cyfraith Cymru o dan adolygiad yn berthnasol pan fydd Gweinidogion Cymru yn ystyried pa un ai i gynnig deddfwriaeth newydd.
translation.en: It also means that the Counsel General’s obligation to keep the accessibility of Welsh law under review will be relevant when the Welsh Ministers are considering whether to propose new legislation.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, nid yw hyn yn golygu y byddai rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru ddeddfu mewn ffordd benodol mewn unrhyw achos unigol.
translation.en: This does not, however, mean that the Welsh Ministers would have to legislate in a particular way in any individual case.

translation.cy: Mae hyn hefyd yn cynnwys argaeledd deunydd esboniadol neu sylwebaeth arall sy’n gallu helpu pobl i ddeall y gyfraith.
translation.en: This also includes the availability of other explanatory material or commentary that can help people to understand the law.

translation.cy: Dim ond mân ddiwygiadau, os oes unrhyw ddiwygiadau o gwbl, y mae hyn yn eu golygu i sylwedd y gyfraith a gydgrynhoir.
translation.en: This involves no or only minor amendments to the substance of the law consolidated.

translation.cy: Felly, nid un offeryn deddfwriaethol fyddai Cod (yn gyffredinol) ond yn hytrach gasgliad o ddeddfiadau o dan un enw cyffredinol sy’n eu dwyn ynghyd.
translation.en: Therefore a Code would not (generally) be one legislative instrument but rather a collection of enactments under a unifying overarching title.

translation.cy: Agwedd allweddol ar hyn fydd cydgrynhoi’r gyfraith yn ddwyieithog fel bod llawer mwy o’r gyfraith y mae’r Cynulliad Cenedlaethol a Llywodraeth Cymru yn gyfrifol amdani yn cael ei gwneud yn Gymraeg.
translation.en: A key aspect of this will be consolidating the law bilingually so that much more of the law for which the National Assembly and Welsh Government are responsible is made in Welsh.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 2 o’r Ddeddf yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch dehongli a gweithredu deddfwriaeth a wneir gan Gynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru neu o dan bwerau y mae wedi eu rhoi, ac is-ddeddfwriaeth arall a wneir gan Weinidogion Cymru ac awdurdodau Cymreig datganoledig eraill.
translation.en: Part 2 of the Act makes provision about the interpretation and operation of legislation made by the National Assembly for Wales or under powers it has conferred, and other subordinate legislation made by the Welsh Ministers and other devolved Welsh authorities.

translation.cy: Bydd Deddf 1978 yn parhau i fod yn gymwys i ddeddfwriaeth sydd wedi ei gwneud cyn i Ran 2 ddod i rym.
translation.en: The 1978 Act will continue to apply to legislation that has been made before Part 2 comes into force.

translation.cy: Dim ond i ddeddfwriaeth a wneir ar ôl i Ran 2 ddod i rym (ac i’r Ddeddf ei hun) y bydd Rhan 2 yn gymwys.
translation.en: Part 2 will apply only to legislation made after Part 2 comes into force (and to the Act itself).

translation.cy: Ni fydd dim yn Rhan 2 yn newid ystyr nac effaith y Ddeddf gan Senedd y DU y gwneir yr is-ddeddfwriaeth odani.
translation.en: Nothing in Part 2 will change the meaning or effect of the Act of Parliament under which the subordinate legislation is made.

translation.cy: Hyd yn oed pan fo Rhan 2 yn gymwys i Ddeddf Cynulliad neu is-offeryn Cymreig (h.y. fe’i deddfir ar ôl i Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf hon ddod i rym), caniateir addasu neu eithrio rhai o’r rheolau yn Rhan 2 mewn perthynas â’r Ddeddf benodol neu’r offeryn penodol.
translation.en: Even where Part 2 applies to an Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument (i.e. it is enacted after Part 2 of this Act comes into force), some of the rules in Part 2 may be modified or excluded in relation to the particular Act or instrument.

translation.cy: Adran 5 – Statws cyfartal testunau Cymraeg a Saesneg
translation.en: Section 5 – Equal status of Welsh and English language texts

translation.cy: Y termau sydd wedi eu rhestru yn Atodlen 1 yw’r rhai y disgwylir iddynt gael eu defnyddio yn neddfwriaeth Cymru ac iddynt fod ag ystyr cyson.
translation.en: The terms listed in Schedule 1 are ones that are expected to be used in Welsh legislation and to have a consistent meaning.

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Deddfwriaeth (Cymru) 2019 (dccc 4) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 10 Medi 2019
translation.en: These notes refer to the Legislation (Wales) Act 2019 (anaw 4) which received Royal Assent on 10 September 2019

translation.cy: O dan adran 42 o’r Ddeddf, byddai’r pŵer hwn yn ddarostyngedig i’r weithdrefn gadarnhaol.
translation.en: Under section 42 of the Act, this power would be subject to the affirmative procedure.

translation.cy: Mae hyn felly yn dileu’r angen i ddeddfwriaeth ddefnyddio ymadroddion megis “person neu bersonau” yn y rhan fwyaf o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: It therefore removes the need for legislation to use phrases like “a person or persons” in most contexts.

translation.cy: Mater i Ddeddfau ac offerynnau unigol yw penderfynu a ganiateir y dulliau cyflwyno hynny, neu unrhyw ddulliau eraill, mewn cyd-destunau penodol.
translation.en: It is for individual Acts and instruments to determine whether those methods of service, or any others, are permitted in particular contexts.

translation.cy: Bwriedir i hyn olygu bod cyfeiriad post y derbynnydd bwriadedig yn ymddangos yn gywir ar y llythyr.
translation.en: This is intended to mean that the postal address of the intended recipient appears correctly on the letter.

translation.cy: Bwriedir i’r cysyniad hwn weithredu gydag unrhyw wasanaeth post y caniateir ei ddefnyddio, gan gynnwys cyflwyno drwy ddefnyddio post dosbarth cyntaf neu ail ddosbarth, neu ryw ddull arall o bost wedi ei hwyluso.
translation.en: This concept is intended to operate with any postal service that may be used, including service using first class or second class post, or some other means of expedited postal delivery.

translation.cy: Ym mhob achos, pan ddefnyddir post, gall yr anfonwr bennu’r diwrnod y bernir bod y ddogfen wedi ei chyflwyno drwy gyfeirio at amseroedd danfon arferol ar gyfer y gwasanaeth a ddewisir.
translation.en: In each case, when post is used, the sender can determine the day on which service is deemed to take place by reference to normal delivery times for the service chosen.

translation.cy: Mae adran 14 yn darparu ar gyfer y “diwrnod” pan fernir bod dogfen wedi ei chyflwyno, am mai cyfnodau o ddiwrnodau cyfan yw’r cyfnodau o amser a bennir yn neddfwriaeth Cymru fel arfer.
translation.en: Section 14 provides for the “day” on which service is deemed to take place, because periods of time specified in Welsh legislation are normally periods of whole days.

translation.cy: Adran 16 – Arfer pŵer neu ddyletswydd nad yw mewn grym
translation.en: Section 16 –Exercise of a power or duty that is not in force

translation.cy: Yn rhinwedd is-adran (1)(a), mae’r adran yn gymwys i ddarpariaethau Deddfau’r Cynulliad os deuant i rym ar adeg a bennir yn y Ddeddf ac sy’n fwy nag un diwrnod ar ôl diwrnod y Cydsyniad Brenhinol (ond nid yw’n gymwys i ddarpariaethau a ddaw i rym yn gynt neu a ddygir i rym drwy orchymyn neu reoliadau).
translation.en: By virtue of subsection (1)(a), the section applies to provisions of Assembly Acts if they come into force at a time which is specified in the Act and is more than one day after the day of Royal Assent (but not to provisions which come into force sooner or are brought into force by order or regulations).

translation.cy: Mae adran 16(5) yn ei gwneud yn glir bod unrhyw gyfyngiadau neu amodau a fyddai’n gymwys i arfer y pŵer neu gyflawni’r ddyletswydd pe bai’r Ddeddf neu’r offeryn mewn grym yn llawn hefyd yn gymwys pan gaiff y pŵer neu’r ddyletswydd ei arfer neu ei harfer gan ddibynnu ar adran 16.
translation.en: Section 16(5) makes it clear that any limitations or conditions which would apply to the exercise of the power or discharge of the duty if the Act or instrument were fully in force also apply when the power or duty is exercised in reliance on section 16.

translation.cy: Adran 17 – Cynnwys darpariaethau machlud a darpariaethau adolygu mewn is-ddeddfwriaeth
translation.en: Section 17 – Inclusion of sunset provisions and review provisions in subordinate legislation

translation.cy: Mae adran 17 yn gymwys i bwerau a dyletswyddau i wneud is-ddeddfwriaeth o dan Ddeddfau’r Cynulliad a gaiff y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar ôl i Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf ddod i rym.
translation.en: Section 17 applies to powers and duties to make subordinate legislation under Assembly Acts that receive Royal Assent after Part 2 of the Act comes into force.

translation.cy: Mae adran 18 yn gymwys pan fo Deddf Cynulliad yn rhoi pŵer neu’n gosod dyletswydd i wneud is-ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: Section 18 applies where an Assembly Act confers a power or imposes a duty to make subordinate legislation.

translation.cy: Yn debyg i adran 17 o’r Ddeddf, ni fydd adran 18 yn gymwys pan fo Gweinidogion Cymru neu awdurdodau Cymreig datganoledig eraill yn gwneud is-ddeddfwriaeth o dan Fesurau’r Cynulliad, o dan Ddeddfau’r Cynulliad a gaiff y Cydsyniad Brenhinol cyn i Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf ddod i rym, neu o dan Ddeddfau Senedd y DU.
translation.en: Like section 17 of the Act, section 18 will not apply where the Welsh Ministers or other devolved Welsh authorities make subordinate legislation under Assembly Measures, under Assembly Acts that receive Royal Assent before Part 2 of the Act comes into force, or under Acts of the UK Parliament.

translation.cy: Pan fo hyn yn digwydd, gall godi cwestiynau ynghylch a fwriedir mewn rhyw ffordd i’r diwygiad neu’r dirymiad gyfyngu ar arfer y pŵer y gwneir yr is-ddeddfwriaeth odano yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Where this happens, it can give rise to questions about whether the amendment or revocation is in some way intended to limit the future exercise of the power under which the subordinate legislation is made.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn cael effaith ac eithrio i’r graddau y mae darpariaeth ddatganedig yn cael ei gwneud i’r gwrthwyneb neu y mae’r cyd-destun yn mynnu fel arall.
translation.en: This section has effect except to the extent that express provision is made to the contrary or the context requires otherwise.

translation.cy: Yn wahanol i’r darpariaethau yn Neddf 1978, mae adran 22 yn cyfeirio at y Ddeddf neu’r Mesur “a gyhoeddir”, yn hytrach nag “a argreffir”.
translation.en: Unlike the provisions in the 1978 Act, section 22 refers to the Act or Measure “published”, rather than “printed”.

translation.cy: Bydd adran 25 yn golygu bod y cyfeiriad hefyd at y ddeddfwriaeth fel y’i diwygir gan unrhyw gyfraith ddomestig arall ar unrhyw bryd.
translation.en: Section 25 will mean that the reference is also to the legislation as amended by any other domestic law at any time.

translation.cy: b. mae Deddf 2 wedyn yn diwygio Deddf 1;c. mae Deddf 3 yn cael ei phasio ar ôl Deddf 2, ac yn cynnwys cyfeiriadau at Ddeddf 1;
translation.en: b. Act 2 subsequently amends Act 1;Act 3 is passed after Act 2, and contains a references to Act 1;

translation.cy: Felly, mae adran 25 yn gymwys i gyfeiriadau at ddeddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir mewn cyfraith ddomestig ar ac ar ôl y diwrnod ymadael.
translation.en: Section 25 therefore applies to references to direct EU legislation retained in domestic law on and after exit day.

translation.cy: Mae adran 25 yn gymwys yn ychwanegol at yr adrannau hynny.
translation.en: Section 25 applies in addition to those sections.

translation.cy: Ond o’r diwrnod ymadael ymlaen, yn lle hynny, byddant yn ddarostyngedig i reoliad 2 o Reoliadau Deddf yr Undeb Ewropeaidd (Ymadael) 2018 (Addasiadau a Diddymiadau a Dirymiadau Canlyniadol) (Ymadael â’r UE) 20199.
translation.en: But from exit day, they will instead be governed by regulation 2 of the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018 (Consequential Modifications and Repeals and Revocations) (EU Exit) Regulations 2019.

translation.cy: Mewn Deddf neu offeryn a ddeddfir ar neu ar ôl y diwrnod ymadael, bydd cyfeiriad at ddarn penodol o ddeddfwriaeth UE yn ddarostyngedig i adran 26 os yw’n cyfeirio at y ddeddfwriaeth fel y mae’n ffurfio rhan o gyfraith yr UE, ac i adran 25 os yw’n cyfeirio at y ddeddfwriaeth fel y mae’n ffurfio rhan o gyfraith ddomestig (a fydd y sefyllfa ddiofyn yn rhinwedd adran 24).
translation.en: In an Act or instrument enacted on or after exit day, a reference to a specific piece of EU legislation will be subject to section 26 if it refers to the legislation as it forms part of EU law, and to section 25 if it refers to the legislation as it forms part of domestic law (which will be the default position by virtue of section 24).

translation.cy: Mae adran 27 yn gymwys pan fo ymddygiad yn drosedd o dan ddwy neu ragor o wahanol Ddeddfau neu offerynnau y mae Rhan 2 yn gymwys iddynt, neu’n drosedd o dan un neu ragor o Ddeddfau neu offerynnau y mae Rhan 2 yn gymwys iddynt yn ogystal â’r gyfraith gyffredin.
translation.en: Section 27 applies where conduct is an offence under two or more different Acts or instruments to which Part 2 applies, or is an offence under one or more Acts or instruments to which Part 2 applies as well as the common law.

translation.cy: Mae adran 27 o’r Ddeddf yn cael effaith ac eithrio i’r graddau y mae darpariaeth ddatganedig yn cael ei gwneud i’r gwrthwyneb neu y mae’r cyd-destun yn mynnu fel arall.
translation.en: Section 27 of the Act has effect except to the extent that express provision is made to the contrary or the context requires otherwise.

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Deddfwriaeth (Cymru) 2019 (dccc 4) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 10 Medi 2019
translation.en: These notes refer to the Legislation (Wales) Act 2019 (anaw 4) which received Royal Assent on 10 September 2019

translation.cy: Yn niffyg darpariaeth ddatganedig sy’n rhwymo’r Goron, mae hyn yn golygu bod angen ystyried a yw Deddf yn rhwymo’r Goron drwy edrych ar y rheol a’i therfynau, a phenderfynu wedyn a yw natur, cyd-destun a chynnwys y Ddeddf o dan sylw yn golygu bod rhaid bod y Cynulliad Cenedlaethol wedi bwriadu i’r Goron gael ei rhwymo.
translation.en: This means that in the absence of an express provision binding the Crown, the question of whether an Act binds the Crown needs to be considered by looking at the rule and its limits, and then determining whether the nature, context and content of the Act in question mean that the National Assembly must have meant for the Crown to be bound.

translation.cy: Yn ymarferol, darperir fel arfer ar gyfer y diwrnod y daw Deddf Cynulliad neu ddarpariaeth mewn Deddf i rym yn y Ddeddf ei hun13, neu rhoddir pŵer i Weinidogion Cymru i’w dwyn i rym ar ddiwrnod penodol drwy wneud gorchymyn (a elwir yn orchymyn cychwyn fel arfer).
translation.en: In practice, the day on which an Assembly Act or a provision in an Act comes into force is usually provided for in the Act itself5, or the Welsh Ministers are given a power to bring it into force on a specific day by making an order (usually known as a commencement order).

translation.cy: Mae’r newid hwn yn dileu’r elfen ôl-weithredol yn adran 4(b) o Ddeddf 1978, a allai achosi problemau yn ymarferol, er enghraifft pe bai Bil yn cael y Cydsyniad Brenhinol yn y prynhawn a oedd yn gymwys yn ôl-weithredol i bethau a wnaed y bore hwnnw.
translation.en: This change removes the element of retrospectivity in section 4(b) of the 1978 Act, which could cause problems in practice, for example if a Bill received Royal Assent in the afternoon and applied retrospectively to things done that morning.

translation.cy: Yn debyg i adran 4(b) o Ddeddf 1978, nid yw adran 30 o’r Ddeddf hon yn gymwys i is-ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: Like section 4(b) of the 1978 Act, section 30 of this Act does not apply to subordinate legislation.

translation.cy: Pan fo un darn o ddeddfwriaeth yn diwygio un arall drwy fewnosod neu amnewid deunydd, gall cwestiynau godi ynghylch a yw’r deunydd hwnnw i’w ddehongli ac a yw effaith i gael ei rhoi iddo fel rhan o’r ddeddfwriaeth a wnaeth y diwygiad, neu fel rhan o’r ddeddfwriaeth y mae’r deunydd wedi ei fewnosod ynddi.
translation.en: Where one piece of legislation amends another by inserting or substituting material, questions may arise as to whether that material is to be interpreted and given effect as part of the legislation which made the amendment, or as part of the legislation into which the material has been inserted.

translation.cy: Mae adran 34 yn gweithredu mewn perthynas â’r un rheol yn y gyfraith gyffredin ag adran 33.
translation.en: Section 34 operates in relation to the same common law rule as section 33.

translation.cy: Yn debyg i adran 33, bydd adran 34 yn gweithredu pan fo Deddf Cynulliad neu is- offeryn Cymreig yn diddymu neu’n dirymu unrhyw Ddeddf Cynulliad neu Fesur Cynulliad, unrhyw Ddeddf gan Senedd y DU, unrhyw ddeddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir, neu unrhyw is-ddeddfwriaeth a wneir o dan unrhyw un neu ragor o’r mathau hynny o ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: Like section 33, section 34 will operate where an Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument repeals or revokes any Assembly Act or Measure, Act of the UK Parliament, retained direct EU legislation, or any subordinate legislation made under any of those kinds of legislation.

translation.cy: Adran 35 – Effaith ailddeddfu
translation.en: Section 35 – Effect of re-enactment

translation.cy: Nid yw adran 17(2) ond yn gweithredu pan ddarperir ar gyfer y diddymiad a’r ailddeddfiad yn yr un Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 17(2) only operates where the repeal and re-enactment are provided for in the same Act.

translation.cy: Mae adran 37 yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch ystyr cyfeiriadau at ddiddymu a dirymu deddfwriaeth yn Rhan 2.
translation.en: Section 37 makes provision about the meaning of references to the repeal and revocation of legislation in Part 2.

translation.cy: Trafodir effeithiau adran 37(2) mewn perthynas â deddfwriaeth dros dro uchod, mewn perthynas ag adrannau 34 i 36.
translation.en: The effects of section 37(2) in relation to temporary legislation are discussed above in relation to sections 34 to 36.

translation.cy: Adran 38 – Pŵer i ddisodli disgrifiadau o ddyddiadau ac amseroedd yn neddfwriaeth Cymru
translation.en: Section 38 – Power to replace descriptions of dates and times in Welsh legislation

translation.cy: Ni chaniateir i’r pŵer yn adran 38(1) gael ei ddefnyddio i newid effaith y ddeddfwriaeth o dan sylw, ond dim ond er mwyn newid y ffordd y mae’r effaith honno yn cael ei mynegi.
translation.en: The power in section 38(1) cannot be used to change the effect of the legislation in question, but only to change the way in which that effect is expressed.

translation.cy: Bydd rheoliadau o dan adran 38(1) yn golygu y bydd pobl sy’n darllen testun cyfredol y ddeddfwriaeth yn gallu deall cyfeiriadau at ddyddiadau neu amseroedd heb yr angen i gyfeirio at ddeddfwriaeth arall neu ddogfennau eraill (megis gorchmynion cychwyn).
translation.en: Regulations under section 38(1) will mean that people reading the up-to-date text of the legislation will be able to understand references to dates or times without needing to refer to other legislation or documents (such as commencement orders).

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai fod yn ddefnyddiol weithiau roi “1 Ionawr 2018 (y diwrnod y daeth adran 10 i rym)” yn lle “y diwrnod y daw adran 10 i rym”.
translation.en: For example, it might sometimes be helpful to replace “the day on which section 10 comes into force” with “1 January 2018 (the day on which section 10 came into force)”.

translation.cy: Pan fo deddfwriaeth arall, offerynnau cyfreithiol neu ddogfennau cyfreithiol yn cynnwys cyfeiriadau at reoliadau, rheolau neu orchmynion a wneir o dan bwerau penodol, mae is-adran (3) yn addasu’r cyfeiriadau hynny i ystyried y posibilrwydd y caniateir i is-ddeddfwriaeth o dan y pwerau hynny gael ei gwneud ar ffurf wahanol o ganlyniad i’r adran hon.
translation.en: Where other legislation, legal instruments or documents contain references to regulations, rules or orders made under particular powers, subsection (3) adapts those references to take account of the possibility that subordinate legislation under those powers may be made in a different form as a result of this section.

translation.cy: Mewn geiriau eraill, caniateir i’r pŵer gael ei ddefnyddio pan fo Gweinidogion Cymru yn gwneud is-ddeddfwriaeth o dan Ddeddf Cynulliad neu Fesur Cynulliad, a phan fônt yn gwneud darpariaeth nad yw’n gymwys ond o ran Cymru o dan Ddeddf gan Senedd y DU neu ddeddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir.
translation.en: In other words, the power can be used where the Welsh Ministers make subordinate legislation under an Assembly Act or Measure, and where they make provision that applies only in relation to Wales under an Act of the UK Parliament or retained direct EU legislation.

translation.cy: Mae’n sicrhau bod yr offeryn yn ddarostyngedig i’r weithdrefn lymaf o’r gweithdrefnau a fyddai fel arall yn gymwys.
translation.en: It ensures that the instrument is subject to the most stringent of the procedures that would otherwise apply.

translation.cy: Mae adran 23B(4) yn ei gwneud yn glir bod adrannau 12 i 14A o Ddeddf 1978 yn parhau i fod yn gymwys i bwerau a dyletswyddau presennol (ac i bwerau a dyletswyddau o dan Ddeddfau gan Senedd y DU yn y dyfodol) sy’n cael eu harfer i wneud is-offerynnau Cymreig ar ôl i Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf hon ddod i rym.
translation.en: Section 23B(4) makes clear that sections 12 to 14A of the 1978 Act continue to apply to existing powers and duties (and powers and duties under future Acts of the UK Parliament) that are exercised to make Welsh subordinate instruments after Part 2 of this Act comes into force.

translation.cy: Gellid dweud hefyd fod y darpariaethau hyn yn anghyson âʼr gosodiad cyffredinol syʼn eu rhagflaenu – sef bod iʼr ddwy iaith statws cyfartal.
translation.en: It could also be said that these provisions are inconsistent with the general proposition that precedes them – namely that both languages have equal status.

translation.cy: Daw’r pŵer yn adran 5(2) a (3) i ddiwygio Atodlen 1 i rym drannoeth y Cydsyniad Brenhinol hefyd, rhag ofn bod angen i’r Atodlen gael ei diwygio cyn iddi ddod i rym yn llawn.
translation.en: The power in section 5(2) and (3) to amend Schedule 1 also comes into force the day after Royal Assent, in case the Schedule needs to be amended before it comes fully into force.

translation.cy: Daw Rhannau 3 a 4 i rym drannoeth y diwrnod y caiff y Ddeddf y Cydsyniad Brenhinol.
translation.en: Parts 3 and 4 come into force the day after the Act receives Royal Assent.

translation.en: (1) Where an Assembly Act or a Welsh subordinate instrument authorises or requires a person (“A”) to serve a document by post on another person (“B”), A serves the document if A properly addresses, pre-pays and posts a letter containing the document to B.

translation.en: (4) The subordinate legislation containing the review provision or sunset provision may provide that the provision applies generally or only in relation to specified provisions of subordinate legislation or specified cases or circumstances.

translation.cy: (1) Caniateir arfer pŵer a roddir gan Ddeddf Cynulliad neu gan is-offeryn Cymreig i roi cyfarwyddydau i amrywio unrhyw gyfarwyddydau neu dynnu’n ôl unrhyw gyfarwyddydau a roddir o dan y pŵer.
translation.en: (1) A power to give directions conferred by an Assembly Act or a Welsh subordinate instrument may be exercised to vary or withdraw any directions given under the power.

translation.cy: (2) Mae dyletswydd i roi cyfarwyddydau a osodir gan Ddeddf Cynulliad neu gan is-offeryn Cymreig yn cynnwys pŵer (sy’n arferadwy yn yr un ffordd ac yn ddarostyngedig i’r un amodau neu gyfyngiadau â’r ddyletswydd) i amrywio, neu dynnu’n ôl a disodli, unrhyw gyfarwyddydau a roddir o dan y ddyletswydd.
translation.en: (2) A duty to give directions imposed by an Assembly Act or a Welsh subordinate instrument includes a power (exercisable in the same way and subject to the same conditions or limitations as the duty) to vary, or withdraw and replace, any directions given under the duty.
