translation.en: The waste producer and the waste holder should manage the waste in a way that guarantees a high level of protection of the environment and human health.

translation.cy: .Mae’r egwyddor fod y llygrwr yn talu’n ymestyn i gostau rheoli gwastraff yn cael eu hysgwyddo yn rhannol neu’n gyfan gwbl gan gynhyrchydd y cynnyrch y deilliodd y gwastraff ohono gyda dosbarthwyr cynnyrch felly o bosibl yn rhannu’r costau hyn.
translation.en: The polluter-pays principle extends to the costs of waste management being be borne partly or wholly by the producer of the product from which the waste came and the distributors of such product potentially sharing these costs.

translation.cy: Mae cyfrifoldeb estynedig y cynhyrchydd yn cynnwys anogaeth i ddylunio’r cynnyrch er mwyn lleihau ei effaith amgylcheddol a chynhyrchu gwastraff yn y broses gynhyrchu.
translation.en: Extended producer responsibility includes the encouragement of the design of products in order to reduce their environmental impacts and the generation of waste in the course of the production.

translation.en: The requirement for the AGW to consent to the transfer or exercise of such functions remains unchanged.

translation.cy: Os yw'r telerau'n cynnwys ffioedd sy'n daladwy i SAC (er enghraifft, ar gyfer darparu gwasanaethau gan ACC i awdurdod perthnasol), rhaid iddynt fod yn unol â'r cynllun codi ffioedd a lunnir o dan adran 24 (gweler isod).

translation.cy: Mae adran 29 yn darparu bod unrhyw ddigollediad i drydydd parti am dordyletswydd (er enghraifft mewn contract neu mewn achos o esgeulustra) gan ACC a benodwyd o dan y Ddeddf hon, person sy'n darparu gwasanaethau i ACC neu SAC (er enghraifft o dan adran 19), cyn-aelodau neu aelodau presennol SAC neu gyflogeion iddi, i'w godi ar CGC a'i dalu ohoni (felly nid yw'r digollediad yn ddarostyngedig i gymeradwyaeth y Cynulliad mewn penderfyniad cyllidebol).
translation.en: Section 29 provides that any compensation to a third party for a breach of a duty (for example in contract or negligence) by an AGW appointed under this Act, a person providing services to the AGW or WAO (for example under section 19), the WAO’s former or current members or employees is to be charged on and paid from the WCF (as such it is not to be subject to the approval of the Assembly in a Budget resolution).

translation.cy: Mae Adran 34 yn rhoi effaith i Atodlen 4 (mân ddiwygiadau a diwygiadau canlyniadol).
translation.en: Section 34 gives effect to Schedule 4 (minor and consequential amendments).

translation.cy: Mae'r paragraff hwn yn cadarnhau y bydd gan SAC 9 aelod, sef 5 nad ydynt yn gyflogeion i SAC (a elwir yn ‘aelodau anweithredol’), ACC a 3 cyflogai i SAC (a elwir yn ‘aelodau sy'n gyflogeion’).
translation.en: This paragraph establishes that the WAO will have 9 members, comprising 5 who are not employees of the WAO (known as ‘non-executive members’), the AGW, and 3 employees of the WAO (known as ‘employee members’).

translation.cy: Cyn gwneud y penodiad hwnnw, rhaid ymgynghori â'r Prif Weinidog.
translation.en: Before making such an appointment, there must be consultation with the First Minister.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r aelodau anweithredol wedyn naill ai benodi’r person hwnnw neu ei gwneud yn ofynnol bod ACC yn argymell person arall, ac felly ymlaen, hyd nes penodir rhywun;
translation.en: The non-executive members must then appoint that person, or require the AGW to recommend another person and so on until someone is appointed;

translation.cy: Nid oes unrhyw ddarpariaeth pensiwn ar gyfer aelod sy'n gyflogai, ond os oes gan aelod sy’n gyflogai bensiwn o ganlyniad i’w gyflogaeth gyda SAC yna bydd ei wasanaeth fel aelod sy'n gyflogai hefyd yn cyfrif tuag at ei hawlogaeth i'r pensiwn hwnnw.
translation.en: There is to be no provision for a pension as employee member but if the persons who are members have a pension as a result of being an employee of the WAO then their service as employee members will also count towards that pension entitlement.

translation.cy: Ymhlith materion eraill mae paragraff 35 yn rhoi’r pŵer i’r archwilydd gasglu gwybodaeth (gan gynnwys dogfennau) sy'n angenrheidiol at y diben o archwilio'r cyfrifon.
translation.en: Amongst other matters, paragraph 35 empowers the auditor to gather information (including documents) necessary for the purpose of auditing the accounts.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn sicrhau bod y person sy'n dal swydd ACC yn ei dal ar y telerau a’r amodau a bennir yn unol â darpariaethau'r Ddeddf hon, gan gynnwys telerau yn ymwneud â thalu cydnabyddiaeth.
translation.en: This will ensure that the person holding office as AGW will hold it on the terms and conditions, including as to remuneration, set in accordance with the provisions of this Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Tai (Cymru) 2014 (dccc 7)
translation.en: These notes refer to the Housing (Wales) Act 2014 (anaw 7)

translation.cy: Cyn dyroddi cod, rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru gymryd camau rhesymol i ymgynghori â phersonau sy’n ymwneud â gosod a rheoli eiddo ar rent a phersonau sy’n meddiannu eiddo o’r fath, neu â phersonau y mae Gweinidogion Cymru yn ystyried eu bod yn cynrychioli barn y personau hynny.
translation.en: Before issuing a code, the Welsh Ministers must take reasonable steps to consult with persons involved in letting and managing rental properties and persons occupying such properties, or with persons who the Welsh Ministers consider to represent the views of those persons.

translation.cy: Nid yw unrhyw doriad o’r Rhan hon o’r Ddeddf yn effeithio ar ddilysrwydd cytundeb tenantiaeth neu orfodadwyedd unrhyw rwymedigaethau o dan gytundeb o’r fath.
translation.en: Any contravention of this Part of the Act does not affect the validity of a tenancy agreement or the enforceability of any obligations under such an agreement.

translation.cy: Rhaid i awdurdod trwyddedu gyhoeddi gwybodaeth am ffurf a chynnwys ceisiadau i fod yn gofrestredig a thrwyddedig a’r wybodaeth sydd i’w darparu wrth wneud ceisiadau o’r fath.
translation.en: A licensing authority must publish information about the form and content of registration and licensing applications and the information which is to be provided when making such applications.

translation.cy: Pan fo darpariaeth yn y Rhan hon yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i berson hysbysu, neu’n ei awdurdodi i hysbysu, person arall am rywbeth neu roi dogfen i’r person hwnnw, gan gynnwys hysbysiad neu gopi o ddogfen, caniateir ei roi neu ei rhoi mewn nifer o ffyrdd.
translation.en: Where a person is required or authorised by a provision of this Part to notify another person of something or to give a document to that person, including a notice or a copy of a document, it may be given in a number of ways.

translation.cy: yn yr achos hwnnw, ei “gyfeiriad cywir” yw cyfeiriad ei swyddfa gofrestredig neu ei brif swyddfa.
translation.en: in which case, its “proper address” is the address of its registered or principal office.

translation.cy: Rhaid i awdurdod tai lleol, yn gyfnodol, ymgymryd ag adolygiadau digartrefedd yn ei ardal.
translation.en: A local housing authority must, periodically, undertake homelessness reviews in its area.

translation.cy: Rhaid i awdurdod tai lleol ymgymryd ag adolygiad digartrefedd a chyhoeddi’r canlyniadau.
translation.en: A local housing authority must undertake a homelessness review and publish the results.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r adolygiad digartrefedd adolygu hefyd yr adnoddau sydd ar gael i’r awdurdod, gan gynnwys y rhai sydd ar gael i’w swyddogaethau nad ydynt yn swyddogaethau tai, yn ogystal â’r rhai sydd ar gael i gyrff cyhoeddus eraill a sefydliadau’r trydydd sector ar gyfer gweithgareddau o’r fath.
translation.en: The homelessness review must also review the resources available to the authority, including those available for its functions other than housing, as well as those available to other public bodies and third sector organisations for such activities.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (3) yn esbonio y gall y strategaeth gynnwys camau y mae’r awdurdod yn disgwyl i awdurdodau cyhoeddus perthnasol eraill eu cymryd a chamau gan unrhyw sefydliad – gwirfoddol neu fel arall – a all gyfrannu at gyflawni’r amcanion.
translation.en: Subsection (3) explains that the strategy can include action that the authority expects other relevant public authorities to take and action by any organisation – voluntary or otherwise – that can contribute to achieving the objectives.

translation.cy: Adran 56 – Ystyr llety sydd ar gael i’w feddiannu
translation.en: Section 56 – Meaning of accommodation available for occupation

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r gwasanaeth ddarparu gwybodaeth a chyngor am ddigartrefedd ac ni ddylai gael ei gyfyngu i’r cymorth sydd ar gael yn ardal yr awdurdod.
translation.en: The service must provide information and advice about homelessness and should not be restricted to what help is available in the authority’s area.

translation.cy: fygythiad o ddigartrefedd o fewn 56 o ddiwrnodau (gweler adran 55) a rhaid iddo gynnwys cynhorthwy i gael gafael ar wasanaethau atal digartrefedd.
translation.en: within 56 days (see section 55) and must include assistance with accessing homelessness prevention services.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (2) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r gwasanaeth gynnwys cyhoeddi gwybodaeth a chyngor am y cymorth sydd ar gael i’r digartref a sut i gael gafael arno.
translation.en: Subsection (2) requires that the service must include publication of information and advice about the help that is available for the homeless and how to access it.

translation.cy: Adran 61 - Cymhwystra am gymorth o dan y Bennod hon
translation.en: Section 61 - Eligibility for help under this Chapter

translation.cy: ac oni fydd yr awdurdod yn caniatáu ar gyfer cyfnod gwahanol, bydd yn rhaid i’r cais gael ei wneud cyn diwedd 21 o ddiwrnodau gan ddechrau gyda’r diwrnod yr hysbysir y ceisydd am y penderfyniad.
translation.en: and unless the authority allows for a different period, the request will have to be made before the end of 21 days beginning with the day the applicant was notified of the decision.

translation.cy: Darperir rhestr o enghreifftiau yn is-adran (2).
translation.en: A list of examples is provided in subsection (2).

translation.cy: Mae adran 79 yn nodi amgylchiadau eraill pan y gallai’r ddyletswydd yn adran 66 ddod i ben.
translation.en: Section 79 sets out other circumstances when the section 66 duty might come to an end.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn caniatáu i Weinidogion Cymru drwy orchymyn ddiwygio neu ddileu unrhyw amodau sy’n ymwneud ag angen blaenoriaethol, gan gynnwys y disgrifiad o bersonau y bernir eu bod mewn angen blaenoriaethol at ddibenion y Bennod hon o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: This allows the Welsh Ministers by order to amend or remove any conditions that relate to priority need, including the description of persons considered to be in priority need for the purposes of this Chapter of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn darparu ar gyfer ceiswyr mewn angen blaenoriaethol na ellid eu cynorthwyo i sicrhau llety o dan adran 73.
translation.en: This section provides for applicants in priority need who could not be helped to secure accommodation under section 73.

translation.cy: Mae is-adrannau (2), (3) a (4) yn disgrifio pryd y bernir bod ceisydd yn ddigartref yn fwriadol ac nad yw’r ddyletswydd i sicrhau llety o dan adran 75(2) felly yn ddyledus iddo.
translation.en: Subsections (2), (3) and (4) describe when an applicant is considered intentionally homeless and is therefore not owed the duty to secure accommodation under section 75(2).

translation.cy: Pan na fo’r dyletswyddau’n gymwys, rhaid i’r awdurdod sy’n ceisio gwneud yr atgyfeiriad sicrhau llety addas i’w feddiannu gan y ceisydd hyd nes y caiff ei hysbysu am y penderfyniad gwirioneddol ynghylch a yw’r amodau ar gyfer atgyfeirio wedi eu bodloni.
translation.en: Where the duties do not apply, the authority seeking to make the referral must secure suitable accommodation for occupation by the applicant until he or she is notified of the actual decision on whether conditions for referral are met.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (4) yn esbonio pryd y caiff hysbysiad ei drin fel un sydd wedi ei roi, os nad yw wedi dod i law ceisydd.
translation.en: Subsection (4) explains when a notice is treated as having been given, if not received by an applicant.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn rhoi hawl i geiswyr ofyn am adolygiad o benderfyniadau a wneir o dan Bennod 2 mewn perthynas â’i achos.
translation.en: This section gives applicants the right to request a review of decisions made under Chapter 2 in relation to his or her case.

translation.cy: Caiff yr awdurdod tai lleol ganiatáu cyfnod hwy ond rhaid rhoi cytundeb i’r cyfnod hwy hwn yn ysgrifenedig.
translation.en: The local housing authority may allow a longer period but agreement to this longer period must be given in writing.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (2) yn rhoi enghreifftiau o’r hyn y caiff rheoliadau ei wneud yn ofynnol neu ddarparu ar ei gyfer.
translation.en: Subsection (2) illustrates what regulations may require or provide.

translation.cy: Caiff llys, mewn apêl, wneud y cyfryw orchymyn i gadarnhau, diddymu neu amrywio penderfyniad a wnaed gan awdurdod tai lleol ag y gwêl yn dda.
translation.en: A court may, on appeal, make such order it thinks fit, confirming, quashing or varying a decision made by a local housing authority.

translation.cy: Yn ddarostyngedig i’r gofyniad hwn, mater i bob awdurdod tai lleol fydd penderfynu pryd y bydd yr asesiadau hyn yn digwydd.
translation.en: Subject to this requirement it will be for each local housing authority to decide when these assessments occur.

translation.en: Section 102 – Report following assessment

translation.cy: Rhaid i awdurdod gyflwyno ei adroddiad i Weinidogion Cymru ei gymeradwyo.
translation.en: An authority must submit its report to the Welsh Ministers for approval.

translation.cy: Mae “swyddogaethau” at y diben hwn yn cynnwys unrhyw swyddogaethau a roddir iddo heblaw yn rhinwedd ei swyddogaeth fel awdurdod tai lleol (mae awdurdodau tai lleol yng Nghymru yn gynghorau sir neu’n gynghorau bwrdeistref sirol sy’n arfer ystod o swyddogaethau sy’n ymdrin ag amryw o faterion).
translation.en: “Functions” for this purpose includes any functions conferred upon it other than in its capacity as a local housing authority (local housing authorities in Wales are county or county borough councils which exercise a range of functions dealing with a variety of matters).

translation.en: PART 4 STANDARDS FOR SOCIAL HOUSING

translation.cy: Rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru gyhoeddi’r holl ganllawiau a hysbysiadau a roddir o dan yr adran hon.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers must publish all guidance and notices given under this section.

translation.cy: Adran 113 – Ymgynghori ar safonau a chanllawiau
translation.en: Section 113 – Consultation on standards and guidance

translation.cy: cyrff sy’n cynrychioli buddiannau awdurdodau tai lleol;
translation.en: bodies that represent the interests of local housing authorities;

translation.cy: ac unrhyw bersonau eraill y mae Gweinidogion Cymru yn credu ei bod yn briodol ymgynghori â hwy.
translation.en: and any other persons the Welsh Ministers think it appropriate to consult.

translation.cy: Pan fo gan Weinidogion Cymru y p*er i ymyrryd o dan y Rhan hon, nid ydynt wedi eu cyfyngu i gymryd y camau a bennir mewn hysbysiad rhybuddio (a roddir o dan adran 118).
translation.en: Where the Welsh Ministers have the power to intervene under this Part they are not limited to taking the action stipulated in a warning notice (given under section 118).

translation.cy: Caniateir i gyfarwyddiadau neu arweiniadau gael eu rhoi mewn cysylltiad â phwerau neu ddyletswyddau sy’n arferadwy fel rheol yn ddarostyngedig i farn yr awdurdod neu farn ei swyddogion.
translation.en: Directions or instructions may be given in respect of powers or duties which are normally exercisable subject to the authority’s opinion or the opinion of its officers.

translation.cy: Os câi awdurdod ei gyfarwyddo i arfer y p*er gan y Gweinidogion, byddai’n rhaid iddo arfer y p*er ni waeth beth fo’i farn am debygrwydd sicrhau’r canlyniad o dan sylw.
translation.en: If an authority were directed to exercise the power by Ministers, it would have to exercise of the power irrespective of its opinion about the likelihood of achieving the outcome in question.

translation.cy: Caiff y pwerau sydd ar gael o dan yr adran hon gael eu harfer gan unrhyw un o’r personau a grybwyllir yn is-adran (2).
translation.en: The powers available under this section may be exercised by any of the persons mentioned in subsection (2).

translation.cy: Adran 129 – Cymhwyso dyletswyddau sy’n ymwneud â ffioedd gwasanaeth i denantiaethau awdurdod lleol
translation.en: Section 129 – Application of duties relating to service charges to local authority tenancies

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 6 (Cyllid Tai) o Ddeddf Llywodraeth Leol a Thai 1989 i’w diwygio er mwyn diddymu’r cymhorthdal sy’n daladwy mewn perthynas â Chyfrifon Refeniw Tai, sy’n cael eu cynnal gan awdurdodau tai lleol o dan y Ddeddf honno.
translation.en: Part 6 (Housing Finance) of the Local Government and Housing Act 1989 is to be amended so as to abolish the subsidy payable in relation to Housing Revenue Accounts, which are maintained by local housing authorities under that Act.

translation.cy: Mae gan Weinidogion Cymru bwerau i ddyroddi dyfarniad, sy’n nodi cyfrifiad a swm ‘taliad setlo’ ar gyfer pob awdurdod tai lleol sy’n cadw Cyfrif Refeniw Tai.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers have powers to issue a determination, which sets out the calculation and amount of a ‘settlement payment’ for each local housing authority that keeps a Housing Revenue Account.

translation.cy: Gan fod Gweinidogion Cymru ar hyn o bryd yn cael Cymhorthdal Cyfrif Refeniw Tai negyddol oddi wrth bob awdurdod tai lleol, bydd yn ofynnol wedyn i awdurdod tai lleol wneud taliad setlo i Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: As the Welsh Ministers currently receive negative Housing Revenue Account Subsidy from each local housing authority then a local housing authority will be required to make a settlement payment to the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Gall dyfarniad o dan yr adran hon gael ei amrywio neu ei ddirymu gan ddyfarniad dilynol.
translation.en: A determination under this section can be varied or revoked by a subsequent determination.

translation.cy: Mae Atodlen 2 i Ddeddf 1988 Act wedi ei diwygio hefyd i ychwanegu sail dros feddiannu tenantiaeth sicr a roddir gan gymdeithas dai gwbl gydfuddiannol.
translation.en: Schedule 2 to the 1988 Act is also amended to add a ground for possession of an assured tenancy granted by a fully mutual housing association.

translation.cy: Ni chaniateir defnyddio’r sail hon oni bai bod y gymdeithas yn rhoi i’w aelod-denant hysbysiad y gallai’r sail hon fod yn gymwys cyn bod y denantiaeth yn cael ei rhoi.
translation.en: This ground may not be used unless the association gives its tenant member a notice that this ground might apply before the tenancy is granted.

translation.cy: Diffinnir annedd wag hirdymor (“long-term empty dwelling”) fel un sydd wedi bod heb ei meddiannu a heb fawr o ddodrefn am gyfnod parhaus o flwyddyn o leiaf.
translation.en: A “long-term empty dwelling” is defined as one that has been both unoccupied and substantially unfurnished for a continuous period of at least one year.

translation.cy: Diffinnir ail gartref (“second home”) fel cartref nad yw’n unig neu brif breswylfa person ac sydd i raddau helaeth wedi ei ddodrefnu.
translation.en: A “second home” is defined as a home that is not a person’s sole or main residence and which is substantially furnished.

translation.cy: Y tro cyntaf y mae awdurdod bilio yn penderfynu codi premiwm treth gyngor ar ail gartrefi, rhaid iddo wneud ei ddyfarniad o leiaf blwyddyn cyn dechrau’r flwyddyn ariannol y codir y premiwm arnynt ynddi.
translation.en: On the first occasion that a billing authority decides to charge a second homes council tax premium, it must make its determination at least one year before the beginning of the financial year in which the premium will be charged.

translation.cy: gan hynny, mae is-adran (2) yn darparu ar gyfer ei diddymu.
translation.en: accordingly, subsection (2) provides for its repeal.

translation.cy: Atodlen 1 – Cofrestr o Dai Rhent Preifat
translation.en: Schedule 1 – Register of Private Rented Housing

translation.cy: Yr wybodaeth, a grybwyllir yn is-baragraffau 3(2)(a)-(c), yw:
translation.en: The information, mentioned in sub-paragraphs 3(2)(a)-(c), is:

translation.cy: enw unrhyw berson a benodwyd i wneud gwaith gosod eiddo a gwaith rheoli eiddo ar ran y landlord;
translation.en: the name of any person appointed to carry out lettings work and property management work on behalf of the landlord;

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r cais fod mewn cysylltiad ag eiddo yn yr ardal y mae’r awdurdod yn awdurdod trwyddedu ar ei chyfer.
translation.en: The request must be in respect of a property in the area for which the authority is the licensing authority.

translation.cy: Nid yw person o dramor sy’n anghymwys i gael cymorth tai yn gymwys i gael cymorth o dan adrannau 66, 68, 73 neu 75 o Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: A person from abroad who is ineligible for housing assistance is not eligible for help under sections 66, 68, 73 or 75 of Part 2 of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r Rhan hon yn gwneud mân ddiwygiadau a diwygiadau canlyniadol i amryw o Ddeddfau o ganlyniad i’r darpariaethau yn Rhan 2.
translation.en: This makes minor and consequential amendments to various Acts as a result of the provisions in Part 2.

translation.cy: O ganlyniad i ddiwygiad i Ddeddf Tai 1996, caniateir ei gwneud yn ofynnol i landlordiaid cymdeithasol cofrestredig gydymffurfio â rheolau a bennir mewn safonau a osodir o dan adran 33A o Ddeddf 1996.
translation.en: As a result of an amendment to the Housing Act 1996, registered social landlords may be required to comply with rules specified in standards set under section 33A of the 1996 Act.

translation.cy: Rhaid iddynt gyhoeddi unrhyw ganllawiau a ddyroddir.
translation.en: They must publish any guidance issued.

translation.cy: Y Berthynas rhwng y DU a’r UE yn y Dyfodol:
translation.en: The Future UK/EU Relationship Negotiating Priorities for Wales

translation.cy: Rhan II:
translation.en: Part II:

translation.cy: Atodiad A:
translation.en: Annex A:

translation.cy: |  Y Berthynas rhwng y DU a’r UE yn y Dyfodol:
translation.en: |  The Future UK/EU Relationship:

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth y DU yn seilio ei strategaeth negodi ar yr hyn a nodir yn y Datganiad Gwleidyddol, ond mae’r dystiolaeth yn glir mai’r pellaf y mae’r DU yn symud oddi wrth yr integreiddio economaidd y mae Marchnad Sengl ac Undeb Tollau’r UE yn ei ddarparu, y mwyaf fydd y niwed economaidd.
translation.en: The UK Government will base its negotiation strategy on the platform set out in the Political Declaration, yet the evidence is clear that the further the UK moves away from the economic integration provided by the EU Single Market and Customs Union the greater will be the economic damage.

translation.cy: Rydym am weld dyfodol i Gymru ar ôl Brexit sy’n parchu ein holl ddinasyddion a chymunedau.
translation.en: We want a post-Brexit future for Wales of respect for all our citizens and communities.

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod partneriaeth ddiogelwch y dyfodol mor gyflawn â phosibl a’i bod yn efelychu’r trefniadau presennol gymaint â phosibl, gan gynnwys cydlyniad mewnol ac allanol.
translation.en: The fullest possible future security partnership that replicates as far as possible current arrangements including internal and external cooperation;

translation.cy: Dogfen yw’r “Datganiad Gwleidyddol” sy’n gysylltiedig â Chytundeb yr UE a’r DU ar Ymadawiad y DU â’r UE
translation.en: The "Political Declaration" is a document attached to the EU-UK Agreement on UK Withdrawal from the EU.

translation.cy: Mae’r Datganiad Gwleidyddol yn amlinellu’r fframwaith ar gyfer y berthynas rhwng yr UE a’r DU yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: The Political Declaration outlines the framework for the future relationship between EU and UK.

translation.cy: Mae’r Rhan hon yn amlinellu’r trefniadau llywodraethu posibl i sicrhau bod y berthynas y cytunwyd arni at y dyfodol yn gweithio’n briodol.
translation.en: This Part outlines the possible governance arrangements to ensure the proper functioning of the future relationships agreed.

translation.cy: Proses Arfaethedig
translation.en: Forward Process

translation.cy: Y Farchnad Sengl a Masnach Ryngwladol
translation.en: Single Market and International Trade

translation.cy: Rydym yn cydnabod bod y Datganiad Gwleidyddol yn ddatganiad lefel uchel o uchelgais ar gyfer y berthynas yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: We recognise that the Political Declaration is a high level statement of ambition for the future relationship.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn cytuno â’r gwerthoedd a’r hawliau craidd a nodir ym mharagraffau 6 a 7 o’r Datganiad Gwleidyddol.
translation.en: The Welsh Government concurs with the core values and rights set out in paragraphs 6 and 7 of the Political Declaration.

translation.cy: Rhaid gwireddu’r addewid hwn.
translation.en: It is vital this promise is honoured.

translation.cy: Mae’r dystiolaeth yn glir mai’r pellaf y mae’r DU yn symud oddi wrth yr integreiddio economaidd y mae’r Farchnad Sengl a’r Undeb Tollau yn ei ddarparu, y mwyaf fydd y niwed economaidd.
translation.en: The evidence is clear that the further the UK moves away from the economic integration that the Single Market and Customs Union provides the greater the economic damage.

translation.cy: Mae darllen y testun ym mharagraff 23 yn ofalus ynghylch agweddau rheoleiddiol yn cadarnhau hyn.
translation.en: This is borne out by close reading of the text in paragraph 23 on ‘regulatory aspects’.

translation.cy: Mae’r testun yn nodi: ‘… the Parties will put in place provisions to promote regulatory approaches that are transparent, efficient, promote avoidance of unnecessary barriers to trade in goods and are compatible to the extent possible’ (ein pwyslais).
translation.en: The text says:… the Parties will put in place provisions to promote regulatory approaches that are transparent, efficient, promote avoidance of unnecessary barriers to trade in goods and are compatible to the extent possible’ (our emphasis).

translation.cy: Yr unig beth a fyddai’n golygu NAD yw hyn yn bosibl yw pe bai’r DU yn creu gwahaniaeth.
translation.en: The only extent to which this is NOT possible is where the UK imposes difference.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn cefnogi’n gryf fesurau i osgoi gorfodi ffin ar y tir yn Iwerddon, ac rydym yn rhoi’r pwyslais mwyaf ar gadw heddwch.
translation.en: The Welsh Government strongly supports measures to avoid the imposition of a land border in Ireland and we attach the highest value to the preservation of peace.

translation.cy: Protocol Iwerddon/Gogledd Iwerddon:
translation.en: Ireland/Northern Ireland Protocol:

translation.cy: Comisiynodd Llywodraeth Cymru Arsyllfa Polisi Masnach y DU i nodi’r prif broblemau a allai godi o ganlyniad i fabwysiadu’r Protocol ar Iwerddon/Gogledd Iwerddon fel y nodir yn y Cytundeb Ymadael.
translation.en: The Welsh Government commissioned the UK Trade Policy Observatory to identify the main issues that may arise as a result of the adoption of the Protocol on Ireland/Northern Ireland as set out in the Withdrawal Agreement.

translation.cy: Os bydd Prydain Fawr yn llacio ei rheoliadau mewn perthynas â rheoliadau’r UE, mae’n bosibl y bydd cynhyrchwyr Gogledd Iwerddon yn gweithio i gostau uwch na chwmnïau Prydain, gan y bydd dal angen i gynhyrchwyr Gogledd Iwerddon gynhyrchu i safonau’r UE.
translation.en: If Great Britain relaxes its regulations relative to EU regulations, NI producers might operate under higher costs than GB firms, as NI producers would still need to produce to EU standards.

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl felly y bydd cwmnïau Gogledd Iwerddon yn ei chael yn anodd cystadlu yn y farchnad Brydeinig.
translation.en: NI firms may therefore struggle to compete in the GB market.

translation.cy: Eiddo Deallusol
translation.en: Intellectual Property

translation.cy: Mae cael mynediad at ddata yn sail i bob gweithgarwch o fewn y sector gwasanaethau, ac yma, rydym yn annog Llywodraeth y DU i roi blaenoriaeth i’r angen am gael cytundebau digonolrwydd data a sicrhau bod data yn gallu symud yn hawdd rhwng y DU a’r UE, fel sy’n wir ar hyn o bryd.
translation.en: Underpinning all services sector activity is data accessibility and here we urge the UK Government to prioritise the need for a data adequacy agreement and ensuring data can flow freely between the UK and the EU as is currently the case.

translation.en: It was recommended that Welsh Government should work towards establishing a clearer picture of the needs in terms of teachers who are able to teach through the medium of Welsh, setting specific and ambitious targets for providers of initial teacher training in terms of recruiting Welsh speaking teachers.

translation.en: The need to plan more purposefully alongside higher education institutions, local education consortia and local authorities was also identified.

translation.cy: Rydym hefyd wedi parhau i ddosbarthu ffolderi mamolaeth a chardiau sgan i unedau mamolaeth ar draws Cymru er mwyn cyflwyno rhieni i Cymraeg i Blant cyn i’w plentyn gael ei eni, a pharhau i hyrwyddo’r llyfryn addysg Gymraeg ar gyfer rhieni.
translation.en: We have also continued to distribute maternity folders and scan cards in maternity units across Wales in order to introduce Cymraeg for Kids to parents before their child is born, and we have continued to promote the booklet on Welsh language education for parents.

translation.cy: Canran y dysgwyr a gofrestrwyd ar gyfer TGAU Cymraeg Iaith Gyntaf a gofrestrwyd ar gyfer o leiaf dau neu bump cymhwyster Lefel 1/2 arall drwy gyfrwng y Gymraeg
translation.en: Percentage of learners registered for the first language Welsh GCSE who are registered for at least two or five other Level 1/2 qualifications through the medium of Welsh

translation.cy: Mae siart 6 yn dangos bod 81.6% o ddysgwyr a gofrestrwyd ar gyfer TGAU Cymraeg Iaith Gyntaf hefyd wedi’u cofrestru ar gyfer o leiaf dau gymhwyster arall drwy gyfrwng y Gymraeg.
translation.en: Chart 6 shows that 81.6% of learners registered for the first language Welsh GCSE are also registered for at least two other qualifications through the medium of Welsh.

translation.cy: Yn ôl canlyniadau'r Cyfrifiad, mae nifer y siaradwyr Cymraeg yn cwympo'n sylweddol ar ôl 16 oed.
translation.en: According to Census results, the number of Welsh speakers drops substantially after 16 years old.

translation.cy: I’r perwyl hwn, sefydlwyd Grŵp Cynllunio ôl-16 gan y Coleg Cymraeg Cenedlaethol gyda chynrychiolaeth o’r sector addysg bellach a dysgu seiliedig ar waith i gynghori ar lunio cynllun gweithredu, gyda’r nod o gynyddu’r cyfraddau dilyniant ôl-16.
translation.en: With this in mind, a Post-16 Planning Group was established by the Coleg Cymraeg Cenedlaethol, including representatives from the further education and work-based learning sectors to advise on forming an action plan, with the aim of increasing post-16 progression rates.

translation.cy: Profiad y Dysgwr
translation.en: the learner's experience

translation.cy: Darpariaeth
translation.en: provision

translation.cy: Rydym yn parhau i gydweithio gydag Adran Cynllunio a Chyllido Addysg ôl-16 y Llywodraeth er mwyn hyrwyddo twf darpariaeth addysg a hyfforddiant alwedigaethol ddwyieithog, a gosodwyd targedau ar y sefydliadau ar gyfer y meysydd blaenoriaeth.
translation.en: We continue to work alongside the Government's Post-16 Education Planning and Funding Department in order to promote the growth of bilingual occupational education and training provision, and targets have been set for organisations in relation to priority areas.

translation.cy: Siart 3) yn trosglwyddo i’r nifer sy’n dilyn Safon Uwch Cymraeg.
translation.en: Chart 3) does not transfer to the number following the Welsh A-level.

translation.cy: Canran y gweithgareddau addysg sy’n cael eu cynnal yn Gymraeg neu’n ddwyieithog yn ôl y math o ddarparwr
translation.en: Percentage of educational activities held in Welsh or bilingually according to type of provider

translation.cy: Roedd y dadansoddi hwn yn dangos bod dau Sefydliad Addysg Uwch wedi gweld gostyngiad mawr yn eu data o ran gweithgarwch dysgu, sef Grŵp Llandrillo Menai a Choleg Cambria.
translation.en: Analysis showed that two further education institutions had seen a large decrease in their learning activity data, namely Grŵp Llandrillo Menai and Coleg Cambria.

translation.cy: Er hyn, mae canran y gweithgareddau addysg sy’n cael eu cynnal yn Gymraeg neu’n ddwyieithog gan y tri darparwr wedi cynyddu dros y pedair blynedd diwethaf.
translation.en: However, the percentage of educational activities conducted in Welsh or bilingually by the three providers has increased over the last four years.

translation.cy: Mae nifer y staff sy’n gallu addysgu trwy’r Gymraeg wedi cynyddu 23 y cant rhwng 2011/12 a 2017/18 ond wedi gostwng yn y blynyddoedd diweddar.
translation.en: The number of staff who can teach through the medium of Welsh has increased 23 per cent between 2011/12 and 2017/18, but has declined in recent years.

translation.cy: Mae’r nifer sy’n addysgu mewn gwirionedd wedi aros yn gymharol sefydlog ers 2011/12, er gwaetha’r cynnydd mewn capasiti i addysgu yn y Gymraeg.
translation.en: The number of teachers has in fact remained relatively stable since 2011/12, despite the increase in the capacity to teach through the medium of Welsh.

translation.cy: Os bydd niferoedd tebyg yn cymhwyso dros y 3 blynedd nesaf, bydd tua 150 o athrawon cynradd yn fwy na’r targed erbyn 2021, ac eithrio trosiant staff.
translation.en: If similar numbers qualify over the next 3 years, by 2021 there will be 150 more primary teachers than required by the target, without taking account of staff turnover.

translation.cy: Er gwaethaf yr heriau hyn, rwy'n falch bod y Gyllideb hon, sy'n amlinellu ein cynlluniau ar gyfer gwariant o dros £18bn y flwyddyn nesaf, yn rhoi gwerthoedd craidd y Llywodraeth, sef tegwch a chydraddoldeb, ar waith.
translation.en: Despite these challenges, I am proud that this Budget, which outlines our plans for more than £18bn of spending next year, puts this Government’s core values of fairness and equality into action.

translation.cy: Yr unig ffordd o gyflawni cydraddoldeb yw gyda sylfaen o wasanaethau cyhoeddus cynaliadwy sy'n gwbl hygyrch, yn ymateb i anghenion pawb, ac yn addas ar gyfer cenedlaethau'r dyfodol.
translation.en: Equality can only be achieved with a foundation of sustainable public services which are truly accessible and responsive to everyone, and built for future generations.

translation.cy: Rydym yn buddsoddi £219m mewn teithio cynaliadwy a hynny ochr yn ochr â mwy na £700m mewn seilwaith ym meysydd digidol, ffyrdd, rheilffyrdd, awyr a môr.
translation.en: We are investing £219m in sustainable travel sitting alongside more than £700m in digital, road, rail, air and sea infrastructure.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi ymrwymo i ddefnyddio proses y gyllideb i gymell gwelliannau hirdymor, a pharhau i wreiddio Deddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau'r Dyfodol.
translation.en: I am committed to using the budget process to drive improvements for the longerterm, continuing to embed the Well-being of Future Generations Act.

translation.cy: Er bod y cyni parhaus ar lefel y DU yn tanseilio ein gallu i gyflawni'r buddsoddiad y mae ein gwlad yn ei haeddu, rwy'n falch o gyflwyno Cyllideb sy'n parhau i fuddsoddi yn ein gwasanaethau cyhoeddus hanfodol ac yn cefnogi ein huchelgais am Gymru fwy cyfartal, ffyniannus a gwyrdd.
translation.en: Despite ongoing austerity imposed at a UK level undermining our ability to deliver the investment our country truly deserves, I am proud to introduce a Budget that continues to invest in our vital public services while supporting our ambitions for a more equal, prosperous and greener Wales.

translation.cy: 1.09 Roedd y Cylch Gwario hefyd yn cynnwys cynnydd o £18m i'n cyllideb gyfalaf a oedd eisoes wedi'i phennu ar gyfer 2020-21.
translation.en: 1.09 The Spending Round also included an increase of £18m to our capital budget which had already been set for 2020-21.

translation.cy: 1.10 Roedd Cylch Gwario'r DU yn seiliedig ar ragolygon mis Mawrth a pholisi cyllidol gweinyddiaeth flaenorol.
translation.en: 1.10 The UK Spending Round was based on forecasts from March and a previous administration’s fiscal policy.

translation.cy: 1.18 Mae'r Gyllideb hon yn sail i’r gwaith o gyflawni’r Rhaglen Lywodraethu Symud Cymru Ymlaen a’r strategaeth genedlaethol Ffyniant i Bawb ac yn cyd-fynd â uchelgeisiau Sosialaeth yr 21ain Ganrif y Llywodraeth yma, sef sicrhau Cymru fwy cyfartal, llewyrchus a gwyrdd trwy fuddsoddi’n strategol yn ein hwyth maes blaenoriaeth.
translation.en: 1.18 This Budget underpins the delivery of the Programme for Government Taking Wales Forward, the national strategy Prosperity for All aligned to delivering this Government’s ambitions of 21st Century Socialism for a more equal, prosperous and greener Wales through strategic investments in our eight priority areas.

translation.cy: 1.24 Oherwydd y ffactorau allanol sydd wedi dylanwadu ar amseriad y gyllideb eleni, mae Llywodraeth Cymru wedi rhoi trefniadau eithriadol ar waith o ran proses y gyllideb, a hynny gyda chytundeb Pwyllgor Busnes a Pwyllgor Cyllid y Cynulliad Cenedlaethol.
translation.en: 1.24 In light of the external factors that have influenced the timing of this year’s budget, the Welsh Government has, with the agreement of the National Assembly’s Business Committee and Finance Committee, triggered exceptional arrangements in relation to this year’s budget process.

translation.cy: Mae pennod pump yn nodi sut y mae'r Ddeddf wedi llywio ein cyllideb.
translation.en: Chapter five sets out how the Act has shaped our budget.

translation.en: Chapter 2:

translation.cy: 2.04 Er bod y Cylch Gwario un flwyddyn diweddar ar gyfer 2020-21 wedi cyhoeddi rhywfaint o gynnydd mewn gwariant o ddydd i ddydd, mae gwaith dadansoddi'r OBR yn dangos, yn dilyn degawd nas gwelwyd ei fath o'r blaen o doriadau real mewn gwariant ar wasanaethau cyhoeddus, bod perfformiad yr economi ehangach yn allweddol o ran rhagolygon cyllidol y dyfodol.
translation.en: 2.04 While the recent one-year Spending Round for 2020-21 announced some increases in day-to-day spending, analysis by the OBR indicates that, following an unprecedented decade of real reductions in spending on public services, future fiscal prospects depend crucially on the performance of the wider economy.

translation.cy: 2.09 Mae sefyllfa bosibl o ran Brexit heb gytundeb wedi ei hamlinellu hefyd yn ffigur tri.
translation.en: 2.09 A possible no deal Brexit scenario is also outlined in figure three.

translation.cy: Byddai'n golygu lleihad o rhwng £900m ac £1bn yn y gyllideb adnoddau bob blwyddyn.
translation.en: It would mean a £900m to £1bn reduction in the resource budget each year.

translation.cy: 2.26 Pe baem yn ymadael â'r UE heb gytundeb, mae Llywodraeth flaenorol y DU wedi rhoi gwarant o ran parhad rhaglenni cyllido'r UE a gymeradwywyd cyn inni ymadael â'r UE.
translation.en: 2.26 The previous UK Government has provided a guarantee, should we leave the EU without a deal, for EU funding programmes which were approved prior to our exit from the EU.

translation.cy: Mae'r gwarant hwn yn rhoi sicrwydd cyfyngedig o ran cyllid cyfredol, ond nid oes unrhyw eglurder o hyd o ran cyllid i ffermwyr ar ôl 2019 nac o ran cronfeydd strwythurol ar ôl 2021.
translation.en: This guarantee provides limited assurance for current funds but we still have no clarity on farm funding beyond 2019 or on structural funds beyond 2021.

translation.cy: Mae ein cyhoeddiadau Brexit a Datganoli a Diwygio ein Hundeb yn nodi ein barn o ran sut y dylid datblygu'r trefniadau cyfansoddiadol newydd hyn.
translation.en: Our ‘Brexit and Devolution’ and ‘Reforming our Union’ publications set out our thinking on how these new constitutional arrangements should be developed.

translation.cy: Roedd yn amlinellu ein prif flaenoriaethau ar gyfer gwella ein heconomi a'n gwasanaethau cyhoeddus;
translation.en: It outlined our key priorities for delivering improvements to our economy and public services;

translation.cy: Yn ystod 2020-21, byddwn yn buddsoddi £342m arall yn ein GIG, felly bydd cyfanswm cyllid y GIG ar gyfer y flwyddyn nesaf yn fwy na £8bn mewn un flwyddyn.
translation.en: In 2020-21 our investment of a further £342m in our NHS, will take total NHS funding for next year to more than £8bn in a single year.

translation.cy: Er bod cyllidebau'n lleihau, rydym wedi diogelu llywodraeth leol rhag y toriadau eithafol a welir yn Lloegr, toriadau sydd wedi cael effaith anghymesur ar gymunedau difreintiedig.
translation.en: Despite falling budgets, we have protected local government from the excessive cuts seen in England which have disproportionately impacted upon deprived communities.

translation.cy: Mae ein cyllideb o £21m yn 202021, gan gynnwys cyllid gan yr UE, yn helpu i ddarparu gwasanaeth Busnes Cymru. Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn fath penodol o gymorth ar gyfer busnesau bach a chanolig ledled Cymru ac mae’n sicrhau bod modd i entrepreneuriaid a busnesau bach a chanolig gael gafael ar yr wybodaeth, y cyngor a'r cymorth sydd eu hangen arnynt er mwyn eu helpu i ddechrau, tyfu a ffynnu.
translation.en: Our budget of £21m in 2020-21, including EU funding, supports the delivery of the Business Wales service which is a dedicated form of support for SMEs across Wales to ensure entrepreneurs and SMEs have access to the information, advice and support they need to help them start, grow and prosper.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys tua hanner biliwn o bunnoedd ar draws yr holl gronfeydd busnes a Chynllun Cymorth i Brynu Cymru, sy’n werth £520m.
translation.en: This includes around half a billion pounds across all business funds and the £520m Help to Buy Wales Scheme.

translation.cy: Bron i £200m i helpu i ailgylchu gwastraff cartrefi.
translation.en: Nearly £200m to support household waste recycling.

translation.cy: Mwy na £450m mewn Cronfa Gofal Integredig.
translation.en: More than £450m in an Integrated Care Fund.

translation.cy: 4.12 Yn 2020-21, bydd Llywodraeth Cymru'n cadw cyfraddau LTT yr un peth ag yn 2019-20.
translation.en: 4.12 In 2020-21, the Welsh Government will keep LTT rates the same as in 2019-20.

translation.cy: Cyfraddau rhenti les amhreswyl LTT
translation.en: LTT non-residential lease rent rates

translation.cy: Y corff dosbarthu ar gyfer y cynllun yw Cyngor Gweithredu Gwirfoddol Cymru.
translation.en: The distributive body for the scheme is the Wales Council for Voluntary Action.

translation.cy: Ardrethi annomestig (NDR)
translation.en: Non-domestic Rates (NDR)

translation.cy: 4.24 Am y tro cyntaf, mae rhagolygon annibynnol o refeniw trethi datganoledig oddi wrth y Swyddfa Cyfrifoldeb Cyllidebol ynghlwm wrth y gyllideb ddrafft hon.
translation.en: 4.24 For the first time, this draft budget is accompanied by independent forecasts of devolved tax revenue from the OBR.

translation.cy: Amlinellir y dyraniadau refeniw hyn ym mhennod 6.
translation.en: These allocations are outlined in chapter six.

translation.cy: Ni ellir defnyddio'r gyllideb wedi'i chlustnodi ond ar gyfer benthyciadau a buddsoddiadau ecwiti a rhaid iddi gael ei had-dalu i Drysorlys Ei Mawrhydi.
translation.en: This ring-fenced budget can only be used for loan and equity investments and must be repaid to HM Treasury.

translation.en: Sources of finance for Welsh Government

translation.cy: 4.47 Mae tabl 4.6 yn nodi ffynonellau ar gyfer adnoddau a chyfalaf.
translation.en: 4.47 Table 4.6 sets out sources for resource and capital.

translation.cy: Pennod 5:
translation.en: Chapter 5:

translation.cy: Ymweliadau'r Gweinidog dros yr haf
translation.en: Ministerial summer visits

translation.cy: Tanlinellodd yr ymweliadau hyn hefyd bwysigrwydd cynnwys y bobl fwyaf anghenus a theilwra'r gwasanaethau a ddarperir ar eu cyfer ac ymchwilio i gyfleoedd i adeiladu modelau ariannu cynaliadwy.
translation.en: These visits also highlighted the importance of involving and tailoring the service provision to the people who are in most need and in exploring opportunities to build sustainable funding models.

translation.cy: Ar y cyd â’r buddsoddiadau a amlinellir ym mhennod chwech, rydym wedi nodi yn yr Asesiad Effaith Integredig Strategol yn Atodiad C y dull gweithredu o ran cefnogi datgarboneiddio yn y gyllideb hon a nodi'r camau y byddwn yn eu cymryd yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Alongside the investments we have outlined in chapter six, within the Strategic Integrated Impact Assessment in annex C, we have set out the approach to supporting decarbonisation within this Budget and the steps we will take in the future.

translation.cy: Buddsoddi ym mlaenoriaethau ein Llywodraeth
translation.en: Investing in our Government’s priorities

translation.cy: 6.02 O'r dechrau’n deg, rydym wedi dweud mai iechyd yw ein blaenoriaeth, ynghyd â rhoi'r setliad gorau posibl i lywodraeth leol.
translation.en: 6.02 From the outset, we have said that health is our priority, together with providing local government with the best possible settlement.

translation.cy: 6.12 Rydym hefyd yn buddsoddi mewn atal trwy fuddsoddiad newydd o £5.5m yn 2020-21 i gefnogi strategaeth Pwysau Iach:
translation.en: 6.12 We are also investing in prevention through new investment of £5.5m in 202021 in support of the Healthy Weight:

translation.cy: 6.14 Mae buddsoddi yn yr ystad gofal iechyd yn allweddol i wireddu'r weledigaeth a nodir yn Cymru Iachach.
translation.en: 6.14 Investing in the healthcare estate is key to delivering the vision set out in A Healthier Wales.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, mae'r Gronfa Datblygu Gofal Sylfaenol o dros £40m yn cefnogi datblygu'r gweithlu gofal sylfaenol a gweithio mewn clystyrau.
translation.en: In addition, the Primary Care Development Fund of over £40m supports development of the primary care workforce and cluster working.

translation.cy: 6.16 Rydym yn parhau i ddarparu cyllid ar gyfer chwaraeon a gweithgarwch corfforol a byddwn yn buddsoddi swm pellach o £25.7m yn 2020-21, gan danlinellu ein hymrwymiad i gynyddu lefelau gweithgarwch corfforol a phwysigrwydd atal afiechyd.
translation.en: 6.16 We continue to provide funding for sports and physical activity and will be investing a further £25.7m in 2020-21, highlighting our commitment to increasing physical activity levels and the importance of preventing ill-health.

translation.cy: 6.21 Mae darparu'r setliad gorau i lywodraeth leol hefyd yn golygu cydnabod y ffrydiau cyllid eraill sy'n cael eu dyrannu i lywodraeth leol.
translation.en: 6.21 Providing the best settlement for local government also means recognising the other funding streams allocated to local government.

translation.cy: Mae'r Cynnig Gofal Plant yn un o brif ysgogwyr newid ar gyfer y sector gofal plant.
translation.en: The Childcare Offer is a primary driver of change for the childcare sector.

translation.cy: 6.35 Ers mis Ebrill 2019 mae’r holl safleoedd gofal plant yng Nghymru'n cael rhyddhad o 100 y cant ar eu biliau ardrethi annomestig mewn pecyn cymorth gwerth £7.5m dros dair blynedd (2019-20 i 2021-22).
translation.en: 6.35 From April 2019, all childcare premises in Wales receive 100 per cent relief from their NDR bills through a package of support worth £7.5m over three years (2019-20 to 2021-22).

translation.cy: Buddsoddi mewn addysg
translation.en: Investing in education

translation.cy: 6.39 Trwy’r setliad llywodraeth leol a thrwy ein cyllideb addysg o £1.8bn rydym yn cyflawni ar ein cynllun gweithredu Ein Cenhadaeth Genedlaethol  trwy godi safonau, mynd i'r afael â'r bwlch cyrhaeddiad a sicrhau system addysg sy’n destun hyder a balchder cenedlaethol.
translation.en: 6.39 Through the local government settlement and through our £1.8bn education budget we are delivering on Our National Mission action plan by raising standards, tackling the attainment gap, and ensuring an education system that is a source of national pride and public confidence.

translation.cy: 6.52 Rydym yn ymrwymedig i gyflawni ein targed uchelgeisiol o ddarparu 20,000 o dai fforddiadwy yn ystod tymor y Cynulliad hwn, ac rydym ar y trywydd iawn o ran hynny.
translation.en: 6.52 We are committed to, and are on track to meet, our ambitious target of providing 20,000 affordable homes during this Assembly term.

translation.cy: 6.64 Yn 2020-21 caiff dros £400k ei ddyrannu i'r prosiect Braenaru i Fenywod a'r glasbrintiau troseddau ieuenctid a throseddau menywod, gyda'r ddau yn canolbwyntio ar atal troseddu.
translation.en: 6.64 In 2020-21 more than £400k will be allocated between the Women’s Pathfinder project and the Youth and Female Offending blueprints, both of which have a focus on prevention.

translation.cy: Buddsoddi mewn tystiolaeth a gwelliant
translation.en: Investing in evidence and improvement

translation.cy: 6.74 Rydym yn parhau â'n buddsoddiad mewn prydau ysgol am ddim yn 2020-21, gan adeiladu ar sail y £7m ychwanegol sydd ar gael drwy'r setliad llywodraeth leol yn 2019-20 i dalu costau ychwanegol prydau ysgol am ddim sy'n gysylltiedig â'r meini prawf cymhwysedd newydd a chamau diogelu yn ystod y cyfnod pontio.
translation.en: 6.74 We are maintaining our investment for free school meals in 2020-21, building on the additional £7m available through the local government settlement in 2019-20 for additional free school meal costs associated with new eligibility criteria and transitional protection.

translation.cy: Rydym yn mynd ymhellach, drwy ddyrannu £3.2m ychwanegol yn 2020-21 i ehangu'r cynllun i ragor o grwpiau blwyddyn (R7).
translation.en: We are going further, allocating an additional £3.2m in 2020-21, to extend the scheme to more year groups.

translation.cy: Bydd cynyddu cyfanswm ein buddsoddiad i £2.7m yn ein galluogi i ehangu'r rhaglen i hyd at 7,600 o blant.
translation.en: Taking our total investment to £2.7m the extra funding will enable the extension of the programme to up to 7,600 children.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod cyfanswm ein buddsoddiad yn 202021 yn fwy na £97m (net).
translation.en: This brings our total investment in 2020-21 to more than £97m (net).

translation.cy: 6.85 Yn 2019–20 dyrannwyd £3m ychwanegol i gefnogi gweithgynhyrchwyr allweddol yn y sector modurol a’r sector awyrofod i ddatblygu eu sgiliau.
translation.en: 6.85 In 2019-20 an additional £3m was allocated to support the skills development of key automotive and aerospace manufacturers.

translation.cy: 6.86 Rydym yn dyrannu dros £40m i Gymorth Gwaith Cymru yn 2020–21 a fydd yn rhoi ffordd newydd o ddarparu cymorth cyflogadwyedd a sgiliau o fis Ebrill 2020. Bydd tua 16,000 o bobl yn derbyn cymorth bob blwyddyn i sicrhau bod ganddynt bopeth sydd ei angen arnynt i gael swydd – pa rwystrau bynnag sydd ganddynt.
translation.en: 6.86 We are allocating more than £40m to Job Support Wales in 2020-21 that will deliver a new approach to delivering employability and skills support from April 2020, to support around 16,000 people per year to meet what individuals need to gain employment whatever their barriers.

translation.cy: Rydym yn defnyddio dull cyllidebu ar sail rhywedd fel rhan o'r rhaglen beilot hon i ddeall sut y gallai'r dull hwn helpu i nodi a deall yr effeithiau gwahanol sy'n bosibl, gan gynnwys effeithiau anfwriadol, er mwyn gwella'r ffordd rydym yn blaenoriaethu ac yn dyrannu adnoddau.
translation.en: We are taking forward a gender budgeting approach as part of this pilot to understand how this approach might help identify and understand potential different impacts, including unintended impacts, to improve how we prioritise and allocate resources.

translation.cy: Er mwyn ategu ein huchelgeisiau yn y strategaeth Cymraeg 2050:
translation.en: In support of our ambitions in Cymraeg 2050:

translation.cy: Rydym hefyd yn neilltuo cyllid cyfalaf gwerth £1m yn 2020–21 i ategu'r broses o newid o gerbydau casglu sbwriel sy'n defnyddio diesel i gerbydau allyriadau isel iawn yn fflyd y sector cyhoeddus.
translation.en: We are also allocating capital funding of £1m in 2020-21 to support the transition from diesel refuse collection vehicles to ultra-low emission refuse collection vehicles in the public sector fleet.

translation.cy: Yn ystod y flwyddyn nesaf byddwn yn peilota dull 'tasglu’ i ddarparu cyngor arbenigol ar gyfer y sector cyhoeddus ar integreiddio bioamrywiaeth yn well yn y gwaith o ddatblygu polisïau, caffael cyhoeddus a rheoli ystadau ehangach.
translation.en: In the coming year we will pilot a ‘taskforce’ approach to provide the public sector with specialist advice on improved integration of biodiversity in policy development, public procurement and wider estate management.

translation.en: Additional revenue allocations

translation.en: Additional capital allocations
