translation.en: Annex C:

translation.cy: Ers 2015-16, drwy fabwysiadu dull integredig, ein nod fu datblygu dealltwriaeth ehangach o’r cyfleoedd a’r pwysau trawsbynciol sy’n bodoli ar draws y meysydd gwasanaeth allweddol, yn unol â’n blaenoriaethau - a thargedu cyllid lle mae ei angen fwyaf.
translation.en: Since 2015-16, through taking an integrated approach, our aim has been to develop a wider understanding of the cross-cutting pressures, and opportunities, that exist across key service areas, in line with our priorities - and target funding where it is needed most.

translation.cy: Y cyd-destun amgylcheddol, cymdeithasol a diwylliannol
translation.en: Environmental, Social and Cultural Context

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae disgwyl i nifer y bobl rhwng 16-64 oed ddisgyn 5.7 y cant dros yr un cyfnod.
translation.en: However, the number of people aged 16-64 is projected to decrease by 5.7 per cent during the same period.

translation.cy: Mae’r bwlch cyflog rhwng y rhywiau ar y lefel isaf erioed unwaith eto, er nad yw cau’r bwlch wedi bod yn dueddiad cyson.
translation.en: The gender pay gap is at the joint lowest level on record, though the narrowing of the gap has not been a consistent trend.

translation.cy: Sgiliau ydy un o’r prif rwystrau at waith.
translation.en: One of the main barriers to employment is skills.

translation.cy: Mae mynd i’r afael â thlodi yn dal yn flaenoriaeth allweddol i’r Llywodraeth hon.
translation.en: Tackling poverty remains a key priority for this Government.

translation.cy: Yn unol â’r ffaith bod tegwch a chydraddoldeb yn werthoedd craidd i’r Llywodraeth hon, mae’r Gyllideb hon yn rhoi’r gwerthoedd hyn ar waith.
translation.en: In line with this Government’s core values of fairness and equality, this Budget puts these values into action.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn rhoi golwg gyffredinol ar sut mae ein cynlluniau gwario ar gyfer y flwyddyn nesaf wedi ystyried yr effaith ar grwpiau a warchodir yng Nghymru.
translation.en: This section provides an overview of how our spending plans for the next year have considered the impact on protected groups in Wales.

translation.cy: Rydym yn sicrhau bod gwasanaethau cyhoeddus hanfodol y mae pobl yn dibynnu arnynt, gan gynnwys ein GIG, ysgolion a Llywodraeth Leol, i gyd yn cael rhagor o gyllid i gydnabod y rhan hollbwysig mae gwasanaethau cyhoeddus yn ei chwarae mewn camau allweddol drwy gydol bywydau pobl.
translation.en: We are ensuring that vital public services upon which people rely, including our NHS, schools and Local Government all get funding increases to recognise the vital role public services play at key stages throughout people’s lives.

translation.cy: Bydd cyllid ar gyfer Pencampwyr Cyflogaeth Pobl Anabl a chynllun gwobrau anabledd newydd posibl yng Nghymru yn cael effaith gadarnhaol.
translation.en: Funding for the Disabled People Employment Champions and a potential new Welsh disability award scheme will have a positive impact.

translation.cy: Ymysg y penderfyniadau rydym yn eu gwneud, rydym yn dyrannu £1.2m o gyfalaf ychwanegol yn 2020-21 i ddarparu llety diogel i deuluoedd sy’n dianc o gam-drin domestig.
translation.en: Among the decisions we are taking, we are allocating an additional £1.2m capital in 2020-21 to provide safe accommodation for families fleeing domestic abuse.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cydnabod adroddiadau am brinder darpariaeth dybryd ar gyfer dynion sy’n dianc rhag cam-drin domestig, a bod dynion yn llai tebygol o chwilio am lety lloches neu ei dderbyn, gallai unedau ar wasgar hefyd gynnig llety diogel sy’n fwy derbyniol.
translation.en: To recognise reports of a considerable shortage of provision for men fleeing domestic abuse, and that men are less likely to seek or accept refuge accommodation, dispersed units may also offer more acceptable safe accommodation.

translation.cy: Nodweddion gwarchodedig eraill
translation.en: Other protected characteristics

translation.cy: Rydym yn dal i gefnogi'r Gweithredu i Fynd i’r Afael â Throseddau Casineb a Chydlyniant Cymunedol gyda £600k ychwanegol.
translation.en: We are continuing support the Tackling Hate Crime and Community Cohesion Action with an additional £600k.

translation.cy: Ar yr un pryd mae’r GIG a gwasanaethau gofal cymdeithasol hefyd yn wynebu mwy a mwy o alw gan boblogaeth sy’n newid ac yn heneiddio.
translation.en: At the same time both the NHS and social care services also face increasing demands from an ageing and changing population.

translation.cy: Er mwyn sicrhau bod ein gwasanaethau iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol yn gynaliadwy, rydym yn darparu cyllid sy’n cefnogi ymyriadau a all helpu i atal problemau rhag digwydd yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: To ensure our health and social care services are sustainable we are providing funding which supports interventions that can help prevent problems occurring in the future.

translation.cy: Cymru Iach i leihau gordewdra.
translation.en: Health Wales strategy to reduce obesity.

translation.cy: Bydd y cyllid yma’n codi ymwybyddiaeth o beryglon ac effeithiau camddefnyddio sylweddau ac o’r help a’r gefnogaeth sydd ar gael.
translation.en: This funding will raise awareness of the dangers and the impact of substance misuse and also the help and support available.

translation.cy: Buddsoddi mewn llywodraeth leol
translation.en: Investing in local government

translation.cy: Sgiliau a chymwysterau yw’r un prif ddylanwad mwyaf ar gyfle pobl o fod mewn cyflogaeth ac ar eu hincwm.
translation.en: Skills and qualifications are the biggest single influence on people’s chance of being in employment and on their incomes.

translation.cy: Mewn nifer o achosion mae cael y driniaeth iawn yn gynnar, ynghyd â gwell ymwybyddiaeth o iechyd meddwl, yn gallu atal effeithiau niweidiol yn y tymor hwy.
translation.en: Getting the right treatment at an early stage, together with greater awareness of mental health can, in many cases, prevent longer-term adverse effects.

translation.cy: Rydym hefyd yn gwybod nad yw pawb yn teimlo effeithiau iechyd meddwl gwael i’r un graddau.
translation.en: We also know the impacts of poor mental health are not felt equally.

translation.cy: Cymunedau mwyaf difreintiedig Cymru sydd â’r iechyd a llesiant meddwl salaf.
translation.en: Wales’ most deprived communities have the poorest mental health and well-being.

translation.cy: Mae anghenion gofal cymdeithasol yn datblygu wrth i natur afiechydon newid, ac mae angen mwy o ffocws ar atal a mynediad at ystod ehangach o wasanaethau.
translation.en: Social care needs are developing with the changing nature of illnesses, with a need for a greater focus on prevention and access to a wider range of services.

translation.cy: Rydym yn buddsoddi £500k arall yn 2020-21 yn Hyb Cefnogaeth Profiadau Niweidiol yn ystod Plentyndod Cymru a £600k i ddatblygu ac i gefnogi’r ymgyrch codi ymwybyddiaeth i gyfrannu at nifer o fesurau y darperir ar eu cyfer ym Mil Plant (Diddymu Amddiffyniad Cosb Resymol) (Cymru) i gael Cydsyniad Brenhinol.
translation.en: We are investing a further £500k in 2020-21 in the Adverse Child Experiences Support Hub for Wales and £600k to develop and support the awareness raising campaign to contribute towards a number of measures provided for in the Children (Abolition of the Defence of Reasonable Punishment) (Wales) Bill to achieve Royal Assent.

translation.cy: Yn 2020-21 rydym yn dyrannu £1.2m i ddarparu llety diogel i deuluoedd sy’n dianc o drais domestig, cefnogi darparwyr trydydd sector i gaffael unedau cymunedol ar wasgar sydd â’r hyblygrwydd i ddiwallu anghenion teuluoedd nad oes modd eu diwallu drwy lochesau.
translation.en: We are allocating £1.2m in 2020-21 to provide safe accommodation for families fleeing domestic abuse, supporting third sector providers to acquire dispersed community-based units with flexibility to meet the needs of families which cannot be met by refuges.

translation.cy: Mae ein dull gweithredu cenedlaethol mewn perthynas â Dysgu Proffesiynol yn seiliedig ar amrywiaeth o dystiolaeth, gan gynnwys adolygiad annibynnol o'r enw Addysgu Proffesiwn Gwerthfawr yn 2018.
translation.en: Our national approach to Professional Learning has been informed by a range of evidence, including the 2018 independent review Teaching A Valued Profession.

translation.cy: Bydd y cyllid yn cefnogi awdurdodau lleol ac addysg bellach i dalu am y costau ychwanegol sy’n gysylltiedig â dysgwyr sydd â’r anghenion mwyaf cymhleth er mwyn goresgyn y rhwystrau iddynt lwyddo.
translation.en: The funding will support local authorities and further education in meeting the additional costs associated with learners with the most complex needs to overcome the barriers for them to succeed.

translation.cy: Yn ystod 2018-19, roedd 2,592 o unedau tai fforddiadwy ychwanegol wedi cael eu cyflenwi ar gyfer y bobl roedd angen hynny arnynt ar draws Cymru, gan gynnwys teuluoedd â phlant.
translation.en: During 201819, 2,592 additional affordable housing units had been delivered for the people who need it across Wales, including families with children.

translation.cy: Mae angen i 225,000 o dai cymdeithasol Cymru fod o safon deilwng, gan gydnabod bod tai o ansawdd yn cael effaith amlwg ar iechyd a llesiant.
translation.en: Wales’ 225,000 social homes need to be of a decent standard, recognising that quality housing has a demonstrable impact on health and well-being.

translation.cy: Mae ein buddsoddiadau mewn tai hefyd yn sicrhau bod tai sydd eisoes ar gael a thai newydd yn defnyddio ynni’n fwy effeithlon, yn helpu i leihau tlodi tanwydd ac yn gwella canlyniadau iechyd corfforol a meddyliol.
translation.en: Our investments in housing also ensure that existing and new housing improves energy efficiency, help reduce fuel poverty and improve physical and mental health outcomes.

translation.cy: Mae galluogi pobl i aros yn eu cartrefi’n hirach hefyd yn arwain at fanteision iechyd a chymdeithasol sylweddol.
translation.en: Enabling people to stay in their homes for longer also brings significant health and social benefits.

translation.cy: Yng nghyd-destun cyni, ychydig iawn o newid a fu mewn lefelau tlodi incwm cymharol ers nifer o flynyddoedd, er bod rhai grwpiau wedi gweld newid.
translation.en: In the context of austerity there has been little change in relative income poverty levels for a number of years, though changes have been seen for some groups.

translation.cy: Mae modd defnyddio’r gronfa hon ar gyfer gwisg ysgol, offer, cit chwaraeon a chit ar gyfer gweithgareddau y tu allan i'r ysgol.
translation.en: As well as being used for school uniform, this fund can be used for equipment, sports kit and kit for activities outside school.

translation.cy: Mae’r cyllid ychwanegol yn 2020-21 yn caniatáu i ni ymestyn y cynllun i ragor o grwpiau blwyddyn.
translation.en: The additional funding in 2020-21 allows us to extend the scheme to more year groups.

translation.cy: Dros dymor y Cynulliad hwn, rydym wedi mwy na dyblu Grant Datblygu Disgyblion y Blynyddoedd Cynnar.
translation.en: Over this Assembly term, we have more than doubled the Early Years PDG.

translation.cy: Mae llai o gartrefi yn byw mewn tlodi tanwydd o’i gymharu â 10 mlynedd yn ôl wrth i’n cartrefi ddefnyddio ynni’n fwy effeithlon.
translation.en: Fewer households are living in fuel poverty compared with 10 years ago as our homes become more energy efficient.

translation.cy: Mae cyflogaeth ddiogel a chynaliadwy sy’n talu’n dda yn rhoi llwybr allan o dlodi a diogelwch yn erbyn tlodi, nid yn unig i’r unigolyn, ond i’w dibynyddion ac i’r gymuned drwyddi draw.
translation.en: Secure, well-paid and sustainable employment offers both a route out of poverty and protection against it, not just for the individual, but also for their dependents and indeed their wider community.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod cyfanswm ein buddsoddiad eleni dros £97m.
translation.en: This brings our total investment this year to more than £97m.

translation.cy: Mae angen cynyddu lefelau cyflogaeth pobl anabl er mwyn mynd i’r afael â’r bwlch swyddi anabledd gan fod lefelau tlodi pobl anabl yng Nghymru yn dal yn rhy uchel.
translation.en: The employment levels of disabled people need to be increased to tackle the disability employment gap, with poverty levels for disabled people in Wales still too high.

translation.cy: Hawl i Fyw’n Annibynnol ei lansio ym mis Medi 2019.
translation.en: The Right to Independent Living was launched in September 2019.

translation.cy: Y Cynllun Gweithredu ar yr Economi ydy’r polisi arweiniol a’r ddogfen strategaeth ar gyfer ein holl weithgareddau ar draws yr economi.
translation.en: The Economic Action Plan is the guiding policy and strategy document for all of our activities across the economy.

translation.cy: Seilwaith modern a chysylltiedig
translation.en: Modern and connected infrastructure

translation.cy: Dylai gwella argaeledd, diogelwch a chost trafnidiaeth gyhoeddus a mynediad iddi chwarae rhan allweddol yn y tymor hir o ran lleihau anfanteision i grwpiau gwarchodedig.
translation.en: Improvements in the access to, availability of, safety, and cost of public transport should play a key role in the long-term in reducing disadvantage to protected groups.

translation.cy: Er bod seilwaith ffyrdd yn hanfodol, rydym yn cydnabod effeithiau amgylcheddol hynny.
translation.en: While road infrastructure is essential, we recognise the environmental impacts it can have.

translation.cy: Rydym hefyd yn cynnal cyllideb refeniw Croeso Cymru sef £13.2m i arwain y buddsoddiad mewn seilwaith a digwyddiadau twristiaeth i gefnogi’r economi ymwelwyr a marchnata Cymru yn y DU ac yn rhyngwladol fel lle i ymweld, gweithio a buddsoddi.
translation.en: We are also maintaining Visit Wales’ revenue budget at £13.2m to lead investment in tourism infrastructure and events to support the visitor economy and marketing Wales in the UK and internationally as a place to visit, work and invest.

translation.cy: I gefnogi ein huchelgais yn Cymraeg 2050:
translation.en: In support of our ambitions in Cymraeg 2050:

translation.cy: £7.9m ychwanegol i gefnogi gweithredu mesurau ansawdd aer yng Nghaerdydd a Chaerffili.
translation.en: An additional £7.9m to support the implementation of air quality measures in Cardiff and Caerphilly.

translation.cy: Mae tystiolaeth a ddaeth o ragflaenydd y rhaglen yn awgrymu bod dulliau modiwlaidd a modern eraill o adeiladu cartrefi yn gallu llwyddo i gyflenwi cartrefi sydd bron yn ddi-garbon.
translation.en: Evidence emerging from the programme’s predecessor suggests that modular and other modern methods of home construction can successfully deliver near zero carbon homes.

translation.cy: Y flwyddyn nesaf byddwn yn derbyn rhagor o gyngor ac argymhellion sy’n benodol i Gymru gan Bwyllgor y DU ar Newid yn yr Hinsawdd, gan gynnwys argymhellion am newid ein llwybr drwy ein targedau ar gyfer 2030 a 2040 a’n hail gyllideb garbon.
translation.en: Next year we will be receiving further Welsh-specific advice and recommendations from the UKCCC, including recommendations on changing our pathway through our 2030 and 2040 targets and our second carbon budget.

translation.cy: Mae'r rhain i gyd yn ddarnau pwysig o dystiolaeth y bydd angen i ni eu hadolygu wrth ddatblygu camau gweithredu yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: These are all key pieces of evidence which we will need to review in developing future actions.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cyflawni ein huchelgais rydym yn cynyddu’r cyllid sydd ar gael i Gyfoeth Naturiol Cymru gan roi cyfanswm sydd dros £60m yn 2020-21 i roi hwb i’w gwaith i fynd i’r afael â newid yn yr hinsawdd.
translation.en: To deliver on our ambitions we are increasing the funding available to Natural Resources Wales to a total of more than £60m in 2020-21 to boost their work to tackle climate change.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn cynnwys cynhyrchu ynni adnewyddadwy ar dir sector cyhoeddus, rheoli mwy o lifogydd mewn ffyrdd naturiol, a buddsoddi yn y dystiolaeth i ddod o hyd i’r cyfleoedd gorau ar gyfer ehangu coetiroedd, mawndiroedd a chynefinoedd pwysig eraill.
translation.en: This will include increased renewable energy generation on public sector land, increased natural flood management, and investment in the evidence to identify the best opportunities we have for expanding woodlands, peatlands and other important habitats.

translation.cy: Mewn adrannau lle ceir maes cymhwysedd datganoledig cymaradwy, byddai hyn yn arwain at gyfran Barnett o'r gostyngiad.
translation.en: In departments where there is a comparable devolved competency area then this would lead to a Barnett share of the reduction.

translation.cy: Gan fod  llawer o'r cynlluniau a ariennir gan gyfalaf trafodiadau ariannol yng Nghymru'n wahanol i'r rhai a ddatblygir gan adrannau Llywodraeth y DU rydym yn parhau i weithio gyda Thrysorlys Ei Mawrhydi i sicrhau nad yw newidiadau i'r driniaeth gyllidebol yn cosbi Cymru.
translation.en: As many of the schemes funded by financial transaction capital in Wales are different to those developed by UK Government departments we continue to work with HM Treasury to ensure that changes to the budgetary treatment does not penalise Wales.

translation.cy: Ym mis Gorffennaf 2019, aed ati i gaffael Partner Cyflenwi'r Sector Preifat i gefnogi'r prosiect addysg.
translation.en: In July 2019, the procurement of a Private Sector Deliver Partner (PSDP) to support the Education project commenced.

translation.cy: Ar draws ei hystod eang o ddarpariaethau, bydd Deddf Iechyd y Cyhoedd (Cymru) yn gwneud cyfraniad pwysig at iechyd y cyhoedd yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Across its broad range of provisions the Public Health (Wales) Act will make an important contribution to public health in Wales.

translation.cy: Tai a Llywodraeth Leol
translation.en: Housing and Local Government

translation.cy: rheoli’r amgylchedd hanesyddol mewn ffordd fwy cynaliadwy;
translation.en: to improve the sustainable management of the historic environment;

translation.cy: cofnodion yr amgylchedd hanesyddol a’r Panel Cynghori ar Amgylchedd Hanesyddol Cymru.
translation.en: historic environment records and the Advisory Panel for the Historic Environment in Wales.

translation.cy: Deddf Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol a'r Tribiwnlys Addysg (Cymru) 2018
translation.en: Additional Learning Needs and Education Tribunal (Wales) Act 2018

translation.cy: Edrych tuag at y Dyfodol
translation.en: Looking Forward

translation.cy: Mae’r proffesiwn yn dal i esblygu mewn ymateb i arloesi drwy dechnegau a darganfyddiadau gwyddonol newydd, ac wrth i lwybrau gofal a modelau gwasanaethau newydd gael eu datblygu a’u comisiynu.
translation.en: The profession continues to evolve in response to emerging innovations through new scientific techniques and discoveries, and as new care pathways and service models are developed and commissioned.

translation.cy: Bydd gwyddonwyr gofal iechyd, ar y cyd â gweithwyr iechyd proffesiynol eraill, yn gyfrifol am sicrhau nad yw’r gwasanaeth iechyd yn cael ei adael ar ôl a’i fod yn cyflawni’r potensial sy’n codi o dechnolegau newydd a datblygol.
translation.en: Healthcare scientists, alongside other healthcare professionals will be responsible for ensuring that the health service is not left behind and realises the potential arising from new and emerging technologies.

translation.cy: Er bod gan uwch-wyddonwyr gofal iechyd brofiad o reoli adnoddau clinigol, mwy felly fel arfer na’u cydweithwyr meddygol, nid ydynt wedi datblygu’n sylweddol i rolau arweinyddiaeth na gweithredol dylanwadol.
translation.en: Whilst more senior healthcare scientists have experience of management of clinical resources, typically more so than medical colleagues, they have not progressed substantially into influential leadership or executive roles.

translation.cy: Drwy roi sylw i heriau’r gweithlu, gwella setiau sgiliau, cyfathrebu’n effeithiol â phroffesiynau eraill, codi’r proffil proffesiynol a gweithio ar y cyd, gall gwyddonwyr gofal iechyd helpu i drawsnewid gwasanaethau drwy weithredu ar sail tystiolaeth a gwerth.
translation.en: By addressing workforce challenges, enhancing skill-sets, communicating effectively with other professions, raising the professional profile and working collaboratively, healthcare scientists can support the transformation of services by using evidence and value based approaches.

translation.cy: Er bod y ffigurau comisiynu am hyfforddiant wedi cynyddu dros y cyfnod hwn 42% mae rhagor i’w wneud i roi sylw i’r galwadau ar y gweithlu a rhoi sylw i heriau ar lefel y system a nodwyd yn yr Adolygiad Seneddol o Iechyd a Gofal Cymdeithasol [link to report].
translation.en: Whilst commissioning figures for training has increased over this period by 42% there is more to be done to address work force demands and address system level challenges that were identified in the Parliamentary Review of Health and Social Care [link to report].

translation.cy: Bydd harneisio a rhyddhau potensial gwyddor gofal iechyd drwy gyfrwng model a fframwaith uchelgeisiol a strategol ar gyfer gweithlu’r GIG, yn galluogi iddynt gyfrannu fwyfwy i’r gwaith o gynllunio a chyflenwi gwasanaethau clinigol.
translation.en: Harnessing and releasing the potential of healthcare science through an ambitious and strategic NHS workforce framework and model, will enable an increased contribution to clinical service planning and delivery.

translation.cy: Bydd angen i’r fframwaith hefyd chwilio am gyfleoedd ar gyfer datblygu proffesiynol ehangach drwy gydweithredu agosach a drwy gyd-benodiadau gyda phartneriaid academaidd yn y sector gwyddorau bywyd.
translation.en: The framework will also need to identify opportunities for wider professional development through closer collaborative working and joint appointments with academic partners in the life sciences sector.

translation.cy: Gwyddorau Ffisiolegol
translation.en: Physiological sciences

translation.cy: Caiff gwefan gwyddor gofal iechyd benodol ei datblygu (Gwyddor Gofal Iechyd Un) i gefnogi’r Rhwydwaith a gweithredu fel canolbwynt ar gyfer y gymuned gwyddor gofal iechyd yn GIG Cymru.
translation.en: The development of a dedicated healthcare science website (Healthcare Science One) will support the Network and act as a focal point for the healthcare science community in NHS Wales.

translation.cy: Bydd yr adroddiad yn disgrifio’r cynnydd yn erbyn yr holl gamau gweithredu a gynhwysir yn y ddogfen hon.
translation.en: The report will describe progress against each action contained within this document.

translation.cy: Mae angen datblygu strategaeth gweithlu fanwl i roi sylw i’r materion hyn er mwyn datblygu gweithlu darbodus cynaliadwy a modern i’r dyfodol.
translation.en: There is a need to develop a detailed workforce strategy to address these issues in order to develop a modern sustainable prudent workforce of the future.

translation.cy: Un ffordd i wyddor gofal iechyd roi sylw i’r prinder galwedigaethol hyn yw drwy ddatblygu ymarfer uwch ac estynedig sy’n gallu addasu i’r amgylchedd amlddisgyblaeth modern (e.e. Radiograffwyr adrodd, Gwyddonwyr Biofeddygol adrodd a dyrannu, Gwyddonwyr Clinigol Ymgynghorol mewn gwyddorau bywyd ac uwchawdiolegwyr ymarfer mewn gofal sylfaenol).
translation.en: One way in which healthcare science can address these known occupational shortages is by developing advanced and extended practice that is adaptive to the modern multidisciplinary environment (e.g. reporting Radiographers, dissecting and reporting Biomedical Scientists, Consultant Clinical Scientists in life sciences and advanced practice audiologists in primary care).

translation.cy: Er bod gwahanol ysgogwyr i Gymru fabwysiadu prentisiaethau gwyddor gofal iechyd yn ehangach, mae gofyn datblygu llwybrau gyrfaol hyblyg newydd;
translation.en: Although there are different drivers for Wales to adopt healthcare science apprenticeships more broadly, there is a requirement for the development of new flexible career pathways;

translation.cy: I wneud GIG Cymru yn amgylchedd mwy deniadol a llwyddiannus ar gyfer dysgu yn y gweithle, mae angen buddsoddi yn y seilwaith hyfforddiant, mewn lleoliadau o ansawdd da a rhannu ymarfer da ar draws disgyblaethau, proffesiynau a sefydliadau er mwyn cefnogi a datblygu hyfforddiant ac addysg yn y gweithle.
translation.en: To make NHS Wales a more attractive and successful environment for workplace learning, supporting and developing training and education in the workplace requires investment in the training infrastructure, high quality placements and the sharing of good practice across disciplines, professions and organisations.

translation.cy: Mae’r manteision a geir o roi sylw i recriwtio, cadw a chymysgu sgiliau gwyddonwyr gofal iechyd mewn system amlddisgyblaethol fel GIG Cymru yn amryfal.
translation.en: The benefits of addressing recruitment, retention and skill-mixing of healthcare scientists in a multi-disciplinary system such as NHS Wales are several-fold.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn nid yn unig yn helpu i lywio polisïau mewn ffordd fwy cydgysylltiedig ond yn bwysig bydd yn codi proffil gwyddor gofal iechyd, gan roi lle mwy amlwg i’r holl broffesiynau yng Nghymru a thu hwnt.
translation.en: Not only will this help inform policy in a more coordinated manner but importantly raise the profile of healthcare science, increasing the visibility of all the professions in Wales and beyond.

translation.cy: Cynyddu proffil gwyddor gofal iechyd yng Nghymru a hyrwyddo cyfleoedd gyrfaol mewn strategaeth ar gyfer y gweithlu.
translation.en: Raise profile of healthcare science in Wales and promote career opportunities within a workforce strategy.

translation.cy: Ystyried cyflwyno proses gynghori i arwain sefydliadau iechyd wrth iddynt recriwtio gwyddonwyr gofal iechyd.
translation.en: Consider introduction of an advisory process to guide health organisations in their recruitment of healthcare scientists.

translation.cy: Bydd gwybodaeth newydd ynglŷn â darparu’r gwasanaethau gorau posibl ynghyd â datblygiadau byd-eang mewn awtomeiddio, meddygaeth fanwl, digidoli, deallusrwydd artiffisial/dysgu peirianyddol, argraffu meinwe 3D, therapiwteg uwch a thechnoleg rhyngrwyd yn cael effeithiau mawr ar y gwasanaeth iechyd.
translation.en: New knowledge concerning optimal service delivery along with global developments in automation, precision medicine, digitalisation, artificial intelligence/machine learning, 3D tissue printing, advanced therapeutics and internet technology will have profound impacts on the health service.

translation.cy: Bydd y Rhwydwaith Gwyddor Gofal Iechyd yn cefnogi ceisiadau am gyllid, a lle bo angen, yn rheoli ymateb cydlynus gan wyddonwyr gofal iechyd i alwadau newydd am gyllid yng Nghymru a thu hwnt.
translation.en: The Healthcare Science Network will support funding applications, and where required, manage a coordinated response by healthcare scientists to new funding calls in Wales and beyond.

translation.cy: Nodi’r gwyddonwyr gofal iechyd mewn rôl arweinyddiaeth mewn ymchwil gymhwysol a’r rheini sy’n cynnal prosiectau ymchwil.
translation.en: Identify healthcare scientists in an applied research leadership role and those conducting research projects.

translation.cy: Diwylliant ac Integreiddio
translation.en: Culture and Integration

translation.cy: Mae’r gweithlu gwyddor gofal iechyd wedi’i wasgaru ar draws ymddiriedolaethau a byrddau iechyd prifysgol ac, o’r herwydd, ceir diffyg cydlyniant weithiau ar lefel y system yn y proffesiynau a phrin maent i’w gweld.
translation.en: The healthcare science workforce is dispersed throughout university health boards and trusts as a consequence the professions sometimes lack system level coherence and have little visibility.

translation.cy: Gall hefyd effeithio ar newid yn y system gyfan pan na chaiff pob rhan annatod o’r llwybr ei nodi neu’i gydnabod ac felly ni chaiff ei ystyried.
translation.en: It can also affect whole system change when each integral part of the pathway is not identified or recognised and therefore not considered.

translation.cy: Mae set sgiliau datrys problemau’r gweithlu gwyddor gofal iechyd yn adnodd nad yw’n cael ei ddefnyddio llawer wrth ddylunio gwasanaethau ar lefel y system, ond gall yn aml ddarparu cyfle unigryw i edrych o’r newydd ar yr heriau y mae GIG Cymru yn eu hwynebu a dwyn i mewn safbwyntiau gwahanol.
translation.en: The healthcare science workforce problem solving skill set is a relatively under utilised resource in system level service design but it can often provide a unique opportunity to look at the challenges faced by NHS Wales with fresh eyes and to bring a different perspective.

translation.cy: Manteisio ar gyfleoedd lle gellir datblygu rhaglenni aml-ddisgyblaeth e.e. arweinyddiaeth, gofal iechyd sy’n seiliedig ar werth, gwybodeg ac yn y blaen.
translation.en: To exploit opportunities where multi-disciplinary programmes can be developed e.g. leadership, value based healthcare, informatics etc.

translation.cy: Gweithio gyda Byrddau Iechyd, Ymddiriedolaethau ac AaGIC i wneud cynlluniau swyddi ar gyfer gwyddonwyr gofal iechyd er mwyn gwella diwylliant ac integreiddio, gan gynnwys cyfraniadau strategol/cenedlaethol cysylltiedig.
translation.en: Work with University Health Boards, Trusts and HEIW to develop job plans for healthcare scientists to improve culture and integration, including associated national/strategic contributions.

translation.cy: ‘Y Nod Pedwarplyg i Bawb’
translation.en: ‘The Quadruple Aim for All’

translation.cy: Gall gofal iechyd fod yn hynod gymhleth, felly mae angen inni wneud popeth yn ein gallu i leihau’r risgiau sy’n gallu achosi niwed.
translation.en: Healthcare can be very complex so we need to do all we can to reduce risks that can cause harm.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, ceir amrywiaeth yn y ffordd y caiff rheoliadau proffesiynol eu cymhwyso ar draws ym maes gwyddor gofal iechyd.
translation.en: Similarly, there is variation in the application of professional regulation across healthcare science.

translation.cy: Mae Ysgrifennydd y Cabinet dros yr Amgylchedd a Materion Gwledig wedi cytuno i barhau i fuddsoddi mewn cynllun a arweinir gan alw o fis Medi 2017 a diben yr ymgynghoriad hwn yw ceisio barn rhanddeiliaid ar y broses o ddylunio a chyflwyno cynllun newydd.
translation.en: The Cabinet Secretary for Environment and Rural Affairs has agreed to continue investing in a demand-led scheme from September 2017 and this consultation seeks the views of stakeholders on the design and delivery of a new scheme.

translation.cy: Mae'r ymchwil hefyd yn amcangyfrif effaith gwelliannau o ran effeithlonrwydd ynni ar lefelau o dlodi tanwydd.
translation.en: The research also estimates the impact of energy efficiency improvements on levels of fuel poverty.

translation.cy: Mae'r cynllun yn gweithredu gwasanaeth cyngor a derbyn galwadau pen-blaen, a ddarperir gan yr Ymddiriedolaeth Arbed Ynni, a bydd yn cynnal asesiad cychwynnol o gymhwysedd y sawl sy'n ffonio am becyn o welliannau ynni yn y cartref.
translation.en: The scheme operates a front-end call handling and advice service, which is delivered by EST, and undertakes an initial assessment of the caller’s eligibility for a package of home energy improvements.

translation.cy: O dan y contract presennol, mae Nyth yn anelu at roi cyngor a chymorth i hyd at 15,000 o aelwydydd bob blwyddyn, gyda thua 4,000 o'r aelwydydd hyn yn cael gwelliannau ynni i'r cartref.
translation.en: Under the existing contract, Nest aims to provide advice and support to up to 15,000 householders per annum, with around 4,000 of these householders receiving home energy improvements.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae tystiolaeth y gallai newidiadau i'r cynllun presennol wella'r gwaith o dargedu a chynorthwyo'r aelwydydd hynny â'r angen mwyaf ac sy'n wynebu'r risg fwyaf rhag byw mewn cartref oer.
translation.en: However, there is evidence that changes to the existing scheme could further improve the targeting of and support for households most in need and most at risk from living in a cold home.

translation.cy: Mae angen gwneud y broses gwneud cais yn fwy hygyrch i rai grwpiau, fel y rheini ag anawsterau gweld a chlywed, anableddau neu broblemau iechyd meddwl.
translation.en: There is a need for improvement in the accessibility of the application process to certain groups such as those with sight and hearing difficulties, disabilities or mental health problems.

translation.cy: Yn 2015, comisiynodd Llywodraeth Cymru ymchwil annibynnol er mwyn helpu i lywio'r gwaith o dargedu unrhyw gynllun effeithlonrwydd ynni a thlodi tanwydd a arweinir gan alw yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: In 2015, the Welsh Government commissioned independent research to help inform the targeting of any future demand-led energy efficiency and fuel poverty scheme.

translation.cy: Dylai'r cynllun hefyd wneud ymdrech benodol i recriwtio asiantaethau atgyfeirio trydydd parti sy'n gweithio mewn ardaloedd gwledig.
translation.en: The scheme should also make particular efforts to recruit third party referral agencies working in rural areas.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, gwnaethom ofyn i CSE wneud peth gwaith ychwanegol gan edrych yn bennaf ar effaith dileu'r sector rhentu preifat ar y meini prawf cymhwysedd sy'n weddill.
translation.en: However, we asked CSE to undertake some additional work looking primarily at the impact on the remaining eligibility criteria if the private rented sector was removed.

translation.cy: Caiff canfyddiadau’r gwaith ychwanegol hwn ei ddefnyddio i ddatblygu meini prawf a therfynau gwario fesul teulu y cynllun newydd ymhellach.
translation.en: The findings of this additional work will be used to further develop the eligibility criteria and spending caps per household for the new scheme.

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd angen dod o hyd i ffyrdd amgen o annog buddsoddiad mewn mesurau effeithlonrwydd ynni yn y sector rhentu preifat.
translation.en: Alternatives may need to be found for encouraging investment in energy efficiency measures in the private rented sector.

translation.cy: Gallai'r rhain gynnwys benthyciadau ad-daladwy cost isel a gynigir drwy wahanol fentrau Llywodraeth Cymru at ddibenion eraill, er enghraifft y Cynllun Benthyciadau Gwella Cartrefi Cenedlaethol £10m, 15 mlynedd, a gyflawnir drwy awdurdodau lleol yng Nghymru ar hyn o bryd.
translation.en: These might include low-cost repayable loans offered through various Welsh Government initiatives for other purposes, for example the 15 year, £10m National Home Improvement Loan Scheme, currently delivered through local authorities in Wales.

translation.cy: Dangosodd y gwerthusiad o gynllun Nyth fod cefnogaeth gref ymhlith rhanddeiliaid yn gyffredinol i weithredu ar sail cartref cyfan, lle mae asesydd ynni cymwysedig yn argymell y mesurau effeithlonrwydd ynni mwyaf priodol a chost-effeithiol er mwyn gwella eiddo penodol.
translation.en: The evaluation of the Nest scheme generally identified strong support from stakeholders for use of the whole house approach, where a qualified energy assessor recommends the most appropriate and cost effective energy efficiency measures to improve specific properties.

translation.cy: Cwestiwn 2 - Ydych chi'n cytuno y dylai'r cynllun newydd barhau i weithredu ar sail cartref cyfan o ran cyflwyno mesurau effeithlonrwydd ynni?
translation.en: Question 2 – Do you agree that the new scheme should continue with the whole house approach to energy efficiency measures?

translation.cy: Diben Deddf Trawsblannu Dynol (Cymru) 2013 yw newid y ffordd y mae cydsyniad i gael ei roi o ran rhoi organau a meinweoedd yng Nghymru, at ddibenion trawsblannu.
translation.en: The purpose of the Human Transplantation (Wales) Act 2013 is to change the way in which consent is to be given to organ and tissue donation in Wales, for the purposes of transplantation.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, yn ymarferol, ni fydd pobl na ellir eu hadnabod neu na ellir dod o hyd i’w perthynas agosaf yn ddarostyngedig i gydsyniad a ystyrir, gan na fyddai’n bosibl cadarnhau a oedd y person yn bodloni meini prawf allweddol gan gynnwys preswyliad.
translation.en: In addition, in practice people who cannot be identified or whose next of kin cannot be found will not be subject to deemed consent, since it would not be possible to check whether the person satisfied key criteria including residency.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ddeddf felly’n creu sefyllfa ddiofyn pan ystyrir bod oedolion wedi rhoi eu cydsyniad oni bai eu bod yn gwrthwynebu.
translation.en: The Act therefore creates a default position where adults are considered (deemed) to have given their consent unless they object.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, nid ystyrir bod cydsyniad wedi ei roi pan fo perthynas neu gyfaill ers amser maith yn gwrthwynebu’r cydsyniad ar sail y ffaith ei fod yn gwybod na fyddai’r ymadawedig wedi cydsynio i roi ei organau a’i feinweoedd at ddiben trawsblannu.
translation.en: However, consent will not be deemed where a relative or friend of long standing objects on the basis they knew that the deceased would not have consented to their organs and tissues being donated for the purpose of transplantation.

translation.cy: CYMHWYSIAD TIRIOGAETHOL

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, er mwyn cynnal trefn drawsffiniol effeithiol yn nhermau gweithredu rhaglen trawsblannu organau ledled y DU, mae’n anochel y bydd cyswllt â Deddf 2004.
translation.en: However, in order to maintain an effective cross-border regime in terms of the operation of the UK-wide organ transplantation programme, there is an inevitable interplay with the 2004 Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r rhain yn cynnwys darpariaethau sy’n ymwneud â’r Awdurdod Meinweoedd Dynol ac adrannau 8 (cyfyngu ar weithgareddau mewn perthynas â deunydd wedi ei roi), 33 (cyfyngu ar drawsblaniadau sy’n ymwneud â rhoddwyr byw) a 34 (gwybodaeth am lawdriniaethau trawsblannu) yn Neddf 2004.
translation.en: These include provisions relating to the Human Tissue Authority and sections 8 (restriction of activities in relation to donated material), 33 (restriction on transplants involving a live donor) and 34 (information about transplant operations) of the 2004 Act.

translation.en: This is the key provision which provides that consent is required in order to carry out a transplantation activity.

translation.cy: Mae’n cyflwyno’r cysyniadau o gydsyniad a ystyrir a chydsyniad datganedig.
translation.en: It introduces the concepts of deemed and express consent.

translation.cy: 15.	Mae’r gweithgareddau eu hunain unwaith eto wedi eu seilio ar y rheini yn adran 1 o Ddeddf 2004.
translation.en: 15. The activities themselves are again based on those contained in section 1 of the 2004 Act.

translation.cy: 16.	Mae is-adran (3) yn ei gwneud yn gyfreithlon storio a defnyddio deunydd perthnasol pan fo organau a meinweoedd wedi cael eu mewnforio i Gymru o’r tu allan i Gymru.
translation.en: 16.	Subsection (3) makes the storage and use of relevant material lawful where organs and tissues have been imported into Wales from outside Wales.

translation.cy: 17.	Mae’r adran hon yn cyflwyno’r cysyniad o gydsyniad a ystyrir.
translation.en: 17. This section introduces the concept of deemed consent.

translation.cy: pan fo’r oedolyn wedi marw ond roedd ei benderfyniad o ran cydsynio i drawsblannu ai peidio mewn grym yn union cyn iddo farw – mewn achosion o’r fath y penderfyniad hwnnw sy’n drech;
translation.en: where the adult has died but a decision of his or hers whether or not to consent to transplantation was in force immediately before death – in such cases that decision prevails;

translation.cy: Byddai Deddf 2004 yn gymwys ac felly, cyfrifoldeb person mewn perthynas gymhwysol fyddai gwneud penderfyniad yn absenoldeb cydsyniad datganedig.
translation.en: The 2004 Act would apply and therefore a person in a qualifying relationship would decide in the absence of express consent.

translation.cy: Y ffordd gyntaf yw bod Deddf 2004 yn parhau i fod yn gymwys pan fo’r gweithgaredd trawsblannu yn cael ei gynnal yn Lloegr neu yng Ngogledd Iwerddon.
translation.en: The first is that the 2004 Act continues to apply where the transplantation activity takes place in England or Northern Ireland.

translation.cy: Yn ail o dan y Ddeddf honno yr un cwestiwn ffeithiol sydd, yn ymwneud ag a oedd penderfyniad yr ymadawedig ynghylch cydsyniad (yn ymarferol, bod ei enw ar y Gofrestr Rhoddwyr Organau) mewn grym pan fu farw.
translation.en: Secondly under that Act the question of fact relating to whether a decision of the deceased relating to consent (in practice being on the Organ Donor Register) was in force when he or she died is the same.

translation.cy: bod yn seiliedig ar wybodaeth a ddarparwyd am ddymuniadau’r ymadawedig sy’n dynodi na fyddai’r ymadawedig wedi cydsynio i weithgareddau trawsblannu.
translation.en: be based on information provided about the deceased’s wishes that indicates that the deceased would not have consented to transplantation activities.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn atgynhyrchu’r sefyllfa gyfreithiol bresennol o dan Ddeddf Meinweoedd Dynol 2004 (Deddf 2004) ac yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol cael naill ai cydsyniad datganedig yr unigolyn, cydsyniad datganedig perthynas cymhwysol neu gydsyniad datganedig y cynrychiolydd penodedig.
translation.en: This section replicates the existing legal position under the Human Tissue Act 2004 (the 2004 Act) and requires either the express consent of the individual, the express consent of a qualifying relative or the express consent of an appointed representative.

translation.cy: Dim ond i roddwyr marw, ac nid i roddwyr byw, y mae’n gymwys.
translation.en: It applies to deceased donation only, and not living donation.

translation.cy: Yn anad dim mae’n fater o raddau a ffeithiau ac mae’n awgrymu rhyw arferiad bywyd.
translation.en: Ordinarily resident is primarily a question of degree and fact and suggests some habit of life.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, gan mai enghreifftiau yw’r rhain, nid oes angen i reoliadau eu cynnwys neu cânt bennu bod mathau eraill o ddeunydd i’w heithrio.
translation.en: However, since these are examples, regulations need not include them or may specify that other forms of material are to be excluded.

translation.cy: Mae adran 8(12) yn pennu, os nad yw’n rhesymol ymarferol cyfathrebu â chynrychiolydd penodedig mewn da bryd i allu gweithredu ar gydsyniad, y trinnir y cynrychiolydd penodedig fel pe na bai’n gallu rhoi cydsyniad.
translation.en: Section 8(12) specifies that if it is not reasonably practicable to communicate with an appointed representative, in time for consent to be acted on, then the appointed representative is treated as not able to give consent.

translation.cy: Mae cydsyniad a ystyrir yn y cyd-destun hwn yn wahanol i ddarpariaethau cydsyniad a ystyrir a nodir yn adran 4, sy’n ymwneud â rhoddwyr ymadawedig.
translation.en: Deemed consent in this context is different from the deemed consent provisions set out in section 4, which relate to deceased donors.

translation.cy: Mae gan berson esgus dilys, fodd bynnag, os oedd y person o dan sylw yn credu’n rhesymol fod cydsyniad wedi ei roi.
translation.en: A person has a valid excuse, however, if the person concerned reasonably believed that consent was in place.

translation.cy: Gan fod y ddarpariaeth wedi ei seilio ar sylfaen ychydig yn wahanol i Ddeddf 2004 (gan nad oes term sy’n hollol gyfatebol i gydsyniad priodol yn y Ddeddf) mae angen eithrio’n ddatganedig ddarpariaethau eraill yn y Ddeddf sy’n gwneud gweithgareddau trawsblannu yn gyfreithlon heb gydsyniad.
translation.en: As the provision is built on a slightly different foundation than the 2004 Act (there being no exact equivalent of “appropriate consent” in the Act) there is a need to expressly exclude other provisions in the Act which make transplantation activities lawful without consent.

translation.en: INTRODUCTION

translation.cy: Mae'r Nodiadau Esboniadol hyn yn ymwneud â Deddf Teithio Llesol (Cymru) 2013 a basiwyd gan Gynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru ar 1 Hydref 2013 ac a dderbyniodd Gydsyniad Brenhinol ar 4 Tachwedd 2013.
translation.en: These Explanatory Notes are for the Active Travel (Wales) Act 2013 which was passed by the National Assembly for Wales on 1 October 2013 and received Royal Assent on 4 November 2013.

translation.cy: Dynodir mannau lle caiff llwybrau teithio llesol eu lleoli drwy gyfarwyddyd Gweinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: Localities within which active travel routes are to be situated will be designated by direction of the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Cânt hefyd roi disgrifiad o'r mannau drwy gyfeirio at feini prawf, gan gynnwys y rhai a restrir yn is-adran (5).
translation.en: They may also specify a description of localities with reference to criteria, including those listed in subsection (5).

translation.cy: Rhaid i bob awdurdod lleol lunio map sy'n dangos y llwybrau teithio llesol presennol a'r cyfleusterau cysylltiedig yn ei ardal.
translation.en: Every local authority must prepare a map showing the existing active travel routes and related facilities in their area.

translation.cy: Mae Gweinidogion Cymru yn bwriadu dyroddi canllawiau o dan yr is-adran hon, a allai gynnwys sut y caiff y llwybrau eu dangos ar y mapiau, ffurf y mapiau a'r broses y mae’n rhaid ei chyflawni i lunio'r mapiau ac ymgynghori arnynt.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers intend to issue guidance under this subsection, which might include how the routes are depicted, the form of the maps and the process that must be undertaken to prepare and consult on the maps.

translation.cy: Ar yr un adeg â chyflwyno eu mapiau llwybrau presennol, bydd hefyd yn ofynnol i awdurdodau lleol gyflwyno datganiad yn rhoi manylion unrhyw lwybrau teithio llesol sydd wedi cael eu cynnwys ar y mapiau nad ydynt yn bodloni safonau a bennwyd yn y canllawiau ac yn egluro pam, er hynny, yr ystyrir y llwybrau hyn yn llwybrau teithio llesol priodol.
translation.en: At the same time as submitting their existing routes maps, local authorities will be required to also submit a statement detailing any active travel routes that have been included on the maps that do not meet standards specified in guidance and explaining why it is considered appropriate to nevertheless regard these routes as active travel routes.

translation.cy: Mae'r cynlluniau hyn yn nodi'r polisïau trafnidiaeth lleol ar gyfer y rhanbarth, gan gynnwys y polisïau i weithredu Strategaeth Drafnidiaeth Cymru yn y rhanbarth. Lluniwyd y strategaeth honno gan Weinidogion Cymru yn unol ag adran 2(1) o Ddeddf Trafnidiaeth (Cymru) 2006.
translation.en: These plans set out the local transport policies for the region, including policies for the implementation in the region of the Wales Transport Strategy prepared by the Welsh Ministers pursuant to section 2(1) of the Transport (Wales) Act 2006.

translation.cy: Bydd Gweinidogion Cymru yn dyroddi canllawiau i helpu awdurdodau lleol i gyflawni'r ddyletswydd hon.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers will issue guidance to support local authorities in carrying out this duty.

translation.cy: Adran 8 – Adroddiadau gan Weinidogion Cymru ar deithio llesol
translation.en: Section 8 – Reports by Welsh Ministers on active travel

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i Weinidogion Cymru ac awdurdodau lleol arfer eu swyddogaethau o dan y Ddeddf mewn modd sy’n hyrwyddo teithiau teithio llesol a sicrhau llwybrau a gwasanaethau teithio llesol newydd a gwell.
translation.en: This section requires the Welsh Ministers and local authorities to exercise their functions under the Act in a manner designed to promote active travel journeys and secure new and improved active travel routes and services.

translation.cy: Adran 2 hon yn cydgrynhoi yn y Ddeddf y ddarpariaeth sydd yn adran 235 o Ddeddf Llywodraeth Leol 1972 (“Deddf 1972”).
translation.en: Section 2 consolidates the provision of section 235 of the Local Government Act 1972 “the 1972 Act”) into the Act.

translation.cy: Bydd awdurdod deddfu yn gallu llunio is-ddeddf newydd yn lle is-ddeddf sydd bellach yn anarferedig (a gaiff ei dirymu ganddo yn unol â’i bwerau o dan adran 4).
translation.en: A legislating authority will be able to replace an obsolete byelaw (which it revokes pursuant to its powers under section 4) with a new byelaw.

translation.cy: Os lluniwyd yr is-ddeddf wreiddiol o dan ddeddfiad nas rhestrwyd yn Rhan 1 o Atodlen 1, fodd bynnag, yna bydd y weithdrefn yn adran 7 yn berthnasol i ddirymu’r is-ddeddfau, a bydd angen cadarnhad.
translation.en: However where the original byelaw was made under an enactment not listed in Part 1 of Schedule 1, then the procedure in section 7 will apply to the revocation of the byelaws and confirmation will be required.

translation.cy: Cyn gwneud gorchymyn i ddirymu is-ddeddf, rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru ymgynghori ag unrhyw bersonau, gan gynnwys cyngor cymuned, sy’n debygol o fod â buddiant yn nirymiad yr is-ddeddf neu o gael ei heffeithio gan hynny, yn eu tyb hwy.
translation.en: Prior to making an order to revoke a byelaw the Welsh Ministers must consult with any person including a community council who they think is likely to be interested in, or affected by, the revocation of the byelaw.

translation.cy: Adran 6 hon yn rhagnodi'r weithdrefn amgen i awdurdod deddfu wneud is-ddeddf na fydd yn gofyn am gadarnhad gan Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: Section 6 prescribes the alternative procedure for a legislating authority to make a byelaw which will not require confirmation by the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Gwneud yr is-ddeddfau a rhoi effaith iddynt.
translation.en: Making and the coming into effect of byelaws.

translation.cy: Rhaid i'r awdurdod deddfu ymgynghori ag unrhyw bersonau (gan gynnwys cyngor cymuned os yw hynny’n berthnasol) y mae'r awdurdod o'r farn eu bod yn debygol o fod â buddiant yn y mater neu'n cael eu heffeithio ganddo ac, ar ôl ymgynghori â hwy, benderfynu ai gwneud is-ddeddfau yw'r ffordd fwyaf priodol ymlaen.
translation.en: The legislating authority must consult persons (including a community council where applicable) likely to be interested in, or affected by, the issue and, following consultation, to decide whether making byelaws is the most appropriate way forward.

translation.cy: Os yw hynny’n berthnasol, rhaid i’r awdurdod deddfu hefyd sicrhau bod copi o’r is-ddeddf yn cael ei anfon at yr holl gynghorau cymuned y cred yr awdurdod deddfu fod yr is-ddeddf yn debygol o effeithio ar eu hardaloedd.
translation.en: The legislating authority, where applicable, must also ensure that a copy of the byelaw is sent to all community councils whose areas the legislating authority thinks are likely to be affected by the byelaw.

translation.cy: Caiff awdurdod deddfu godi ffi resymol am ddarparu copi o is-ddeddfau drafft i unrhyw berson.
translation.en: A legislating authority may charge a reasonable fee for providing a copy of draft byelaws to any person.

translation.cy: Cyhoeddi’r penderfyniad a'r is-ddeddf(au) drafft, fel y bo’n briodol;
translation.en: Publication of the decision and the proposed byelaw(s), as appropriate;

translation.cy: Yna rhaid i'r awdurdod deddfu gyhoeddi ail ddatganiad ysgrifenedig sy'n cynnwys y datganiad ysgrifenedig cychwynnol, crynodeb o'r ymatebion i'r ymgynghoriad, manylion y penderfyniad y daethpwyd iddo wedi i'r ymarfer ymgynghori ddod i ben a'r rhesymau dros y penderfyniad hwnnw.
translation.en: The legislating authority must then publish a second written statement which contains the initial written statement, a summary of consultation responses, details of the decision reached following the conclusion of the consultation exercise and the rationale for that decision.

translation.cy: Am o leiaf 6 wythnos cyn cyflwyno’r is-ddeddf i’w chadarnhau rhaid i’r awdurdod deddfu hefyd gyhoeddi’r is-ddeddf arfaethedig ar wefan yr awdurdod deddfu, rhoi copi ar adnau mewn man yn ardal yr awdurdod deddfu a sicrhau bod copi ar gael i'r cyhoedd edrych arno yn ddi-dâl, yn ystod pob awr resymol.
translation.en: The legislating authority must also for at least 6 weeks prior to submitting the byelaw for confirmation publish the proposed byelaws on the legislating authorities website, place a copy on deposit at a place in the legislating authorities area and ensure that a copy is open to public inspection at all reasonable hours without payment.

translation.cy: Dylid nodi na fydd y gweithdrefnau a ddisgrifir yn yr adran hon yn gymwys ond i'r graddau na fydd darpariaeth benodol ynglŷn â’r weithdrefn wedi ei gwneud fel arall.
translation.en: It should be noted that the procedures described in the section only apply to the extent that specific provision as to the procedure is not otherwise made.

translation.cy: Mae isadran (5) yn darparu bod gan y sawl sy'n cael hysbysiad cosb benodedig bedwar diwrnod ar ddeg ar ôl iddo gael yr hysbysiad i dalu'r gosb benodedig a thrwy hynny osgoi mynd i Lys yr Ynadon mewn cysylltiad â'r tramgwydd.
translation.en: Subsection (5) provides that, following receipt of a fixed penalty notice, the recipient has fourteen days in which to pay the specified fine, and thus avoid attending the Magistrates’ Court in respect of the offence.

translation.cy: Bydd y sawl nad yw, heb esgus rhesymol, yn rhoi ei enw na'i gyfeiriad neu sy'n rhoi enw a chyfeiriad ffug yn cyflawni tramgwydd a bydd yn agored ar gollfarn ddiannod i ddirwy nad yw'n uwch na lefel tri ar y raddfa safonol (£1,000 ar hyn o bryd).
translation.en: A person who fails without reasonable excuse to give their name and address, or gives a false name and address, will commit an offence and is liable on summary conviction to fine not exceeding level three on the standard scale (currently £1,000).

translation.en: Such related matters will include guidance on consulting on and publicising new byelaws, good practice in relation to byelaws and the use of fixed penalty notices.

translation.cy: Mae’n gwneud darpariaeth ar gyfer darparu tystiolaeth bod is-ddeddfau a wnaed gan awdurdod deddfu yn bodoli pan na fydd yr is-ddeddfau hynny yn ddarostyngedig i’r weithdrefn gadarnhau.
translation.en: It makes provision for evidencing the existence of byelaws made by a legislating authority for byelaws made that are not subject to the confirmation procedure.

translation.cy: Adran 20 hon yn darparu ar gyfer rhoi effaith i Atodlen 2 i’r Ddeddf sy’n gwneud mân ddiwygiadau a diwygiadau canlyniadol i nifer o ddeddfiadau sy’n cynnwys darpariaethau ynghylch gwneud is-ddeddfau yn ddarostyngedig i’r weithdrefn gadarnhau yn unol ag adran 236 o Ddeddf 1972.

translation.cy: Rhaid i‘r strategaeth nodi amcanion a fydd yn cyfrannu at atal gordewdra a lleihau lefelau gordewdra, yn ogystal â chamau gweithredu ar gyfer cyflawni‘r amcanion.
translation.en: The strategy must set out objectives which will contribute both to preventing obesity and reducing obesity levels, as well as actions for achieving the objectives.

translation.cy: Cyfeirir atynt fel 'mangreoedd di-fwg‘.
translation.en: These are referred to as ‘smoke-free premises’.

translation.cy: Nid yw‘n cwmpasu "e-sigaréts".
translation.en: It does not encompass “e-cigarettes”.

translation.cy: Adran 6 - Y drosedd o fethu ag atal ysmygu mewn mangre ddi-fwg
translation.en: Section 6 - Offence of failing to prevent smoking in smoke-free premises

translation.cy: Pan fo rhannau o‘r fangre yn unig yn cael eu defnyddio fel man gwaith, dim ond y rhannau hynny sy‘n ddi-fwg.
translation.en: Where only parts of the premises are used as a place of work, only those parts are smoke-free.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, felly, os yw person yn defnyddio ei gartref fel gweithle, a‘i bod yn bosibl y daw aelodau o‘r cyhoedd yno i gael y nwyddau neu‘r gwasanaethau a gynigir, yna dim ond yn y rhannau ohono a ddefnyddir fel gweithle, a dim ond pan fo‘r rhannau hynny yn cael eu defnyddio gan y person ar gyfer ei waith, y bydd ei gartref yn ddi-fwg.
translation.en: So for instance if a person uses their home as a workplace, and members of the public might come to it to obtain the goods or services offered, his/her home will be smoke-free only in the parts of it used as a workplace, and only when those parts are being used by the person for work.

translation.cy: Mae‘r gofynion hyn yn canolbwyntio ar unrhyw ymwneud ar ran awdurdodau lleol, y diben y defnyddir y fangre ato, a phresenoldeb cyfarpar maes chwarae.
translation.en: Theserequirements focus on local authority involvement, the purpose for which the premises are used, and the presence of playground equipment.

translation.cy: Nid oes angen i‘r mangreoedd hyn fod yn gaeedig neu‘n sylweddol gaeedig (h.y. cânt fod yn fannau agored).
translation.en: These premises do not need to be enclosed or substantially enclosed (i.e. they may be open spaces).

translation.cy: Ni chaniateir gwneud mangre a ddefnyddir yn gyfan gwbl neu‘n bennaf fel annedd yn ddi-fwg gan ddefnyddio‘r pŵer hwn i wneud rheoliadau.
translation.en: Premises used wholly or mainly as a dwelling cannot be made smoke-free using this regulation-making power.

translation.cy: Mae‘r rheoliadau hyn yn parhau yn eu lle hyd nes i reoliadau gael eu gwneud gan ddefnyddio‘r pwerau yn yr adran hon o‘r Ddeddf hon.
translation.en: These regulations stay in place until regulations are made using the powers in this section of this Act.

translation.cy: Dim ond pan fo Gweinidogion Cymru wedi eu bodloni bod dynodi cerbyd yn ddi-fwg yn debygol o gyfrannu at hybu iechyd pobl Cymru y cânt ddynodi‘r cerbyd hwnnw.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers can only designate a vehicle as being smoke-free where they are satisfied that designating that vehicle is likely to contribute towards the promotion of the health of the people of Wales.

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru hefyd wneud rheoliadau sy‘n gosod dyletswydd gyfatebol ar y rheini sy‘n meddiannu neu‘n rheoli mangreoedd di-fwg ychwanegol (adran 13) a cherbydau di-fwg (adran 15).
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may also make regulations that place a corresponding duty on those who occupy or manage additional smoke-free premises (section 13) and smoke-free vehicles (section 15).

translation.cy: Mae‘r adran hefyd yn gosod dyletswydd ar awdurdodau gorfodi i orfodi‘r darpariaethau di-fwg yn y Bennod hon.
translation.en: The section also places a duty on enforcement authorities to enforce the smoke-free provisions in this Chapter.

translation.cy: Adran 30 - Dyletswydd i gynnal cofrestr o fanwerthwyr tybaco a chynhyrchion nicotin
translation.en: Section 30 - Duty to maintain register of retailers of tobacco and nicotine products

translation.cy: Ni chaniateir i fangre gael ei hychwanegu at y gofrestr os yw ar hyn o bryd yn ddarostyngedig i Orchymyn Mangre o dan Gyfyngiad o dan adran 12A o Ddeddf Plant a Phobl Ifanc 1933.
translation.en: Premises cannot be added to the register if they are currently subject to a Restricted Premises Order under section 12A of the Children and Young Persons Act 1933.

translation.cy: Adran 34 - Dyletswydd i ddiwygio'r gofrestr
translation.en: Section 34 - Duty to revise the register

translation.cy: Mae‘r adran hon yn nodi manylion ynghylch pryd y mae rhaid i‘r awdurdod cofrestru wneud newidiadau i‘r gofrestr a‘r broses y mae rhaid iddo ei dilyn wrth wneud hyn.
translation.en: This section sets out details of when the registration authority must make changes to the register and the process it must follow in doing this.

translation.cy: Pan fo‘r busnes yn cael ei gynnal o gerbyd, stondin, pabell neu strwythur symudol arall, rhaid i‘r rhestr nodi pob awdurdod lleol y mae‘n gweithredu ynddo.
translation.en: Where the business is carried on from a vehicle, stall, tent or other moveable structure, the list must indicate each local authority in which it operates.
