translation.en: the local authority maintains an IDP for a child35 and the child becomes looked after by that local authority, in which case the local authority mustcontinue to maintain the plan, but on the basis that the child is looked after;

translation.cy: Os nad oes gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY bellach, nid oes angen cynnal CDU, ac mae'r Ddeddf yn amlinellu'r broses ar gyfer peidio â'i gynnal.
translation.en: If a child or young person no longer has ALN, there is no need for an IDP to be maintained, and the Act sets out the process by which it can cease to be maintained.

translation.cy: Dim ond o ganlyniad i gasgliad adolygiad o'r CDU y dylai ysgol a gynhelir, sefydliad addysg bellach neu awdurdod lleol benderfynu nad oes gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY bellach (gweler Pennod 25 i gael gwybod am adolygiadau).
translation.en: A decision by a maintained school, FEI or local authority that a child or young person no longer has ALN shouldonly be reached as a conclusion of a review of the IDP (see Chapter 25 for information about reviews).

translation.cy: Mae gan blentyn, ei riant neu berson ifanc 4 wythnos i ofyn i'r awdurdod lleol cyfrifol ailystyried penderfyniad yr ysgol a gynhelir.
translation.en: A child, their parent or a young person has 4 weeks within which to request the responsible local authority to reconsider the maintained school’s decision.

translation.cy: Pan wneir cais o'r fath o fewn y cyfnod hwnnw, rhaid i'r awdurdod lleol benderfynu a ddylai'r ysgol roi'r gorauigynnal y CDU a rhaididdo hysbysu'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc, yn achos plentyn, rhiant y plentyn ac (ym mhob achos) yr ysgol am y penderfyniad a'r rhesymau drosto.
translation.en: Where such a request is made within that period, the local authority must decide whether the school should cease to maintain the IDPandmust notify the child  or young person, in the case of a child, the child’s parent and (in all cases) the school of the decision and the reasons for it.

translation.cy: Cyn gynted ag y bydd yr awdurdod lleol penderfynu, bydd y penderfyniad hwnnw'n disodli penderfyniad yr ysgol a bydd modd apelio i'r Tribiwnlys yn ei gylch.
translation.en: Once made, the local authority’s decision replaces the school’s decision and is appealable to the Tribunal.

translation.cy: Mae cyfeillion achos yn arbennig o bwysig pan fydd ar blentyn nad oes ganddo alluedd angen cyflwyno apêl yn ei enw ei hun, er enghraifft pan nad oes ganddo riant sy’n fodlon neu’n gallu mynd ati ar ran y plentyn i ddatrys anghydfod neu gyflwyno achos i’r Tribiwnlys.
translation.en: Case friends are particularly important when a child who lacks capacity needs to bring an appeal in their own name, for example, when they do not have a parent who is willing or able to pursue dispute resolution or bring a case to the Tribunal for the child.

translation.cy: Os bydd awdurdod lleol, corff llywodraethu ysgol neu un o gyrff y GIG yn ystyried nad oes gan blentyn alluedd, nid yw’r dyletswyddau neu’r amodau penodol canlynol yn gymwys:
translation.en: If a local authority, governing body of a school, or NHS body considers that a child lacks capacity, then the following specific duties or conditions, do not apply:

translation.cy: 11 O dan adran 28(1) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 11 Under section 28(1) of the Act.

translation.cy: Os yw plentyn neu riant y plentyn yn anghytuno â phenderfyniad nad oes gan y plentyn alluedd, gellir ei herio fel a ganlyn:
translation.en: Where a child or the child’s parent disagrees with a decision that a child does not have capacity, this can be challenged in the following ways:

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, os yw plentyn yn cyflwyno apêl ei hun heb gyfaill achos, gall y Tribiwnlys asesu galluedd y plentyn.  Os yw’r Tribiwnlys o’r farn nad yw’r plentyn yn deall yr hyn y mae’n ei olygu i arfer ei hawliau, bydd yn atal yr achos hyd nes bod cyfaill achos wedi’i benodi.
translation.en: For example, if a child is bringing an appeal on their own without a case friend, the Tribunal may make an assessment on the child’s capacity and if the Tribunal believes the child does not understand what it means to exercise their rights, the Tribunal will halt proceedings until a case friend has been appointed.

translation.cy: Yn y rhan fwyaf o achosion, bydd tystiolaeth gan athro’r plentyn neu weithwyr proffesiynol perthnasol eraill sy’n adnabod y plentyn yn ddigon i’r Tribiwnlys wneud ei asesiad ar alluedd y plentyn.
translation.en: In most cases, evidence from the child’s teacher or other relevant professionals who know the child will be sufficient for the Tribunal to make their assessment on the child’s capacity.

translation.cy: Mae gan blant, a rhieni, hawl i gyflwyno apêl i’r Tribiwnlys.
translation.en: Children, as well as parents, have rights to bring appeals to the Tribunal.

translation.cy: Pan fo angen, gall plentyn ddefnyddio cyfeillion achos yn gynharach yn y broses cyn gweithdrefn fwy ffurfiol ar gyfer datrys anghydfod neu apêl.
translation.en: Where required, case friends can be used by the child at earlier stages prior to a more formal dispute resolution procedure or an appeal.

translation.cy: Os nad oes ganddynt alluedd, gall pobl ifanc a rhieni ddefnyddio cynrychiolydd i weithredu ar eu rhan wrth arfer eu hawliau o dan y Ddeddf.
translation.en: Young people, and parents, can use a representative to act on their behalf when exercising rights under the Act if they lack capacity.

translation.cy: Mae’r diffiniad ar gyfer pobl ifanc a rhieni nad oes ganddynt alluedd yn y Ddeddf yn dilyn yr un ystyr â ‘lacking capacity’ yn Neddf Galluedd Meddyliol 2005.
translation.en: The definition for young people and parents lacking capacity in the Act2 has the same meaning as ‘lacking capacity’ in the Mental Capacity Act 2005.

translation.cy: Mae’r ddyletswydd gyffredinol i roi sylw i’r canlynol yn dal i fod yn gymwys:
translation.en: The general duty to have regard to the following still applies:

translation.cy: Asesu galluedd meddyliol person ifanc neu riant
translation.en: Assessing mental capacity of a young person or parent

translation.cy: Mae Deddf Galluedd Meddyliol 2005 a’i Chod Ymarfer yn nodi’r gyfraith ac yn rhoi canllawiau ar sut i asesu a oes gan rywun y galluedd i wneud penderfyniad, gan gynnwys pryd y dylai gweithwyr proffesiynol gymryd rhan yn yr asesiad.
translation.en: The Mental Capacity Act 2005 and its Code of Practice set out the law and provide guidance on how to assess whether someone has the capacity to make a decision, including when professionals should be involved in the assessment.

translation.cy: Mae’r Rheoliadau Galluedd yn nodi y dylid darllen cyfeiriadau penodol yn y Ddeddf at riant y plentyn fel cyfeiriadau at gynrychiolydd y rhiant pan nad oes gan y rhiant alluedd.
translation.en: The Lacking Capacity Regulations, provide that where a child’s parent lacks capacity specified references in the Act to the child’s parent are to be read as references to a representative of the parent.

translation.cy: Pan fo cais o’r fath wedi ei wneud, mae’n rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol gyfeirio cynrychiolydd person ifanc at wasanaeth eirioli annibynnol.
translation.en: Where such a request has been made, the local authority must refer a representative of a young person to an independent advocacy service.

translation.cy: dirprwy18, a benodwyd gan y Llys Gwarchod i wneud penderfyniad ar ran y rhiant neu’r person ifanc.
translation.en: a deputy, appointed by the Court of Protection to make decision on behalf of the parent or young person.

translation.cy: Pan ddaw’r newidiadau i Ddeddf 2019 i rym, bydd y Trefniadau Amddiffyn Rhyddid yn gymwys i bobl ifanc 16 oed a hŷn.
translation.en: When the changes in the 2019 Act above come into force, the Liberty Protection Safeguards will apply to those aged 16 and above.

translation.en: During the preparation of this document, in our discussions with ethnic minority people there was a strong feeling that they did not want “another strategy” but wanted meaningful delivery of existing promises and plans, and prioritising of anti-racist action.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cydnabod y gall y naratif ynghylch braint pobl wyn fod yn gymhleth i Sipsiwn a Theithwyr ac i rai pobl Roma.
translation.en: We acknowledge that this narrative can be complex for Gypsies, Travellers and some Roma people.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, dylid cydnabod eu bod nhw hefyd yn bobl ethnig leiafrifol sydd, yn unol â diffiniad Macpherson, yn wynebu achosion o wahaniaethu sefydliadol ar sail eu diwylliant a’u tarddiad ethnig.
translation.en: However, we should acknowledge that they too are ethnic minorities who, in the Macpherson definition, experience institutional discrimination because of their culture and ethnic origin.

translation.en: We have used these reports to develop many of the actions and Goals within the Plan.

translation.cy: Felly, cyd-grëwyd y Cynllun drafft hwn gyda llawer o bartneriaid cymunedol a phartneriaid o’r sector cyhoeddus, y sector preifat a’r trydydd sector, ac Undebau Llafur, a chaiff bellach ei gyhoeddi er mwyn ymgynghori arno.
translation.en: Therefore, the draft Plan has been co-created with many community, public, private and third sector partners, and Unions and is now being issued for consultation.

translation.en: At the same time, we recognise there are parts of it we’d like to develop further, for example the opportunity to make stronger links between different themes.

translation.cy: Roedd y cyfranwyr o’r farn yr hoffent weld Cymru lle ceir “dealltwriaeth a rennir, a chamau gweithredu y cytunwyd arnynt” er mwyn mynd i’r afael â hiliaeth systemig a sefydliadol h.y. sut mae hiliaeth wedi bod yn rhan annatod o weithdrefnau sefydliadau y maent yn dod ar eu traws, ac yn parhau felly.
translation.en: Contributors felt that they wanted to see a Wales where there is a “shared understanding, and agreed actions” for tackling systemic and institutional racism, i.e. the ways in which racism is and historically has been embedded in the working of organisations they encounter.

translation.en: Leadership & accountability: to ensure that NHS Wales is anti-racist, with zero tolerance of any form of discrimination or inequality for employees or service users.

translation.cy: Mynd i’r Afael ag Anghydraddoldebau Iechyd:

translation.cy:
sicrhau bod cynlluniau cyflawni a strategaethau ar gyfer clefydau a chyflyrau penodol yn cynnwys camau gweithredu i
ymdrin â’r anghydraddoldebau iechyd amlwg y mae rhai pobl Ddu, Asiaidd ac Ethnig Leiafrifol yn eu profi.
translation.en: To ensure disease and condition specific delivery plans and strategies include actions to address the evident health inequalities experienced by some Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic people.

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod arferion gwrth-hiliol ym mhob polisi a gweithdrefn yn galluogi myfyrwyr ethnig lleiafrifol i ymgymryd ag addysg uwch, gwneud cynnydd a llwyddo ni waeth beth fo’u cefndir hiliol.
translation.en: To ensure that anti-racist practice in all policies and procedures enables ethnic minority students can access, progress and succeed in higher education regardless of their racial background.

translation.cy: Mae’r Cynllun yn seiliedig ar werthoedd gwrth-hiliaeth.
translation.en: This Plan is built on the values of anti-racism.

translation.cy: I’r gwrthwyneb, mae gwrth-hiliaeth yn agwedd ymwybodol lle mae unigolion, mudiadau a sefydliadau yn ymrwymo i feddwl yn weithredol ac ymateb i effeithiau posibl eu strwythurau, eu prosesau, eu polisïau a’u harferion cyfredol ar grwpiau Du, Asiaidd ac Ethnig Leiafrifol.
translation.en: Conversely, anti-racism is a conscious position wherein individuals, organisations and institutions commit to actively thinking and responding to the potential impacts of their structures, policies and practices on Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic (here with referred to as ethnic minority) groups.

translation.cy: Bydd marchnad gyflogaeth decach yn gwella cynhyrchiant a thwf.
translation.en: A fairer employment market will improve productivity and growth.

translation.cy: Bydd system addysg a hyfforddiant decach yn harneisio potensial pawb, yn enwedig aelodau o gymunedau ethnig lleiafrifol y mae eu poblogaethau’n iau, ac y bydd eu gwybodaeth, eu sgiliau a’u galluoedd yn cyfrannu at oresgyn effeithiau poblogaeth sy’n heneiddio.
translation.en: A fairer education and training system will harness everyone’s potential, but especially members of ethnic minority communities whose populations are younger, and whose skills and abilities will contribute to overcoming the impacts of an aging population.

translation.cy: Mae’r stereoteipiau hyn yn anochel yn seiliedig ar ddiffygion ac yn ystyried grwpiau lleiafrifol fel ‘llai na’ ac fel ‘eraill’.
translation.en: These stereotypes are inevitably deficit-based and see minority groups as ‘less than’ and as ‘others’.

translation.en: It is important though, that we do not see a competition between the desirability of support for disadvantaged white people and the promotion of fair and equitable policies for ethnic minority communities.

translation.en: encompass the statements of what matters (as set out in the statements of what matters code)

translation.cy: alluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu yn y ffordd a ddisgrifir yn y pedwar diben
translation.en: enable learners to develop in the way described in the four purposes

translation.cy: rhoi sylw i elfennau eraill y cwricwlwm, sy'n cynnwys y meysydd dysgu a phrofiad acelfennau gorfodol cwricwlwma sicrhau darpariaeth mewn perthynas â’r rheiny, i'r graddau y byddai hynny'n briodol ar gyfer y dysgwr unigol.
translation.en: have regard to the other curriculum components, which include the areas of learning and experience and the mandatory curriculum components, and secure provision in relation to them so far as that would appropriate for the individual learner.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cynnig y dylai ysgolion a lleoliadau ddatgymhwyso cwricwlwm o dan rai amgylchiadau, a chaniatáu eithriadau dros dro ar gyfer dysgwyr unigol.
translation.en: We propose enabling settingsandschools to dis-apply a curriculum in certain circumstances, and to allow temporary exceptions for individual learners.

translation.cy: cymhelliant gweithredu cymdeithasol a grymuso dinasyddiaeth weithredol i hybu parch tuag at hawliau pawb.
translation.en: the motivation of social action and empowerment of active citizenship to advance respect for the rights of all.

translation.cy: Deddf Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol a’r Tribiwnlys Addysg (Cymru) 2018
translation.en: Additional Learning Needs and Education Tribunal (Wales) Act 2018

translation.cy: Bydd y fframwaith cyfreithiol a sefydlir gan y Ddeddf hon yn chwarae rhan hanfodol wrth alluogi'r cwricwlwm i ddarparu ysgolion cryf a chynhwysol sydd wedi ymrwymo i ragoriaeth, tegwch a lles.
translation.en: The legal framework established by this Act will play a crucial role in enabling the curriculum to deliver strong and inclusive schools committed to excellence, equity and well-being.

translation.cy: Mae darpariaethau'r Ddeddf yn gwireddu'r egwyddor hon drwy osod dyletswydd ar awdurdodau lleol i sicrhau, lle bo hynny'n ymarferol, fod plant a phobl ifanc yn cael eu cefnogi i gymryd rhan lawn mewn addysg brif ffrwd.
translation.en: The provisions of the Act give life to this principle by placing a duty on local authorities to ensure that, wherever feasible, children and young people are supported to participate fully in mainstream education.

translation.cy: Wrth fyfyrio ar y cwestiynau a nodwyd yn y cyflwyniad, dylai ysgolion ac ymarferwyr ddatblygu gweledigaeth ar gyfer eu cwricwlwm.
translation.en: In reflecting on the questions posed in the introduction, schools and practitioners should develop a vision for their curriculum.

translation.cy: Beth y dylem ei ddysgu a pham?
translation.en: What should we teach and why?

translation.cy: Dylai fod gan ysgolion ac ymarferwyr weledigaeth i ddatblygu cwricwlwm sy’n:
translation.en: Schools and practitioners should have a vision to develop a curriculum which:

translation.cy: gosod safonau uchel iddyn nhw eu hunain ac yn chwilio am heriau ac yn eu mwynhau
translation.en: set themselves high standards and seek and enjoy challenge

translation.cy: datblygu corff o wybodaeth ac sydd â’r sgiliau sydd eu hangen i gysylltu’r wybodaeth honno a’i chymhwyso mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau
translation.en: are building up a body of knowledge and have the skills to connect and apply that knowledge in different contexts

translation.cy: mentro’n bwyllog
translation.en: take measured risks

translation.cy: wybodus am eu diwylliant, eu cymuned, eu cymdeithas a’r byd yn awr ac yn y gorffennol
translation.en: are knowledgeable about their culture, community, society and the world, now and in the past

translation.cy: yn ffurfio cydberthnasau cadarnhaol wedi’u seilio ar ymddiriedaeth a pharch at ei gilydd
translation.en: form positive relationships based upon trust and mutual respect

translation.cy: Cynllunio a threfnu
translation.en: Planning and organising

translation.cy: cael eu cefnogi a'u herio er mwyn iddyn nhw fod yn barod i fodloni'r galwadau sy'n gysylltiedig â gweithio mewn sefyllfaoedd ansicr yn hyderus, wrth i gyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang arwain at heriau newydd a chyfleoedd i lwyddo
translation.en: be supported and challenged so that they are prepared to confidently meet the demands of working in uncertain situations, as changing local, national and global contexts result in new challenges and opportunities for success

translation.cy: cael lle i ddatblygu syniadau creadigol a gwerthuso dewisiadau amgen mewn modd beirniadol. Mewn byd sy'n newid yn gyson, bydd hyblygrwydd a'r gallu i ddatblygu mwy o syniadau yn galluogi dysgwyr i ystyried ystod ehangach o datrysiadau amgen pan fydd pethau'n newid
translation.en: be afforded the space to generate creative ideas and to critically evaluate alternatives – in an ever-changing world, flexibility and the ability to develop more ideas will enable learners to consider a wider range of alternative solutions when things change

translation.cy: dysgu i weithio'n effeithiol gydag eraill, gan werthfawrogi'r gwahanol gyfraniadau y maen nhw eu hunain ac eraill yn eu gwneud. Dylen nhw hefyd ddechrau cydnabod cyfyngiadau eu gwaith eu hunain a chyfyngiadau pobl eraill wrth iddyn nhw feithrin dealltwriaeth o'r ffordd y mae gwahanol bobl yn chwarae gwahanol rolau mewn tîm.
translation.en: learn to work effectively with others, valuing the different contributions they and others make – they should also begin to recognise the limitations of their own work and those of others as they build an understanding of how different people play different roles within a team.

translation.cy: Gyda'i gilydd, gall ymarferwyr ddefnyddio’r ddwy elfen hyn i ddeall beth mae’n ei olygu i ddysgwyr wneud cynnydd a defnyddio hyn i lywio dysgu, addysgu ac asesu.
translation.en: Together, practitioners can use these two elements to understand what it means for learners to progress, and use this to inform learning, teaching and assessment.

translation.cy: Dylen nhw hefyd allu cymhwyso'u dysgu mewn cyd-destunau mwy anghyfarwydd a heriol.
translation.en: They should be able to apply their learning in more unfamiliar and challenging contexts.

translation.cy: Mae annog dysgwyr i feithrin ymdeimlad o angerdd a balchder yn eu hunain, eu cymunedau a'u gwlad yn ganolog i'r pedwar diben.
translation.en: Instilling learners with passion and pride in themselves, their communities and their country is central to the four purposes.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr gael eu trwytho yn nealltwriaeth o'r hunaniaethau, y tirluniau a'r gwahanol hanes sy'n dod at ei gilydd i ffurfio'u 'cynefin'.
translation.en: Learners should be grounded in an understanding of the identities, landscapes and histories that come together to form their cynefin.

translation.cy: Mae'n bwysig bod hyn yn gynhwysol ac yn tynnu ar brofiadau, safbwyntiau a threftadaeth ddiwylliannol y Gymru gyfoes.
translation.en: It is important for this to be inclusive and to draw on the experiences, perspectives and cultural heritage of contemporary Wales.

translation.cy: Mae bod â hyder yn eu hunaniaeth yn helpu dysgwyr i werthfawrogi’r cyfraniad y gallan nhw ac eraill ei wneud yn eu cymunedau ac i ddatblygu ac archwilio eu hymatebion i faterion lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang.
translation.en: Confidence in their identities helps learners appreciate the contribution they and others can make within their different communities and to develop and explore their responses to local, national and global matters.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn eu helpu i archwilio, creu cysylltiadau a meithrin dealltwriaeth o fewn cymdeithas amrywiol.
translation.en: It also helps them to explore, make connections and develop understanding within a diverse society.

translation.cy: Mae bod yn ddwyieithog (o leiaf) yn fwy na sgil cyfathrebu.
translation.en: Being (at the least) bilingual is not only a communication skill.

translation.cy: Dylai'r broses asesu ganolbwyntio ar adnabod cryfderau pob dysgwr unigol, ei gyflawniadau, ei meysydd i'w datblygu a, lle y bo'n briodol, dylai ystyried unrhyw rwystrau i ddysgu.
translation.en: Assessment should focus on identifying each individual learner’s strengths, achievements, areas for improvement and, if relevant, any barriers to learning.

translation.cy: Adnabod, cofnodi a myfyrio ar gynnydd dysgwyr unigol dros amser
translation.en: Identifying, capturing and reflecting on individual learner progress over time

translation.cy: Mae rhoi ystyriaeth i ddysgwyr ag ADY yn hollbwysig yn hyn o beth a datblygwyd y canllawiau hyn gydag ymarferwyr ADY a gweithwyr proffesiynol arbenigol.
translation.en: Key to this is consideration of learners with ALN and this guidance has been developed with ALN practitioners and specialist professionals.

translation.cy: Dylai hyn gael ei gefnogi gan ddarpariaeth sy'n ymateb i anghenion ac amgylchiadau penodol dysgwyr.
translation.en: This should be supported by provision which responds to the specific needs and circumstances of learners.

translation.cy: Mae'r canllawiau hyn yn pennu y dylai'r cwricwlwm hefyd:
translation.en: This guidance should also:

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn galluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu fframwaith cydlynol o ddysgu ac i ddeall a defnyddio'r syniadau neu'r egwyddorion hynny mewn modd cynyddol soffistigedig wrth iddyn nhw wneud cynnydd.
translation.en: This enables learners to develop a coherent framework of learning and an increasingly sophisticated understanding and application of those ideas or principles as they progress.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd
translation.en: Principles of progression

translation.cy: Dylai ymarferwyr hefyd gydnabod y bydd dysgwyr yn gwneud cynnydd ar wahanol gyflymderau.
translation.en: Practitioners should also recognise that learners will progress at different paces.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys y gallu i gydnabod, deall a chodi'u llais yn erbyn gwahaniaethu a thrais, ac i wybod sut a ble i geisio cymorth, cyngor a gwybodaeth ffeithiol ynghylch ystod o faterion sy'n ymwneud ag addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb.
translation.en: This includes the ability to recognise, understand and speak out about discrimination and violence and know how and where to seek support, advice and factual information on a range of RSE issues.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr feithrin dealltwriaeth o'r ffordd y mae hawliau sy'n ymwneud â rhyw, rhywedd, rhywioldeb a chydberthnasau yn cyfrannu at ryddid, tegwch, urddas, lles a diogelwch pawb.
translation.en: Learners should develop an understanding of how rights related to sex, gender, sexuality and relationships contribute to the freedom, equity, dignity, well-being and safety of all people.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr feithrin dealltwriaeth o ryw, rhywedd a rhywioldeb.
translation.en: Learners should develop an understanding of sex, gender and sexuality.

translation.cy: Mae cydnabod amrywiaeth y corff dynol, a'r ffordd y mae'r ddealltwriaeth o gyrff dynol wedi'i llywio gan gymdeithas, y gyfraith, gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg, wrth wraidd y dysgu hwn.
translation.en: Central to this learning is recognising the diversity of the human body, and how understanding of human bodies is shaped by society, the law, science and technology.

translation.cy: Mae gwerthfawrogi'r ffyrdd gwahanol y mae pobl yn mynegi rhywioldeb mewn gwahanol ddiwylliannau a chyd-destunau, gan gynnwys mythau am iechyd a lles rhywiol, wrth wraidd y dysgu hwn.
translation.en: Central to this learning is appreciating the different ways that people express sexuality across cultures and contexts, including myths about sexual health and well-being.

translation.cy: yn rhywbeth sy’n grymuso pobler mwyn galluogi ymarferwyr i greu cwricwlwm addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb cadarnhaol a thrawsnewidiol sy'n cyfoethogi llais ac annibyniaeth y dysgwr.
translation.en: empowering to enable practitioners to create an affirmative and transformative RSE curriculum that enhances learner voice and agency.

translation.cy: dysgu drwy hawliau dynol: datblygu gwerthoedd, agweddau ac ymddygiadau sy'n adlewyrchu gwerthoedd hawliau dynol
translation.en: learning through human rights– the development of values, attitudes and behaviours that reflect human rights values

translation.cy: Amrywiaeth
translation.en: Diversity

translation.cy: Yn ei hanfod, mae'n golygu bod yn ymwybodol o nodweddion pobl eraill a'u trin â thrugaredd, empathi, dealltwriaeth a thegwch, er gwaethaf y nodweddion hynny.
translation.en: At its most basic, it means being aware of the characteristics of others and treating others with compassion, empathy, understanding and equity, regardless of those characteristics.

translation.cy: Mae ganddyn nhw werthoedd, hunaniaethau, ymddygiadau a nodweddion corfforol gwahanol.
translation.en: They have diverse values, identities, behaviours and physical characteristics.

translation.cy: Drwy deimlo ein bod yn cael ein gwerthfawrogi, cawn ein grymuso i wneud cyfraniadau ystyrlon at ein cymdeithas.
translation.en: By feeling valued, we are empowered to make meaningful contributions to our societies.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr dyfu, mae eu rhyngweithio cymdeithasol yn debygol o ehangu mewn byd sy'n gynyddol gydgysylltiedig.
translation.en: As learners grow, their social interactions are likely to become ever wider in an increasingly interconnected world.

translation.cy: herio stereoteipiau.
translation.en: challenge stereotypes.

translation.cy: gwybodaeth a gwerthfawrogiad o dueddiadau'r farchnad lafur leol, genedlaethol a rhyngwladol
translation.en: knowledge and appreciation of local, national and international labour market trends

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr gael cyfleoedd i ymateb i'r materion a'r heriau sy'n codi o'r cydberthnasau hyn, gan ystyried y ffordd y maen nhw wedi llywio ein gorffennol a'r presennol, a'r ffordd y gallan nhw lywio ein dyfodol.
translation.en: Learners should have opportunities to respond to the issues and challenges that arise from these relationships, considering how they have shaped our past and present and how they may shape our future.

translation.cy: Er mwyn deall Cymru, dylai dysgwyr hefyd feithrin dealltwriaeth o'i chydberthynas â'r Deyrnas Unedig a'i lle ynddi sy’n newid, ac o hanesion a phobl yr ynysoedd hyn, heddiw ac yn y gorffennol.
translation.en: To understand Wales, learners should also develop an understanding of its relationship with and changing place within the United Kingdom and the stories and peoples of these islands: both now and in the past.

translation.cy: ddatblygu dysgu drwy ystod o leoedd a digwyddiadau arwyddocaol
translation.en: develop learning through a range of places and events of significance

translation.cy: manteisio ar hanesion a gwahanolrwydd ardal leol ysgol
translation.en: draw on the stories and distinctiveness of a school’s local surroundings

translation.cy: deall datblygu cynaladwy, yr heriau a wynebir gan yr amgylchedd a chymdeithas a sut y gallan nhw ymgysylltu â'r materion hyn a gwneud gwahaniaeth gan gefnogi dinasyddiaeth gynaladwy
translation.en: understand sustainable development, the challenges the environment and society face and how they can engage with and make a difference on these issues supporting sustainable citizenship

translation.cy: adnabod y cysylltiadau rhwng cyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol, gan ddeall y ffordd y maen nhw’n dylanwadu ar ei gilydd yn barhaus
translation.en: recognise the links between local, national and international contexts, understanding how they constantly influence each other

translation.cy: cael ei ategu gan addysgeg effeithiol.
translation.en: be supported by effective pedagogy.

translation.cy: Cyd-awduro
translation.en: Co-construction

translation.cy: Cynnwys dysgwyr yn y broses o bennu blaenoriaethau ar gyfer y cwricwlwm ac ar gyfer cynnwys dysgu.
translation.en: Involving learners in setting priorities for the curriculum and for learning content.

translation.cy: Caiff y broses o gynllunio cwricwlwm ar gyfer pob dysgwr ei hategu gan deuddeg egwyddor addysgegol, sy'n datgan bod dysgu ac addysgu da yn:
translation.en: Curriculum design for all learners is underpinned by twelve pedagogical principles, which state that good learning and teaching:

translation.cy: dilyn egwyddorion asesu ar gyfer dysgu
translation.en: means employing assessment for learning principles

translation.cy: ymestyn oddi mewn ac ar draws y Meysydd
translation.en: ranges within and across Areas

translation.cy: hybu cydweithio.
translation.en: encourages collaboration.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cefnogi'r cwricwlwm, dylai addysgeg helpu dysgwyr i ddatblygu:
translation.en: To support the curriculum, pedagogy should help learners to develop:

translation.cy: sgiliau cyfathrebu effeithiol iawn.
translation.en: highly effective communication skills.

translation.cy: ymateb i bob dysgwr
translation.en: respond to all learners

translation.cy: Yna, bydd disgwyl i ysgolion uwchradd gyflwyno eu cwricwla fesul blwyddyn, gan wneud hynny ar gyfer Blwyddyn 8 ym mis Medi 2023 ac ar gyfer Blwyddyn 11 ym mis Medi 2026.
translation.en: Secondary schools will then be expected to roll out their curricula on a year-by-year basis, with Year 8 in September 2023 through to Year 11 in September 2026.

translation.cy: Er bod gan bob un o’r disgyblaethau hyn gorff o wybodaetha sgiliau sy’n perthyn yn benodol i’r ddisgyblaeth honno, cydnabyddir eu bod, gyda’i gilydd, yn rhannu’r broses greadigol.
translation.en: Although each discipline has its own discrete body of knowledge and skills, it is recognised that together they share the creative process.

translation.cy: Y nod yw cynnig cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr archwilio, mireinio a chyfathrebu syniadau gan feddwl yn greadigol a defnyddio’r dychymyg a’r synhwyrau. Mae ymwneud â’r Maes hwn yn gofyn am ymroddiad personol, dyfalbarhad a sylw manwl i fanylion, rhinweddau sy’n cyfrannu at wneud dysgwyr yn ddysgwyr uchelgeisiol, galluog sy’n barod i ddysgu gydol eu hoes.
translation.en: Engagement with this Area requires personal application, perseverance and close attention to detail, dispositions that contribute to making learners ambitious, capable learnersready to learn throughout their lives.

translation.cy: Mae’r archwilio hwn hefyd yn dyfnhau eu dealltwriaeth o sut mae’r celfyddydau mynegiannol yn ffurfio syniadau a theimladau.
translation.en: This exploration can also progress their understanding of how the expressive arts shape ideas and feelings.

translation.cy: Gall y dysgu a’r profiad hwn feithrin gwydnwch a hyblygrwydd i oresgyn heriau.
translation.en: This learning and experience can foster resilience and flexibility to overcome challenges.

translation.cy: Mae creu yn y celfyddydau mynegiannol yn cwmpasu ystod o weithgareddau gan gynnwys cynllunio, drafftio, dylunio, gwneud, coreograffu, siapio, cyfansoddi a golygu.
translation.en: Creating in the expressive artsembraces a range of activities including planning, drafting, designing, making, choreographing, shaping, composing and editing.

translation.cy: Mae'r ffordd y maen nhw’n gwerthuso eu gwaith eu hunain a gwaith eraill yn adlewyrchu dealltwriaeth gynyddol o broses yn ogystal â chynnyrch, ynghyd â gwydnwch cynyddol wrth gael adborth, a dyfalbarhad cynyddol wrth weithredu arno.
translation.en: Their evaluation of their own and others' work reflects a developing understanding of process as well as product, and resilience in receiving, and persistence in acting upon, feedback.

translation.cy: Mae archwilio’r celfyddydau mynegiannol yn hanfodol er mwyn dyfnhau sgiliau a gwybodaeth gelfyddydol, ac mae’n galluogi dysgwyr i ddod yn unigolion chwilfrydig a chreadigol.
translation.en: Exploring the expressive arts is essential to developing artistic skills and knowledge and it enables learners to become curious and creative individuals.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio ac arbrofi’n annibynnol, a dangos rheolaeth dechnegol gydag ystod o ddeunyddiau, prosesau, adnoddau, offer a thechnolegau creadigol gan ddangos arloesedd a gwydnwch.
translation.en: I can explore and experiment independently and demonstrate technical control with a range of creative materials, processes, resources, tools and technologies showing innovation and resilience.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymchwilio a deall sut mae ystyr yn cael ei gyfleu trwy syniadau artistiaid a pherfformwyr eraill.
translation.en: I can investigate and understand how meaning is communicated through the ideas of other artists and performers.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu efelychu technegau artistig cydnabyddedig wrth greu fy ngwaith fy hun.
translation.en: I can imitate established artistic techniques in the creation of my own work.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy ngwybodaeth ddylunio a gwneud cysylltiadau gydag annibyniaeth gynyddol er mwyn addasu a datblygu fy nyluniadau creadigol.
translation.en: I can draw upon my design knowledge and make connections with greater independence to modify and develop my creative designs.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dylunio deilliannau  creadigol gyda soffistigeiddrwydd i safon broffesiynol a safon diwydiant, a hynny gyda phwrpas a bwriad clir.
translation.en: I can design creative outcomes to professional and industry-standard with sophistication, clear purpose and intent.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau defnyddio deunyddiau creadigol yn ddiogel gydag arweiniad a chyfarwyddyd.
translation.en: I am beginning to use creative materials safely with guidance and direction.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu, yn hyderus, ystyried fy hun, pobl eraill, y gynulleidfa, cyfranogwyr a materion eiddo deallusol wrth greu gwaith.
translation.en: I can confidently consider myself, others, audience, participants and matters of intellectual property when creating work.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso a barnu priodoldeb fy ngwaith creadigol fy hun mewn perthynas ag ystyriaethau moesegol a chyfreithiol, a’i effaith ar gyfranogwyr a chynulleidfaoedd.
translation.en: I can evaluate and judge the appropriateness of my creative work in relation to ethical and legal considerations and its effect on participants and audiences.

translation.cy: Rhifedd
translation.en: Numeracy

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn yn cynnig cyfoeth o gyfleoedd i ddatblygu cymhwysedd digidol mewn meysydd megis cydweithredu digidol, technoleg cynhyrchu, eiddo deallusol, deallusrwydd artiffisial, hawliau digidol, trwyddedu a pherchnogaeth, delwedd y corff a golygu lluniau, yn ogystal ag arbed, rhannu a dosbarthu gwaith digidol.
translation.en: This Area provides a wealth of opportunities to develop digital competence in areas such as digital collaboration, production technology, intellectual property, artificial intelligence, digital rights, licensing and ownership, body image and photo editing, as well as the saving, sharing and distribution of digital work.

translation.cy: Sgiliau cyfannol
translation.en: Integral skills

translation.cy: Creadigrwydd ac arloesedd
translation.en: Creativity and innovation

translation.cy: Disgwylir i ddysgwyr ystyried dylanwadau a llywio eu creadigrwydd eu hunain.
translation.en: Learners are expected to consider influences and shape their own creativity.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn cymryd risgiau creadigol i fynd y tu hwnt i wybodaeth sy’n bodoli eisoes ac yn derbyn methiant fel profiad dysgu.
translation.en: Learners take creative risks to go beyond existing knowledge and accept failure as a learning experience.

translation.cy: Mae’r gwerthuso sy’n rhan o’r broses greadigol yn galluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu sgiliau adfyfyrio, cwestiynu a datrys problemau, yn ogystal â herio canfyddiadau a nodi datrysiadau.
translation.en: The evaluation involved in the creative process enables learners to develop reflective, questioning and problem-solving skills, as well as to challenge perceptions and identify solutions.

translation.cy: Ystyriaethau penodol ar gyfer y Maes hwn
translation.en: Specific considerations for this Area

translation.cy: Ar draws taith y dysgwyr ar y continwwm 3 i 16, mae’n bwysig cynnig cyfleoedd eang a chytbwys ar gyfer celf, cerddoriaeth, dawns, drama, a ffilm a’r cyfryngau digidol.
translation.en: Across the learners' journey on the 3 to 16 continuum, it is important to offer broad and balanced opportunities for art, dance, drama, film and digital media and music.

translation.cy: Ffilm a’r cyfryngau digidol
translation.en: Film and digital media

translation.cy: Hawliau dynol
translation.en: Human rights

translation.cy: Amrywiaeth
translation.en: Diversity

translation.cy: Wrth ddatblygu cymhelliant, gwydnwch ac empathi’rdysgwyr, ynghyd â’u gallu i wneud penderfyniadau, gellir eu cefnogi i ddod yn ddysgwyruchelgeisiol, galluog sy’n barod i ddysgu gydol eu hoes.
translation.en: By developing learners’ motivation, resilience,empathy and decision-making abilities, they can be supported to become ambitious, capable learners, ready to learn throughout their lives.

translation.cy: Wrth gael cyfleoedd i archwilio cymhlethdodau’r cysylltiadau hyn, galluogir dysgwyr i ddeall nad yw teimladau ac emosiynau’n sefydlog nac yn gyson.
translation.en: By being provided with opportunities to explore the complexities of these connections, learners can be enabled to recognise that feelings and emotions are neither fixed nor consistent.

translation.cy: Mae’r ffordd rydym yn gwneud penderfyniadau yn effeithio ar ansawdd ein bywydau ni a bywydau eraill.
translation.en: Our decision-making impacts on the quality of our lives and the lives of others.

translation.cy: Mae’r dylanwadau hyn yn cynnwys rheolau, normaucymdeithasol,agweddaua gwerthoedd sy’n cael eu creu a’u hatgyfnerthu gan wahanol grwpiau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: These influences are comprised of rules, social norms, attitudes and values that are created and reinforced by different social groups.

translation.cy: Mae cydberthnasau iach yn hanfodol ar gyfer ein lles.
translation.en: Healthy relationships are fundamental to our well-being.

translation.cy: Mae cynnydd yn y Maes yn gontinwwm o soffistigeiddrwydd cynyddol dros gyfnod o amser lle y caiff gwybodaeth bresennol ei hailystyried, ond ar lefel ddyfnach.
translation.en: Progression within the Area is a continuum of increased sophistication over a period of time whereby existing knowledge is revisited but at a deeper level.

translation.cy: Gyda’i gilydd, maen nhw’n canolbwyntio ar ddatblygu’n raddol werthfawrogiad a dealltwriaeth dysgwyr o arwyddocâd gwneud penderfyniadau gwybodus ynghylch eu hiechyd a’u lles corfforol, emosiynol a meddyliol.
translation.en: Together, they focus on progressively developing learners’ appreciation and understanding of the significance of making informed decisions regarding their physical, emotional and mental health and well-being.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn arbennig o amlwg wrth i’r cam cynnydd cychwynnol ganolbwyntio ar gydnabod a bod yn ymwybodol o sgiliau corfforol, emosiynol a chymdeithasol corfforol, cyn symud fesul cam tuag at fwy o gywirdeb a meistrolaeth o’r sgiliau hyn.
translation.en: This is particularly evident as the initial progression step focuses on recognition and awareness of personal physical, emotional and social skills and then progressively moves towards more accuracy and mastery of these skills.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr ddod yn fwy cyfrifol yn gymdeithasol, maen nhw’n gwneud cynnydd o ystyried eu hunain yn bennaf i ystyried effaith eu gweithredoedd eu hunain ar eraill ar lefel leol, genedlaethol a byd-eang.
translation.en: As learners become more socially responsible, they progress from primarily considering oneself to considering the impact of their own actions on others at a local, national and global level.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr wneud cynnydd drwy’r cwricwlwm, bydd eu dealltwriaeth o’r cysylltiadau ym mhob rhan o’r ysgol a’r tu hwnt â phob agwedd ar iechyd a lles yn dod yn fwy soffistigedig, a byddan nhw’n gallu adnabod a chydbwyso rhai o’r tensiynau a all fodoli mewn modd cynyddol effeithiol.
translation.en: As learners progress through the curriculum their understanding of the links across and beyond the school with all aspects of health and well-being will become more sophisticated, and they will be able to identify and balance, with increasing effectiveness, some of the tensions that may exist.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ysgogi fy hun i ymwneud â gweithgareddau corfforol cyson a chwaraeon yn hyderus, ac rwy’n ymwybodol o’m cynnydd fy hun.
translation.en: I can motivate myself to engage confidently in regular physical activity and sport, and am aware of my own progress.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu trosglwyddo ystod o sgiliau symud o sefyllfaoedd ac amgylcheddau cyfarwydd i rai anghyfarwydd a chyfnewidiol, gan ddefnyddio gofod yn greadigol mewn ymateb i amrywiaeth o symbyliadau.
translation.en: I can transfer a range of movement skills from familiar to unfamiliar and changing situations and environments, using space creatively in response to a variety of stimuli.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgrifio sut mae newidiadau corfforol ac emosiynol yn cael eu cysylltu mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can describe the way in which physical and emotional changes are connected in different contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso’r cysylltiad rhwng newidiadau corfforol ac emosiynol, gan fynd ati’n annibynnol i ddethol o ystod o strategaethau er mwyn gwella iechyd corfforol ac emosiynol fy hun ac eraill.
translation.en: I can evaluate the connection between physical and emotional changes, independently selecting from a range of strategies to improve my physical and emotional health and that of others.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau adnabod rhai mathau o ymddygiad, cyflyrau a sefyllfaoedd sy’n effeithio ar fy iechyd a lles corfforol, ac rwy’n dechrau gwybod sut i ymateb a chael cymorth.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise some of the behaviours, conditions and situations that affect my physical health and well-being and I am beginning to know how to respond and get help.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu canolbwyntio’n annibynnol ar yr hyn rwy’n ei ganfod a’i feddwl a’i theimlo er mwyn datblygu fy hunanymwybyddiaeth ymhellach.
translation.en: I can independently focus attention on my perceptions, thoughts and feelings in order to further develop my self-awareness.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu myfyrio ar y ffordd y mae digwyddiadau a phroﬁadau yn y gorffennol wedi effeithio ar fy meddyliau, fy nheimladau a’m gweithredoedd.
translation.en: I can reflect on the way that past events and experiences have affected my thoughts, feelings and actions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dangos empathi tuag at eraill a deall gwerth dangos hyn trwy weithredoedd tosturiol a charedig.
translation.en: I can empathise with others and understand the value of demonstrating this through actions which are compassionate and kind.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwneud penderfyniadau ystyriol yn seiliedig ar yr wybodaeth sydd ar gael, gan gynnwys profiadau’r gorffennol.
translation.en: I can make considered decisions, taking into account available information, including past experiences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso ffactorau a goblygiadau, gan gynnwys risg, mewn ffordd feirniadol wrth wneud penderfyniadau yn unigol ac ar y cyd.
translation.en: I can critically evaluate factorsand implications, including risks, when making decisions individually and collectively.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymwneud mewn ffordd sydd o fewn dylanwadau cymdeithasol o fewn gwahanol grwpiau a sefyllfaoedd.
translation.en: I can interact pro-socially in different groups and situations.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall bod amrywiaethau o fewn gwahanol fathau o gydberthnasau, a’u bod yn newid dros amser.
translation.en: I can understand that there are differences within types of relationships and that relationships change over time.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau adnabod ymddygiad diogel a pheryglus mewn cydberthnasau.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise safe and unsafe behaviour in relationships.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod pan rwy’n teimlo’n ddiogel mewn fy nghydberthnasau, ac yn gallu mynegi pan nad wyf yn teimlo’n ddiogel.
translation.en: I can recognise when I feel safe in my relationships and I can communicate when I do not feel safe.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ystyried rôl diogelwch mewn cydberthnasau, ac rwy’n gallu adnabod lle mae fy niogelwch i neu ddiogelwch rhywun arall o dan fygythiad, ac rwy’n gwybod sut i ymateb i hyn.
translation.en: I can consider the role of safety in relationships and I can identify where my safety or the safety of others is threatened and I know how to respond to this.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu pwyso ar systemau cymorth ar gyfer fy hun ac eraill yn ôl y gofyn.
translation.en: I can draw on support systems for myself and others when needed.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu parchu hawliau pobl eraill a deall sut y maen nhw’n effeithio arnaf i ac ar eraill.
translation.en: I can respect the rights of others and I understand how these impact on myself and others.

translation.cy: Sgiliau trawsgwricwlaidd a sgiliau cyfannol
translation.en: Cross-curricular skills and integral skills

translation.cy: Rhaid i gwricwlwm ymwreiddio’r sgiliau trawsgwricwlaidd gorfodol a’r sgiliau cyfannol sy’n sail i bedwar diben y cwricwlwm.
translation.en: A curriculum must embed the mandatory cross-curricular skills and the integral skills which underpin the four purposes of the curriculum.

translation.cy: Mae llythrennedd yn sylfaenol i hwyluso lles.
translation.en: Literacy is a fundamental enabler of well-being.

translation.cy: Mae datblygu sgiliau llythrennedd, gallu trefnu ysgrifennu ac addasu iaith yn hyderus, yn bwysig i alluogi dysgwyr i ymgeisio am lwybrau dysgu a gyrfa o’u dewis.
translation.en: Developing literacy skills, being able to organise writing and adapt language confidently, is important in enabling learners to apply for learning pathways and a preferred career.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgu yn y Maes hwn gynnig cyfle i ddatblygu sgiliau rhifedd yng nghyd-destun y byd go iawn.
translation.en: Learning in this Area should provide opportunity to develop numeracy skills in the real-world context.

translation.cy: Mae rhifedd hefyd yn chwarae rôl wrth brynu a pharatoi bwyd i gefnogi maeth.
translation.en: Numeracy also plays a role in purchasing and preparing food to support nutrition.

translation.cy: Wrth i dechnoleg ddatblygu, mae angen i leoliadau ac ysgolion gynnal dealltwriaeth gyfredol o’r hyn sydd gan y dysgwyr fynediad ato neu yn ei ddefnyddio, a sut maen nhw’n cyflawni hyn.
translation.en: As technology develops, settings and schools need to maintain a current understanding of what learners are accessing or using and how they are going about this.

translation.cy: Mae dysgu ar draws y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn y Maes hwn yn darparu cyfleoedd i ddatblygu sgiliau dadansoddi beirniadol, gwerthuso ac arfarnu.
translation.en: Learning across the statements of what matters in this Area provides opportunities to develop critical analysis, evaluation and appraisal skills.

translation.cy: Gan ddefnyddio dysgu yn y Maes hwn, dylid annog dysgwyr i ddatblygu ymatebion a datrysiadau i brofiadau maen nhw’n dod ar eu traws a dadansoddi’n feirniadol y ffactorau sy’n dylanwadu ar wneud penderfyniad, megis dylanwadau cymdeithasol, gwerthoedd, credoau a rhagfarnau.
translation.en: Drawing on learning in this Area learners should be encouraged to develop responses and solutions to experiences they encounter and critically analyse the factors that influence decision-making, such as social influences, values, beliefs and biases.

translation.cy: Dylid annog dysgwyr i ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o emosiynau, ymddygiadau a dylanwadau cymdeithasol: sgiliau sy’n hanfodol i adeiladu perthynas gref ag eraill.
translation.en: Learners should be encouraged to develop an understanding of emotions, behaviours and social influences, skills essential to building strong relationships.

translation.cy: Trwy’r rhain gellir archwilio gwahanol bynciau a materion gan roi hyblygrwydd i athrawon nodi’r rhai sy’n berthnasol i anghenion eu dysgwyr, eu lleoliad neu eu hysgol a’u cymuned.
translation.en: They are meant to act as lenses through which different topics and issues can be explored giving professionals the flexibility to identify those which are relevant to the needs of their learners, their setting or school and their community.

translation.cy: I ysgolion bydd hyn yn cynnwys data Rhwydwaith Ymchwil Iechyd mewn Ysgolion, Rhwydwaith Ysgolion Iach Cymru a’r Arolwg ar Chwaraeon Ysgol.
translation.en: For schools this will include School Health Research Network (SHRN) data, Welsh Network of Healthy Schools data, and the School Sport Survey.

translation.cy: Gallai’r cwestiynau mwy penodol isod fod o gymorth wrth ystyried yr uchod.
translation.en: These more specific questions below may be helpful in considering the above.

translation.cy: Pa weithgareddau, pynciau a themâu sydd fwyaf perthnasol i ddysgwyr, eu hanghenion a chyd-destun?
translation.en: What activities, topics and themes are most relevant to learners, their needs and context?

translation.cy: Gall profiadau dysgu cadarnhaol gefnogi dysgwyr i werthfawrogi gweithgaredd corfforol, gan gynnwys chwaraeon, a gall hyn yn ei dro eu symbylu i fyw bywydau corfforol actif.
translation.en: Positive learning experiences can support learners to value physical activity, including sport, which in turn can motivate them to lead physically active lives.

translation.cy: Dylai’r gweithgareddau hyn hefyd gefnogi datblygu gwybodaeth, dealltwriaeth a sgiliau trosglwyddadwy o fewn a thu hwnt i elfen iechyd corfforol y Maes hwn.
translation.en: These activities should also support the development of knowledge, understanding and transferable skills within and beyond the physical health element of this Area.

translation.cy: Dylid cefnogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu ymddygiadau cadarnhaol yn eu hiechyd a lles ehangach.
translation.en: Learners should be supported to develop positive behaviours in their wider physical health and well-being.

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion ystyried sut i gynnig ystod o gyfleoedd i ddysgwyr wneud penderfyniadau, yn unigol ac ar y cyd.
translation.en: Settings and schools should consider how to provide a range of opportunities for learners to make decisions, both individually and collectively.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, dylid rhoi cyfle i ddysgwyr wneud penderfyniadau mewn meysydd megis gyrfaoedd, rheolaeth ariannol, cydberthnasau a rhyngweithio gyda a thrwy dechnoleg ddigidol.
translation.en: Provision should also be made for learners to make decisions in areas such as careers, financial management, relationships and interactions with and through digital technology.

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion ystyried sut maen nhw’n cefnogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu’r sgiliau sydd eu hangen arnyn nhw i adeiladu cydberthynas iach.
translation.en: Settings and schools should consider how they are supporting learners to develop the skills they need in order to build healthy relationships.

translation.cy: Bydd angen iddyn nhw adnabod sylw digroeso a dysgu sut i ymateb yn briodol.
translation.en: They will need to recognise unwanted attention and learn how to respond appropriately.

translation.cy: Gall ymddygiadau sydd heb fod yn ddiogel gynnwys camdriniaeth corfforol, emosiynol, rhywiol ac ar-lein.
translation.en: Unsafe behaviours may include physical, emotional, verbal, sexual and online abuse.

translation.cy: effaith sylweddau niweidiol a phatrymau cysgu, archwaeth, ysgogiad i ymarfer, lles emosiynol, gwneud penderfyniadau ar y pryd a chymryd risg, grwpiau cyfeillion, a’r gallu i wahaniaethu rhwng cydberthynas iach a niweidiol.
translation.en: the impact of harmful substances and sleep patterns, appetite, motivation to exercise, emotional well-being, impulsive decision-making and risk-taking, friendship groups, and the ability to distinguish between healthy and harmful relationships.

translation.cy: Dylai dull gweithredu’r dysgu sicrhau fod dysgwyr yn datblygu mwynhad a chanfyddiad cadarnhaol o ymddygiadau iach sydd er lles y gymdeithas.
translation.en: The approach to learning should ensure learners develop enjoyment and a positive perception of healthy and pro-social behaviours.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgu ac addysgu gydnabod tra bod deall effaith gwahanol ymddygiadau yn bwysig, mae hyn ar ei ben ei hun yn annhebygol o ddylanwadu ar ymddygiadau dysgwyr.
translation.en: Learning and teaching should recognise that while understanding the impacts of different behaviours is important, this alone is very unlikely to influence learners’ behaviours.

translation.cy: Mae’r ddau Faes yma yn cysylltu i ddyfnhau gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth dysgwyr o hunaniaeth, cymunedau, cymdeithasau, normau a gwerthoedd cymdeithasol, a dylanwadau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: These two Areas link together to deepen learners’ knowledge and understanding of identity, communities, societies, social norms and values, and social influences.

translation.cy: Oherwydd cysylltiadau mor agos anogir yn gryf ddysgu’r ddwy elfen arbennig yma yn gyfochrog.
translation.en: Because of such close links, it is strongly recommended that both elements are taught in parallel.

translation.cy: Dylen nhw gael eu cefnogi i osod targedau a chwilio am wybodaeth am lwybrau posib i fod o gymorth iddyn nhw wireddu uchelgais.
translation.en: They should be supported to set goals, and research information about potential pathways in order to help them to take steps to support their ambitions.

translation.cy: Mae dysgu’n cynnig cyfleoedd i archwilio amrywiol werthoedd, hunaniaethau, ymddygiadau a nodweddion corfforol, a darparu cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr ddatblygu’r nodweddion i ddeall a pharchu amrywiaeth.
translation.en: Learning enables opportunities to explore diversity of values, identities, behaviours and physical characteristics, and provides opportunities for learners to develop the characteristics to understand and respect diversity.

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn yn cwmpasu daearyddiaeth; hanes; crefydd, gwerthoedd a moeseg; astudiaethau busnes ac astudiaethau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: The Area encompasses geography; history; religion, values and ethics; business studies and social studies.

translation.cy: Trwy gael eu hannog i ymwneud ag amrywiaeth o fydolygon, ynghyd â’u parchu a’u herio, hefyd trwy ddeall sut i ymarfer eu hawliau democrataidd, gall dysgwyr ddychmygu dyfodol posib a gweithredu’n gymdeithasol.
translation.en: Through being encouraged to engage with, respect and challenge a variety of worldviews, as well as to understand how to exercise their democratic rights, learners can imagine possible futures and take social action.

translation.cy: Mae’r agwedd hon o’r Maes hwn yn annog dysgwyr i archwilio cysyniadau gan gynnwys y berthynas rhwng pobl a’r byd naturiol, achos ac effaith, newid a pharhad, arwyddocâd, lle, gofod a phrosesau ffisegol.
translation.en: This aspect of the Area encourages learners to explore concepts, including the interrelationships between humans and the natural world, cause and effect, change and continuity, significance, place, space and physical processes.

translation.cy: Trwy ymwybyddiaeth gyson o’u stori leol a stori Cymru yn ogystal â’r stori fyd-eang, gall dysgwyr ddod i ddeall natur gymhleth, luosog ac amrywiol cymdeithasau, yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: Through consistent exposure to the story of their locality and the story of Wales, as well as to the story of the wider world, learners can develop an understanding of the complex, pluralisticand diverse nature of societies, past and present.

translation.cy: Maen nhw hefyd yn ddeinamig, gan sbarduno ac ymateb i newidiadau, ar raddfa leol, genedlaethol a byd-eang.
translation.en: They are also dynamic, both driving and reacting to changes on a local, national and global scale.

translation.cy: Gall ymwneud pellach eu hannog hefyd i archwilio a meithrin dealltwriaeth oddefgar ac empathetig o’r amrywiol gredoau, gwerthoedd, traddodiadau ac egwyddorion sydd wrth wraidd ac yn llywio cymdeithas ddynol.
translation.en: Further engagement will also encourage them to explore – and develop a tolerant and empathetic understanding of – the varied beliefs, values, traditions and ethics that underpin and shape human society.

translation.cy: Mae archwilio’r dyniaethau’n annog dysgwyr i fod yn ddinasyddion a defnyddwyr gweithredol, gwybodus a chyfrifol sy’n gallu uniaethu â’u cymunedau a chyfrannu atyn nhw, yn ogystal â gallu mynd i’r afael â heriau a chyfleoedd y gorffennol, y presennol a’r dyfodol sy’n wynebu’r dysgwyr, eu cymunedau, Cymru yn ogystal â’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: Exploration of the humanities encourages learners to be active, informed, and responsible citizens and consumers, who can identify with and contribute to their communities, and who can engage with the past, contemporary and anticipated challenges and opportunities facing them, their communities and Wales, as well as the wider world.

translation.cy: Trwy ymateb i heriau, a manteisio ar gyfleoedd i weithredu’n gymdeithasol a chynaladwy, gall dysgwyr greu ystyr a diben yn eu bywydau eu hunain.
translation.en: By responding to challenges, and taking opportunities for social and sustainable action, they can create meaning and purpose in their own lives.

translation.cy: Ehangder a dyfnder gwybodaeth cynyddol
translation.en: Increasing breadth and depth of knowledge

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn cysylltu syniadau a gwybodaeth newydd â gwybodaeth sy’n deillio o ddysgu blaenorol yn yr ysgol a’r tu hwnt iddi, ac yn eu defnyddio i feithrin dealltwriaeth gynyddol glir a chydlynol o’r byd o’u cwmpas.
translation.en: Learners connect new ideas and information to knowledge acquired from previous learning from within and outside school and use it to build an increasingly clear and coherent understanding of the world around them.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn symud ymlaen i ymwybyddiaeth sy’n canolbwyntio’n fwy ar fywydau pobl eraill, yn eu cyd-destun cymdeithasol eu hunain, mewn mannau eraill yn y byd ac mewn gwahanol oesoedd.
translation.en: Learners will move on to more focused awareness of the lives of others, in their own social context, elsewhere in the world and in different eras.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy mhrofiadau, gwybodaeth a chredoau i greu syniadau yn annibynnol a threfnu ymholiadau, gan ddefnyddio ystod o ddulliau ymchwil yn ôl y gofyn.
translation.en: I can use my experiences, knowledge and beliefs to generate ideas independently and frame enquiries, using a range of research approaches when required.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dehongli, cyflwyno a myfyrio ar fy nghanfyddiadau, gan ddisgrifio patrymau ac esbonio cydberthnasau ar draws data a ffynonellau.
translation.en: I can analyse, present and reflect on my findings, describing patterns and explaining relationships across data and sources.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso’n annibynnol lwyddiant ymchwiliadau, gan gynnig gwelliannau a mireinio dulliau ar gyfer ymchwiliadau’r dyfodol.
translation.en: I can independently evaluate the success of enquiries, suggesting improvements and refining methods for future enquiries.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyflwyno, mewn amrywiol ffyrdd, yr hyn rwyf wedi’i ddarganfod, a dod i gasgliadau syml.
translation.en: I can present what I have discovered in a variety of ways and draw simple conclusions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu llunio ymatebion a barnau cydlynol a chytbwys, sy’n ystyried gwahanol safbwyntiau.
translation.en: I can make coherent and reasoned responses and judgements that take into consideration different viewpoints.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau cydnabod teimladau pobl eraill, a’u safbwyntiau am ddigwyddiadau neu broﬁadau cyfarwydd.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise other people’s feelings and viewpoints about familiar events or experiences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ffurfio, mynegi a thrafod fy marn fy hun ar ystod o faterion, ar ôl ystyried tystiolaeth a safbwyntiau pobl eraill.
translation.en: I can form, express and discuss my own opinions on a range of issues after considering evidence and the views of others.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod pam mae lleoedd yn bwysig i mi.
translation.en: I can recognise why places are important to me.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu lleoli a rhoi esboniadau syml am nodweddion arbennig lleoedd, gofodau a thirffurfiau yn fy ardal leol ac yng Nghymru, yn ogystal ag yn y byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can locate and give simple explanations for the distinctive features of places, spaces and landforms in my locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgriﬁo patrymau dosbarthu lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirffurfiau yn fy ardal leol ac yng Nghymru, yn ogystal ag yn y byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can describe spatial patterns of places, environments and landforms in my locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhoi esboniadau a dadansoddiad cynhwysfawr o nodweddion gwahanol gyfnodau o amser, gan adnabod deinamig cysondeb a newid dros gyfnodau o wahanol hyd er mwyn datblygu map cronolegol cynyddol fanwl o’r gorffennol.
translation.en: I can give comprehensive explanations and analysis of the characteristics of different periods of time, recognising the dynamics of continuity and change over periods of varying lengths in order to develop an increasingly detailed chronological map of the past.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau deall bod gan fy ngweithredoedd i, a gweithredoedd pobl eraill, achosion ac effeithiau.
translation.en: I am beginning to understand that my actions and those of others have causes and effects.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod ac esbonio prif achosion ac effeithiau digwyddiadau mewn ystod o gyd-destunau, ac rwy’n gallu adnabod sut mae’r rhain yn effeithio ar gymunedau a chymdeithasau.
translation.en: I can identify and explain the main causes and effects of events in a range of contexts, and I can recognise how these impact communities and societies.

translation.cy: Rwyf hefyd yn deall beth yw hawliau dynol, a pham maen nhw’n bwysig i mi a phobl eraill.
translation.en: I also have an understanding of what human rights are and why they are important to me and other people.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio’r gwahaniaeth rhwng dymuniadau, anghenion a hawliau, a pham mae eu hawliau yn cael eu gwrthod i rai pobl.
translation.en: I can explain the difference between wants, needs and rights, and why some people are denied their rights.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall bod ystod o ffactorau sy’n dylanwadu ar fy ymddygiad, gweithredoedd a phenderfyniadau i a phobl eraill, a bod y rhain yn cynnwys barn a safbwyntiau moesol ac egwyddorol.
translation.en: I can understand that there are a range of factors that influence my and other people’s behaviours, actions and decisions, and that these include ethical and moral judgements and viewpoints.

translation.cy: Sgiliau trawsgwricwlaidd a sgiliau cyfannol
translation.en: Cross-curricular skills and integral skills

translation.cy: Ar draws taith y dysgwyr o 3 i 16, dylai ysgolion gynnig cwricwlwm eang a chytbwys o wybodaeth, sgiliau a phrofiadau yn gysylltiedig â hanes; daearyddiaeth; crefydd; gwerthoedd a moeseg; astudiaethau busnes ac astudiaethau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: Across the learners’ journey from 3 to16, schools should provide a broad and balanced curriculum of knowledge, skills and experiences linked to history; geography; religion, values and ethics; business studies and social studies.

translation.cy: Dewis ystod o ddigwyddiadau a newidiadau cyfoes o arwyddocâd moesol, gwleidyddol, cymdeithasol, economaidd, crefyddol, amgylcheddol neu ddiwylliannol – gellir mabwysiadau dull hyblyg o astudio cyfnodau hanesyddol, ac nid yw’n dilyn y dylai dysgwyr ar gamau cynnydd penodol astudio cyfnodau mewn trefn gronolegol.
translation.en: Select a range of contemporary events and changes of moral, political, social, economic, religious, environmental or cultural significance – there can be a flexible approach to studying historical periods, and it is not the case that learners at particular progression steps should study periods in chronological order.

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau/ysgolion osgoi dull di-theori, cyfnodol o ddysgu sy’n neidio rhwng pynciau digyswllt.
translation.en: Settings/schools should avoid an untheorised, episodic approach which jumps between unconnected topics.

translation.cy: ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o ddisgyblaeth daearyddiaeth a’i gwerth
translation.en: develop an understanding of the discipline and its value

translation.cy: cynnig cyd-destun cyfoethog ar gyfer archwilio materion cynaladwyedd, newid hinsawdd, dewisiadau egni, natur, peryglon a thrychinebau naturiol a risgiau peryglon, llygredd, prinder adnoddau naturiol,  diogelwch bwyd, poblogaeth, hunaniaeth, ethnigrwydd, mudo, aneddiadau, globaleiddio, prynwriaeth a masnach, cynlluniau i drechu tlodi, anghyfartaledd ac annhegwch, gwahaniaethau rhwng gwledydd ar wahanol lefelau o ddatblygiad
translation.en: provide a rich context for exploring the issues of sustainability, climate change, energy choices, nature, natural hazards and disasters and hazard risks, pollution, scarcity of natural resources, food security, population, identity, ethnicity, migration, settlements, globalisation, consumerism and trade, initiatives to tackle poverty, inequality and injustice, contrasts between countries at different levels of development

translation.cy: Dylai cynllun cwricwlwm ysgol:
translation.en: School curriculum design should:

translation.cy: Ystod o gyfleoedd i ymweld ac archwilio gan gynnwys:
translation.en: A range of opportunities to visit and explore including:

translation.cy: llyfrgelloedd, archifau ac amgueddfeydd i gael eu defnyddio i gefnogi dysgu yn seiliedig ar ymholi
translation.en: libraries, archives and museums

translation.cy: technoleg a chyfryngau digidol a ffisegol
translation.en: digital and physical media and technology

translation.cy: dathliadau allweddol, traddodiadau a’r diwylliant amrywiol yng Nghymru
translation.en: key celebrations, traditions and the diverse cultures in Wales

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn yn cefnogi dealltwriaeth dysgwyr o sut y gall penderfyniadau gan unigolion a rhai ar y cyd gefnogi ymatebion moesegol a chynaladwy i gyfleoedd a wynebir gan ddynoliaeth yn gyffredinol ac yng Nghymru yn benodol.
translation.en: The Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience supports learners’ understanding of how individual and collective decision-making can support ethical and sustainable responses to challenges and opportunities that are faced by humanity in general and in Wales in particular.

translation.cy: Mae ymholiadau yn y dyniaethau yn defnyddio ystod o ddata ansoddol a meintiol.
translation.en: Enquiries in the humanities will use a range of qualitative and quantitative data.

translation.cy: Yn y Maes hwn dylid cael cyfleoedd i ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o Gonfensiwn y Cenhedloedd Unedig at Hawliau’r Plentyn (CCUHP) ac i annog dysgwyr i gydnabod eu hawliau eu hunain a hawliau pobl eraill.
translation.en: In this Area there should be opportunities to develop understanding of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) and for encouraging learners to recognise their own and others’ rights.

translation.cy: Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu
translation.en: Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience

translation.cy: Gyda’i gilydd, gall y sgiliau hyn feithrin hyder dysgwyr i fanteisio ar gyfleoedd newydd ac i addasu i wahanol rolau, sydd yn ei dro, yn gallu eu datblygu’n gyfranwyr mentrus, creadigol, sy’n barod i chwarae eu rhan yn llawn yn eu bywyd a’u gwaith.
translation.en: Together, these skills can build learners’ confidence to grasp new opportunities and to adapt to different roles which in turn can develop them as enterprising, creative contributors, ready to play a full part in life and work.

translation.cy: Drwy godi ymwybyddiaeth o amrywiaeth ieithoedd o oedran cynnar, y nod yw galluogi dysgwyr i adnabod tebygrwydd rhwng ieithoedd a gwerthfawrogi’r gwahaniaethau rhyngddyn nhw.
translation.en: By raising an awareness of the diversity of languages from a young age, the aim is to enable learners to recognise similarities between languages and to embrace the differences between them.

translation.cy: Yn ei dro, gall hyn gyfrannu at eu lles emosiynol a meddyliol.
translation.en: This in turn can contribute to their emotional and mental well-being.

translation.cy: Gellir cymhwyso dealltwriaeth o gysyniadau ieithyddol yn iaith y dosbarth, er enghraifft, at ddysgu iaith newydd, sy'n hwyluso cynnydd yn yr iaith honno yn ogystal â gwella dealltwriaeth o’r ffordd y mae holl ieithoedd y dysgwr  yn gweithio.
translation.en: Understanding linguistic concepts in the language of instruction, for example, can be applied to learning a new language, which facilitates progression in that language as well as improving understanding of the way in which their own languages work.

translation.cy: Maen nhw’n gwneud cynnydd ar y cyd mewn ieithoedd, llythrennedd a chyfathrebu yn y Maes hwn ac mewn llythrennedd disgyblaethol yn y meysydd dysgu a phrofiad eraill.
translation.en: They progress in parallel in languages, literacy and communication in this Area and in disciplinary literacy in the other areas of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Disgrifiadau dysgu
translation.en: Descriptions of Learning

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall sut y gall ieithoedd feithrin ymdeimlad o berthyn i’r gymuned leol a byd-eang.
translation.en: I can understand how languages can provide a sense of belonging to a local and global community.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymhwyso’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am gysylltiadau, nodweddion cyffredin a nodweddion gwahanol rhwng ieithoedd i wella fy nghyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can apply my knowledge of connections, commonalities and differences between languages to improve my communication.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu addasu a bod yn sensitif i amrywiaeth o fewn ieithoedd a deall bod amrywiaeth yn digwydd o fewn gwahanol grwpiau cymdeithasol, rhanbarthol ac ieithyddol.
translation.en: I can adapt and be sensitive to variety within languages and understand that variety occurs within different social, regional and linguistic groups.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau defnyddio gwybodaeth sydd wedi’i chyflwyno mewn un iaith a’i mynegi yn fy ngeiriau fy hun mewn iaith arall.
translation.en: I am beginning to draw on information presented in one language and convey it in my own words in another.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio ciwiau amrywiol i ragfynegi’r ystyr cyffredinol mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau llafar cyfarwydd ac anghyfarwydd.
translation.en: I can use a variety of cuesto predict the general meaning in a variety of familiar and unfamiliar spoken contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall a gwerthuso’r hyn rwy’n ei glywed a’i ddarllen mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau ar draws amrywiaeth eang o iaith.
translation.en: I can understand and evaluate what I hear and read in different contexts across a wide range of language.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu darllen ystod o destunau gan ddewis strategaethau i’w deall nhw ac i wella fy mynegiant a chyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can read a range of texts, choosing strategies to understand them, and to improve my own expression and communication.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau dod yn ymwybodol o sut mae prif lythrennau ac atalnodau llawn yn pennu ffiniau brawddegau.
translation.en: I am beginning to have an awareness of how capital letters and full stops demarcate sentences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau gofyn ac ateb cwestiynau er mwyn deall yn well.
translation.en: I am beginning to ask and answer questions to clarify my understanding.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando a darllen er mwyn cadarnhau a datblygu fy ngeirfa a strwythurau brawddegau gan ddefnyddio’n gywir yr hyn rwy’n ei ddysgu wrth i mi gyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can listen and read to consolidate and develop my vocabulary and sentence structures and use what I learn accurately in my own communication.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall a gwerthuso’r hyn rwy’n ei glywed a’i ddarllen mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau ar draws amrywiaeth eang o iaith.
translation.en: I can understand and evaluate what I hear and read in different contexts across a wide range of language.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu darllen gwahanol destunau gan ddefnyddio ystod o strategaethau i bennu ystyr.
translation.en: I can read different texts using a range of strategies to make meaning.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu darllen testunau gan ddewis strategaethau sy’n rhoi’r mwyaf o gymorth i mi eu deall.
translation.en: I can read texts, choosing strategies which best help me understand them.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu datblygu fy ngeirfa ac ynganiad trwy wrando a darllen, a defnyddio’r geiriau newydd hyn mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can develop my vocabulary and pronunciation through listening and reading, and use new words and phrases in a variety of contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cynhyrchu nifer o seiniau llafar yn gywir.
translation.en: I can produce many speech sounds accurately.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio brawddegau syml ac aml-gymalog.
translation.en: I can use single and multi-clause sentences.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu addasu a thrin iaith a gwneud dewisiadau priodol ynghylch geirfa, iaith idiomatiga chystrawen er mwyn mynegi fy hun yn rhugl ac eglur.
translation.en: I can adapt and manipulate language and make appropriate choices about vocabulary, idiomatic language and syntaxin order to express myself with fluency and clarity.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu egluro ble a pham rwyf wedi gwneud unrhyw newidiadau neu gywiriadau.
translation.en: I can explain where and why I have made any changes or corrections.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio iaith lafar at wahanol ddibenion.
translation.en: I can use spoken language for different purposes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ysgrifennu’n ddarllenadwy a rhugl.
translation.en: I can write legibly and fluently.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am sain a phatrwm llythrennau yn gywir yn fy sillafu.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of letter sounds and patterns accurately in my spelling.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhoi ymgais ar sillafu geiriau anoddach mewn ffordd resymol gan ddefnyddio ystod o strategaethau.
translation.en: I can attempt to spell more difficult words plausibly using a range of strategies.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau cyfathrebu gan ddefnyddio testun, delwedd, sain, animeiddiad a ﬁdeo.
translation.en: I am beginning to communicate using text, image, sound, animation and video.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio iaith idiomatiggyfarwydd a chywairpriodol wrth gyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can use familiar idiomatic language and appropriate registerin my communication.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu addasu a thrin iaith a gwneud dewisiadau priodol ynghylch geirfa, iaith idiomatiga chystrawen er mwyn mynegi fy hun.
translation.en: I can adapt and manipulate language and make appropriate choices about vocabulary, idiomaticlanguage and syntax in order to express myself.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau cyfathrebu gan ddefnyddio testun, delwedd, sain, animeiddiad a ﬁdeo.
translation.en: I am beginning to communicate using text, image, sound, animation and video.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgrifio digwyddiadau, gan adeiladu ac ymestyn fy ngeirfa.
translation.en: I can describe events, building and extending my vocabulary.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhyngweithio gydag eraill, siarad ac ysgrifennu am fy meddyliau, teimladau a barn, gan ddangos empathi a pharch.
translation.en: I can interact with others, talking and writing about my thoughts, feelings and opinions showing empathy and respect.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi profi cyfleoedd i ddefnyddio ieithoedd rhyngwladol.
translation.en: I have experienced opportunities to use international languages.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am ramadeg, gan gynnwys cystrawen, ac ystod eang o eirfa er mwyn cyfoethogi fy nghyfathrebu annibynnol.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of grammar, including syntax, and a wide range of vocabulary, to enhance my independent communication.

translation.cy: Cymraeg/Saesneg
translation.en: Welsh/English

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod nodweddion gwahanol fathau o lenyddiaeth a defnyddio iaith briodol i siarad amdanyn nhw.
translation.en: I can recognise the features of different types of literature and use appropriate language to talk about them.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau ymateb i lenyddiaeth rwy’n ei chlywed a’i gweld.
translation.en: I am beginning to respond to literature I hear and view.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy nychymyg i ymateb i lenyddiaeth.
translation.en: I can use my imagination to respond to literature.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymuno â chaneuon, rhigymau, straeon a cherddi cyfarwydd.
translation.en: I can join in with familiar songs, rhymes, stories and poems.

translation.cy: Cynllunio a threfnu
translation.en: Planning and organising

translation.cy: Ar gyfer y Gymraeg bydd angen i leoliadau ac ysgolion ystyried y disgrifiadau dysgu sydd fwyaf addas ar gyfer eu dysgwyr.
translation.en: Settings/schools will need to consider the descriptions of learning for Welsh most suited to their learners.

translation.cy: Gallan nhw ddewis ieithoedd a siaredir gan staff yn yr ysgol neu yn y gymuned ehangach.
translation.en: They may choose to offer languages which are spoken by staff at the school or by the wider community.
