translation.cy: Beth yw’r ffordd orau i chi ddefnyddio hyn i fod o gymorth i’ch dysgwyr wneud cynnydd yn eu holl ieithoedd?
translation.en: How can you best use this to help your learners make progress in all their languages?

translation.cy: Sut y byddwch chi’n creu awyrgylch sy’n annog dysgwyr i dynnu ar eu gwybodaeth o nifer o ieithoedd, gan gynnwys gwybodaeth am amrywiaeth o fewn ieithoedd (acen, tafodiaith, cywair, jargon, a phriodiaith) i hybu dealltwriaeth a gwella cyfathrebu wrth ymwneud ag eraill?
translation.en: How will you create an environment which encourages learners to draw upon their knowledge of a number of languages, including knowledge of language varieties (accent, dialect, register, jargon, and idiolect) to facilitate understanding and improve communication when interacting with others?

translation.cy: Sut y byddwch chi’n sicrhau awyrgylch ieithyddol gyfoethog ar gyfer yr holl ddysgwyr gan gynnwys awyrgylch amlieithog, wyneb yn wyneb, trwy iaith/ieithoedd digidol neu ysgrifenedig, a hyn fel model ar gyfer gwella eu sgiliau iaith eu hunain?
translation.en: How will you ensure rich language environments for all learners, including multilingual environments, face-to-face, via digital or written language(s), as a model for improving their own language skills?

translation.cy: Pa ysgogiadau perthnasol, cyffrous, dilys a heriol allwch chi eu darparu er mwyn ysbrydoli a chynorthwyo i baratoi ar gyfer siarad ac ysgrifennu pwrpasol (dan do, tu allan trwy ymweliadau/teithiau, ac ati)?
translation.en: What relevant, engaging, authentic and challenging stimuli can you provide to inspire and aid preparation for purposeful speaking and writing (indoors, outdoors, through visits/trips, etc.)?

translation.cy: Sut y byddwch chi’n sicrhau bod gwybodaeth a sgiliau mewn un iaith yn cael eu trosglwyddo i ieithoedd eraill, ac yna’n cael eu datblygu?
translation.en: How will you ensure that knowledge and skills in one language are transferred to and developed in other languages?

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr feithrin sgiliau darllen cynnar o fewn awyrgylch sy’n gyfoethog o ran iaith, lle mae gweithgareddau’n ystyrlon, dychmygus ac amrywiol.
translation.en: Learners should gain early reading skills within a rich language environment, where activities are meaningful, imaginative and varied.

translation.cy: Dylai’r gweithgareddau hyn hybu diddordeb dysgwyr mewn mwynhau darllen, darllen i ddibenion dychmygus a darllen ar gyfer dysgu.
translation.en: These activities should promote learners’ interest in reading for enjoyment, for imaginative purposes and for learning.

translation.cy: Nid yw gallu dadgodio geiriau yn unig yn ddigon. Dylai dysgwyr fod yn gallu gwneud synnwyr o’r hyn y maen nhw’n ei ddarllen.
translation.en: Being able to decodewords alone is not enough; readers need to be able to make sense of what they read.

translation.cy: Enghreifftio ehangder
translation.en: Illustrating breadth

translation.cy: Darperir y canlynol fel enghreifftiau o sut y gallech archwilio dysgu testunol gwahanol yn y Maes hwn.
translation.en: The following are provided as examples of how you could explore different topical learning in this Area.

translation.cy: Enghreifftiau yn unig yw'r rhain.
translation.en: These are illustrations only.

translation.cy: Davies  wahanol bersbectifau a dehongliadau o Gymru a phrofiadau Cymreig, a allai ysbrydoli dysgwyr i fynegi eu hunaniaeth a deall newidiadau dros amser mewn cymdeithas.
translation.en: Davies offers different perspectives and interpretations of Wales and Welsh experiences which could inspire learners to express their own identity and understand changes over time in society.

translation.cy: Cysylltiadau allweddol gyda Meysydd eraill
translation.en: Key links with other Areas

translation.cy: Ble bynnag y ganwyd y dysgwyr a’u teuluoedd, mae’r dysgwyr yn cael eu haddysgu mewn ysgol yng Nghymru. Byddan nhw felly, dros gyfnod o amser, yn datblygu perthynas â Chymru a’u hymdeimlad o hunaniaeth Gymreig yn ogystal â chyda’r byd ehangach
translation.en: Whether learners and their families have been born in Wales or not, the learners being educated in a school in Wales will over time develop a relationship with Wales and their own sense of Welsh identity as well as with the wider world

translation.cy: deall y galw cynyddol am y Gymraeg yn y gweithle wrth i Gymru weithio tuag at darged y miliwn o siaradwyr Cymraeg erbyn 2050
translation.en: understand the increasing demand for Welsh in the workplace as Wales works towards the target of a million Welsh speakers by 2050

translation.cy: Gall cefnogi datblygiad ieithoedd cartreffod o gymorth i hyrwyddo a datblygu ymddiriedaeth, gwerthfawrogiad a pharch ar draws ieithoedd a diwylliannau.
translation.en: Supporting the development of home languagescan help to promote and develop trust, appreciation and respect across languages and cultures.

translation.cy: Yn ychwanegol at hyn, mae rhifedd, sef defnyddio mathemateg i ddatrys problemau yn y byd go iawn, yn chwarae rhan allweddol yn ein bywydau bob-dydd, ac yng nghyﬂwr economaidd y genedl.
translation.en: What is more, numeracy – the application of mathematics to solve problems in real-world contexts – plays a critical part in our everyday lives, and in the economic health of the nation.

translation.cy: Yn ystod y blynyddoedd diweddarach, mae angen cynnig cyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr weithio’n annibynnol ac ar y cyd er mwyn adeiladu ar y sylfeini a sefydlwyd yn ystod y blynyddoedd cynnar.
translation.en: In later years, learners need to have opportunities to work both independently and collaboratively to build on the foundations established in the early years.

translation.cy: Bydd profiadau yn y Maes hwn o gymorth iddyn nhw ddysgu dehongli gwybodaeth a data er mwyn asesu risg, a defnyddio eu sgiliau rhifedd ar draws y cwricwlwm er mwyn gwneud dewisiadau effeithiol. Gall hyn oll fod o gymorth iddyn nhw ddod yn unigolion iach, hyderus sy’n barod i fyw bywyd cyflawn fel aelodau gwerthfawr o gymdeithas.
translation.en: Experiences in this Area will help them learn to interpret information and data to assess risk, and to use their numeracy skills across the curriculum to make effective choices, all of which can help them become healthy, confident individuals, ready to lead fulfilling lives as valued members of society.

translation.cy: Datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig
translation.en: Statements of what matters

translation.cy: Mae algebra yn astudio’r strwythurau sydd ymhlyg mewn cyfriﬁannau a chydberthnasau, ac yn cynnig ffordd o gyffredinoli.
translation.en: Algebra is the study of structures abstracted from computations and relations, and provides a way to make generalisations.

translation.cy: Mae astudio geometreg yn annog dysgwyr i ddatblygu a defnyddio dulliau dyfalu, rhesymu diddwythol a phrawf.
translation.en: The study of geometry encourages the development and use of conjecture, deductive reasoning and proof.

translation.cy: Mae rheoli data a chynrychioli gwybodaeth yn effeithiol yn cynnig ffordd o broﬁ rhagdybiaethau, dod i gasgliadau a gwneud rhagfynegiadau.
translation.en: Managing data and representing information effectively provide learners with the means to test hypotheses, draw conclusions and make predictions.

translation.cy: Gall pob hyfedredd ymwneud â nifer o egwyddorion, ac mae’r egwyddorion wedi’u nodi isod.
translation.en: Each proficiency may relate to multiple principles, and these are set out below.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ddeall bod y symbolau y maen nhw’n eu defnyddio yn gynrychioliadau haniaethol a dylen nhw ddatblygu mwy o hyblygrwydd wrth gymhwyso a thrin amrywiaeth gynyddol o symbolau, gan ddeall confensiynau'r symbolau y maen nhw’n eu defnyddio.
translation.en: Learners should understand that the symbols they are using are abstractrepresentations and should develop greater flexibility with the application and manipulation of an increasing range of symbols, understanding the conventions of the symbols they are using.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio amrywiaeth o gynrychioliadau i ddatblygu a chadarnhau fy nealltwriaeth fod gwerth digid yn ymwneud â’i safle.
translation.en: I can use a range of representations to develop and secure my understanding that the value of a digit is related to its position.

translation.cy: Er mwyn datrys problemau yn ymwneud â ffiniau uchaf ac isaf, rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy ngwybodaeth nad yw mesuriadau bob amser yn gywir, a bod rhaid ystyried goddefiant a lled gwall.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge that measurements are not always accurate, and are subject to tolerance and margins of error, to solve problems involving upper and lower bounds.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio perthnasoedd adiol gan ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o gynrychioliadau.
translation.en: I have explored additive relationships, using a range of representations.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adio a thynnu rhifau cyfan gan ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o ddulliau ysgrifenedig ac ymenyddol.
translation.en: I can add and subtract whole numbers, using a variety of written and mental methods.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio ac yn gallu defnyddio fy nealltwriaeth o berthnasoedd lluosol i luosi a rhannu rhifau cyfan, gan ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o gynrychioliadau, yn cynnwys dosbarthu’n gyfartal, grwpio, a llunio a dadansoddi araeau.
translation.en: I have explored and can use my understanding of multiplicative relationships to multiply and divide whole numbers, using a range of representations, including sharing, grouping and arrays.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyfrifo treth incwm a deall goblygiadau trethiant gan gynnwys defnyddio cyfraddau treth incwm Cymru a threthi eraill sydd wedi eu datganoli i Gymru.
translation.en: I can calculate income tax and understand the implications of taxation including using the Welsh rates of income tax and other taxes devolved to Wales.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau adnabod, copïo, ymestyn a chyffredinoli patrymau a dilyniannau o’m cwmpas.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise, copy, extend and generalise patterns and sequences around me.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio patrymau rhifau a siapiau.
translation.en: I have explored patterns of numbers and shape.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio cysyniadau hafaledd ac unfathiant, gan gysylltu cynrychioliadau algebraidd a graffigol.
translation.en: I can explore the concepts of equality and identity, connecting geometric, algebraic and graphical representations.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu modelu problemau gan greu mynegiadau a hafaliadau sy’n defnyddio symbolau neu eiriau i gynrychioli gwerthoedd anhysbys, gan fabwysiadu dulliau algebra.
translation.en: I can model problems, using expressions and equations involving symbols or words to represent unknown values, adopting the conventions of algebra.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio a defnyddio dulliau effeithlon o ddatrys hafaliadau cydamserol, cwadratig a thrigonometrig gan hefyd gymhwyso’r wybodaeth hon i ad-drefnu hafaliadau ble mae’r testun yn ymddangos mewn un term.
translation.en: I can explore and use efficient methods of solving simultaneous, quadratic and trigonometric equations, and I can apply this knowledge to rearrange formulae where the subject appears in more than one term.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio amrywiaeth o graffiau aflinol, gan gynnwys rhai cwadratig, ciwbig a chilyddol er mwyn dod i ddeall effaith cyfernodau a chysonion ar siâp y graff.
translation.en: I can investigate a variety of non-linear graphs, including quadratic, cubic and reciprocal, to develop an understanding of the effect of the coefficients and constants on the shape of the graph.

translation.cy: Wrth fesur, rwy’n dechrau deall yr angen i ailadrodd yr un uned ffisegol heb unrhyw fylchau.
translation.en: I am beginning to understand the need to repeat the same physical unit without any gaps when measuring.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu perthnasu siâp tri dimensiwn i’w rwydau dau ddimensiwn.
translation.en: I can relate a three-dimensional shape to its two-dimensional nets.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio dulliau effeithlon i ddarganfod perimedr ac arwynebedd siapiau dau ddimensiwn, gan ddeall sut mae hafaliadau sylfaenol yn deillio ohonynt.
translation.en: I can use efficient methods for finding the perimeter and area of two-dimensional shapes, understanding how basic formulae are derived.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymhwyso fy nealltwriaeth o arwynebedd i ddangos a defnyddio’r berthynas rhwng trionglau ongl sgwâr a sgwariau yng nghyd-destun theorem Pythagoras.
translation.en: I can apply my understanding of area to demonstrate and use the relationship between right-angled triangles and squares in the context of Pythagoras’ theorem.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy ngwybodaeth o fesur i gyfrifo perimedr, arwynebedd (neu arwynebedd arwyneb) a chyfaint siapiau dau ddimensiwn a thri dimensiwn cyfansawdd.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of measurement to calculate the perimeter, area (or surface area) and volume of compound two-dimensional and three‑dimensional shapes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dangos fy nealltwriaeth o onglau fel ffordd o fesur cylchdro, ac rwy’n gallu adnabod, enwi a disgriﬁo mathau o onglau.
translation.en: I can demonstrate my understanding of angle as a measure of rotation and I can recognise, name and describe types of angles.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod sut mae anomaleddau yn effeithio ar y cymedr.
translation.en: I can recognise how anomalies affect the mean.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio data er mwyn dod i gasgliadau am ragdybiaethau, ac rwyf wedi mynegi fy nghanfyddiadau yn glir.
translation.en: I can use data to draw conclusions about hypotheses and I have communicated my findings clearly.

translation.cy: Sgiliau trawsgwricwlaidd
translation.en: Cross-curricular skills

translation.cy: Llythrennedd
translation.en: Literacy

translation.cy: Rhifedd
translation.en: Numeracy

translation.cy: Gellir cymhwyso a chysylltu’r pum hyfedredd mathemategol– Dealltwriaeth gysyniadol, Cyfathrebu gan ddefnyddio symbolau, Cymhwysedd strategol, Rhesymu rhesymegol a Rhuglder – gan ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau bywyd go iawn i gyflwyno ac archwilio cysyniadau mathemategol, yn ogystal â’u cadarnhau.
translation.en: The five mathematical proficiencies– Conceptual understanding, Communication using symbols, Fluency, Logical reasoning and Strategic competence – can be applied and connected by using a range of real-life contexts to introduce and explore mathematical concepts, as well as to consolidate them.

translation.cy: Meddwl yn feirniadol a datrys problemau
translation.en: Critical thinking and problem-solving

translation.cy: Mae astudio mathemateg yn datblygu effeithiolrwydd personol.
translation.en: Studying mathematics develops personal effectiveness.

translation.cy: Ystyriaethau penodol ar gyfer y Maes hwn
translation.en: Specific considerations for this Area

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn gosod sail ar gyfer defnyddio symboleiddio algebraiddyn llwyddiannus.
translation.en: This lays the foundations for using algebraic symbolisation successfully.

translation.cy: Mae tebygolrwydd yn cael ei fynegi trwy rif mewn amrywiol ffyrdd, gan ddefnyddio canrannau, ffracsiynau a degolion ynghyd â dealltwriaeth o’r gwahanol gynrychioliadau; mae’r cysylltiadau rhyngddyn nhw yn angenrheidiol ar gyfer mynegi tebygolrwydd yn effeithiol.
translation.en: Probability is expressed through number in various ways, using percentages, fractions and decimals, and an understanding of the different representations; the connections between them are necessary for effective expression of probability.

translation.cy: Trwy amrywiaeth o brofiadau, mae dysgwyr yn gwerthfawrogi grym mathemateg i fynegi perthnasoedd yn gryno, mewn ffurfiau sy’n gyffredinol ddealladwy.
translation.en: Through a broad range of experiences, learners appreciate the power of mathematics to express relationships concisely, in forms that are universally understood.

translation.cy: Dylai’r rhain gael eu cyfuno o fewn dilyniannau gwersi a allai gynnwys datrys problemau, archwilio, cyfarwyddyd uniongyrchol, cymhwysiad, ymarferion a thasgau estynedig fel sy’n briodol ar gyfer y fathemateg benodol a ddysgir a datblygiad cyffredinol y pum hyfedredd.
translation.en: These should be combined into lesson sequences which might include problem-solving, exploration, direct instruction, application, exercises and extended tasks as appropriate for the specific mathematics being taught and the overall development of the five proficiencies.

translation.cy: Bydd cwestiynau sy’n arwain, ynghyd â gwybodaeth am ddewis a dilyniannu dulliau addysgeg er mwyn rheoli’r amrywiaeth hon, yn cael eu cynnwys yn yr adnodd ar addysgeg.
translation.en: Guiding questions and information about choice and sequencing of pedagogical approaches to manage this diversity will be included in theresource onpedagogy.

translation.cy: Darperir y canlynol fel enghreifftiau o sut y gallech archwilio dysgu testunol gwahanol yn y Maes hwn.
translation.en: The following are provided as examples of how you could explore different topical learning in this Area.

translation.cy: Iechyd a Lles
translation.en: Health and Well-being

translation.cy: Un o’r cysylltiadau pwysicaf yw’r cysylltiad â Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Iechyd a Lles ac mae’r enghreifftiau yn cynnwys ymdrin â llythrennedd ariannol a risg.
translation.en: One of the most important links is with the Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience and an example would be around financial literacy and risk.

translation.cy: Oherwydd cysylltiadau mor agos anogir yn gryf ddysgu’r ddwy elfen arbennig yma yn gyfochrog.
translation.en: Because of such close links, it is strongly recommended that both elements are taught in parallel.

translation.cy: Ar ben hynny, mae Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Iechyd a Lles yn cynnig cyfle i archwilio rôl rhifedd wrth brynu a pharatoi bwyd i gefnogi maeth, a’i rôl wrth fesur pellter, pwysau ac amser.
translation.en: Furthermore, the Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience provides opportunity to explore the role of numeracy in purchasing and preparing food to support nutrition and its role in measuring distance, weight and time.

translation.cy: Themâu trawsbynciol
translation.en: Cross-cutting themes

translation.cy: Mae hyn hefyd yn hyrwyddo a chefnogi dysgu trawsgwricwlaidd.
translation.en: This also promotes and supports cross-curricular learning.

translation.cy: ystyriwch addysgu dysgwyr y ffordd draddodiadol, ugeiniol, o gyfrif yn Gymraeg, yn ogystal â’r ffordd ddegol, er mwyn pwysleisio natur arbennig mathemateg yng nghyd-destun y Gymraeg.
translation.en: consider teaching learners the traditional, vigesimal, way of counting in Welsh, as well as the modern decimal way, to highlight the distinctive nature of mathematics in a Welsh language context.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr sy’n gyfranwyr mentrus, creadigol sy’n barod i chwarae eu rhan yn llawn mewn bywyd a gwaith yn croesawu heriau o’r fath, oherwydd byddan nhw’n cael eu hannog i gymryd risg, i arloesi a gwerthuso, a dysgu sut i ddarganfod atebion.
translation.en: Learners who are enterprising, creative contributors, ready to play a full part in life and work embrace such challenges, as they are encouraged to take risks, to innovate and evaluate, and learn to develop solutions.

translation.cy: Mae meddylfryd dylunio a pheirianneg yn cynnig ffyrdd technegol a chreadigol i ddiwallu anghenion a dymuniadau cymdeithas.
translation.en: Design thinking and engineering offer technical and creative ways to meet society’s needs and wants.

translation.cy: Trwy gymhwyso eu profiadau, eu sgiliau a’u gwybodaeth, gall dysgwyr ddylunio a siapio datrysiadau peirianyddol arloesol.
translation.en: By applying their experiences, skills and knowledge, learners can design and shape innovative engineered solutions.

translation.cy: Trwy sylwi ar amrywiaeth pethau byw, a sut maen nhw’n ymwneud â’u hamgylchedd, gall dysgwyr ddod i ddeall sut mae’r rhain wedi esblygu dros gyfnodau sylweddol o amser.
translation.en: By recognising the diversity of living things and how they interact with their environment, learners can develop an understanding of how these have evolved over significant periods of time.

translation.cy: Mae sut mae materyn ymddwyn yn pennu priodweddau defnyddiau ac yn ein galluogi i ddefnyddio adnoddau naturiol, yn ogystal â chreu sylweddau newydd.
translation.en: The behaviour of matter determines the properties of materials and allows us to use natural resources, as well as to create new substances.

translation.cy: Gellir modelu’r syniadau hyn a’u mynegi’n ffurfiol, gan ddarparu fframwaith mathemategol cyson ar gyfer disgrifio systemau ffisegol.
translation.en: These ideas can be modelled and expressed formally, providing a consistent mathematical framework to describe physical systems.

translation.cy: Mae hyn wedi arwain at rai o ddarganfyddiadau gwyddonol a chyflawniadau peirianyddol mwyaf cymdeithas.
translation.en: This has enabled some of society’s greatest scientific breakthroughs and engineering achievements.

translation.cy: Ehangder a dyfnder gwybodaeth cynyddol
translation.en: Increasing breadth and depth of knowledge

translation.cy: cynnwys meithrin dealltwriaeth ddofn o'r dysgu sy'n cael ei fynegi ym mhob datganiad o'r hyn sy'n bwysig yn y Maes a'r cydberthnasau a'r cysylltiadau cymhleth sy'n bodoli rhyngddyn nhw.
translation.en: Progression in this Area includes the development of a deep understanding of the learning expressed within all the statements of what matters within the Area and the complex relationships and connections which exist between them.

translation.cy: Mae ymchwilio, archwilio, dadansoddi, datrys problemau, a dylunio yn sgiliau allweddol sydd eu hangen wrth i ddysgwyr weithio ar hyd continwwm dysgu y Maes hwn.
translation.en: Investigation, exploration, analysis, problem-solving, and design are key skills required as learners work along the continuum of learning in this Area.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwr wneud cynnydd, mae'n archwilio ac yn ymchwilio i broblemau ac yn ffurfio atebion creadigol canlyniadol mewn ffordd gynyddol soffistigedig.
translation.en: As a learner makes progress, there is increasing sophistication in the way in which they explore and investigate problems and the resulting formulation of creative solutions.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr feithrin ymwybyddiaeth o'u dealltwriaeth gynyddol soffistigedig a'r gallu i reoleiddio eu meddwl eu hunain.
translation.en: Learners should develop an awareness of their increasing sophistication of understanding and an ability to regulate their own thinking.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod patrymau ar sail fy arsylwadau a’m hymchwiliadau, ac rwy’n gallu mynegi fy nghanfyddiadau.
translation.en: I can recognise patterns from my observations and investigations and can communicate my findings.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio gwahanol ffurfiau o egni, a sut y mae’n gallu cael ei drosglwyddo.
translation.en: I can investigate different forms of energy and how it can be transferred.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymchwilio i honiadau a gyﬂwynir fel ffeithiau gwyddonol, a’u gwerthuso, drwy ystyried dilysrwydd y dystiolaeth ategol.
translation.en: I can research and evaluate claims presented as scientific facts by considering the validity of the supporting evidence.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgriﬁo effeithiau gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg, y gorffennol a’r presennol, yn fy mywyd pob-dydd.
translation.en: I can describe the impacts of science and technology, past and present, in my everyday life.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio offer syml, defnyddiau a chyfarpar yn ddiogel er mwyn adeiladu a dadadeiladu.
translation.en: I can safely use simple tools, materials and equipment to construct and deconstruct.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ddefnyddio ystod o offer, defnyddiau a chyfarpar yn ddiogel er mwyn adeiladu at amrywiaeth o ddibenion.
translation.en: I can safely use a range of tools, materials and equipment to construct for a variety of reasons.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ystyried sut y bydd fy nghynigion dylunio yn datrys problemau a sut y gall hyn effeithio ar yr amgylchedd.
translation.en: I can consider how my design proposals will solve problems and how this may affect the environment.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dewis a chymhwyso dulliau cyfathrebu addas yn annibynnol er mwyn datblygu a chyflwyno fy syniadau yn rhugl.
translation.en: I can independently select and apply appropriate communication methods to develop and present my ideas fluently.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgriﬁo sut mae pethau byw yn cystadlu am adnoddau penodol ac yn dibynnu ar ei gilydd er mwyn goroesi.
translation.en: I can describe how living things compete for specific resources and depend on each other for survival.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu disgrifio rhai newidiadau mewn tyfiant a datblygiad sy’n cael eu hachosi gan hormonau.
translation.en: I can describe some changes in growth and development caused by hormones.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu nodi’r bygythiadau i ddatblygiad ac iechyd organebau ac yn adnabod rhai amddiffynfeydd naturiol, ataliad haint a thriniaethau.
translation.en: I can identify the threats to the development and health of organisms and recognise some natural defences, preventions and treatments.

translation.cy: Mae mater, a’r ffordd y mae’n ymddwyn, yn diffinio ein bydysawd ac yn ffurfio ein bywydau.
translation.en: Matter and the way it behaves defines our universe and shapes our lives.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dadansoddi symudiad gwrthrychau’n feintiol, a deall sut y gall gweithredu grymoedd arnyn nhw newid eu mudiant.
translation.en: I can quantitively analyse the movement of objects and understand how applying forces to them can change their motion.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall cadwraeth egni a gallu esbonio bod egni’n cael ei ddefnyddio ar wahanol gyfraddau, a bod hyn yn effeithio ar bŵer ac effeithlonrwydd system.
translation.en: I can understand conservation of energy and can explain that energy is used at differing rates, and that this affects the power and efficiency of a system.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio sut a pham mae amrywiol gategorïau o donnau yn cael eu defnyddio at wahanol ddibenion.
translation.en: I can explain how and why various categories of waves are used for different applications.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio meysydd magnetig trwy arbrofi er mwyn ymchwilio i ffactorau sy’n effeithio ar eu cryfder.
translation.en: Through experiment, I can explore magnetic fields to investigate factors that affect their strength.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio modelaui sicrhau dealltwriaeth ddyfnach o’r cysylltiadau rhwng grym, cerrynt a meysydd magnetig.
translation.en: I can use modelsto enable deeper understanding of the links between force, current and magnetic fields.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dethol a defnyddio nifer o synwyryddion ac ysgogyddion sy’n galluogi i systemau cyfrifiadurol ryngweithio gyda’r byd o’u cwmpas.
translation.en: I can select and use multiple sensors and actuators that allow computer systems to interact with the world around them.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cynllunio a chreu systemau ffisegol sy’n defnyddio cydrannau addas a rhesymeg i gyflawni tasgu neu i gyrraedd at nod.
translation.en: I can design and create physical systems that use appropriate components and logic to complete tasks and achieve goals.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio’r technegau a ddefnyddir i gadw a throsglwyddo data, a deall sut maen nhw’n agored i niwed.
translation.en: I can explain the techniques used to store and transfer data and understand their vulnerabilities.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu storio a thrin data yn effeithiol er mwyn cynhyrchu a dangos gwybodaeth ddefnyddiol yn weledol.
translation.en: I can effectively store and manipulate data to produce and give a visual form to useful information.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio gweithredyddion mathemategol a rhesymegol o fewn gwahanol feddalwedd er mwyn archwilio trywydd ymholi yn annibynnol.
translation.en: I can make use of mathematical and logical operators in different software tools to investigate a line of inquiry independently.

translation.cy: Effeithiolrwydd personol
translation.en: Personal effectiveness

translation.cy: Yn ychwanegol at hyn, wrth ystyried ymchwiliad gwyddonol mae’r Fframwaith Rhifedd Cenedlaetholyn rhoi manylion pellach er mwyn cefnogicynllunio cwricwlwm yn seiliedig ar yr agweddau hyn o addysgu.
translation.en: When considering scientific inquiry, the National Numeracy Frameworkgives additional detail to support curriculum planning on these aspects of learning.

translation.cy: Defnyddir ystod eang o fodelau yn y Maes hwn gan gynnwys:
translation.en: A wide range of models are used in the Area including:

translation.cy: dysgu sut y gellir trin defnyddiau:
translation.en: learning how materials can be manipulated:

translation.cy: niwtraliad, ocsideiddio, adweithiau ecsothermig ac endothermig, yn ogystal â dadleoliad a rhydwythiad
translation.en: neutralisation, oxidation, exothermic and endothermic reactions, as well as displacement and reduction

translation.cy: ystod o dechnegau ymarferol, sy’n dod yn gynyddol gymhleth wrth i ddysgu ddatblygu (gan gynnwys cymryd mesuriadau a gwneud arsylwadau), yn ogystal ag ystyried sut mae technegau gwahanu a dadansoddi penodol yn briodol ar gyfer gwahanol ddibenion, a dulliau echdynnu
translation.en: a range of practical techniques, which become increasingly more complex as learning progresses (including taking measurements and making observations), as well as considering how specific techniques to separate and analyse are appropriate for different purposes, and methods of extraction

translation.cy: datblygu sgiliau motor manwla sgiliau motor brasyn arwain at gywirdeb, manylder a chrefftwaith trwy ystod o weithgareddau dysgu sy’n cynyddu mewn amrywiaeth wrth i ddysgwyr ddangos cynnnydd
translation.en: developing fine motor movementsand gross motor movementsleading to accuracy, precision and craftsmanship through a range of learning activities which increase in variety as learners progress

translation.cy: Gall cyd-destunau gynnwys rhai entrepreneuraidd, damcaniaethol a dychmygu dyfodol posib, a dylen nhw ystyried ffactorau cymdeithasol, diwylliannol, economaidd ac amgylcheddol.
translation.en: Contexts can include entrepreneurial, speculative and imagining future possibilities, and should consider social, cultural, economic and environmental factors.

translation.cy: dros gyfnod o amser, dealltwriaeth o briodweddau metalau ac anfetelau, sut mae priodweddau yn cael eu heffeithio gan eu strwythurau (e.e. dargludedd, pwynt toddi a hydrinedd), natur sylweddau organig ac anorganig, a gwahanol fathau o ymbelydredd
translation.en: over time, understanding the properties of metals and non-metals, how properties are affected by their structures (e.g. conductivity, melting point and malleability), the nature of organic and inorganic substances, and different types of radiation

translation.cy: Mae’r cyfuniad o feysydd a grymoedd magnetig yn galluogi trydan i gael ei gynhyrchu a’i ddefnyddio i greu mudiant sy’n datblygu tuag at ddealltwriaeth o Ddeddfau Fleming mewn camau cynnydd diweddarach
translation.en: The combination of magnetic fields and forces enables electricity to be generated and used to create motion, which builds towards an understanding of Fleming's Laws in later progression steps

translation.cy: sut mae’r gofod yn cynnig cyfleoedd cyfoethog i gyffroi dysgwyr, gan gynnwys cyd-destun ar gyfer ystyried trosglwyddiad egni, yn ogystal â thonnau a’r sbectrwm electromagnetig i alluogi arsylwadau a chasglu tystiolaeth.
translation.en: space provides a rich source of engagement for learners, including a context for considering energy transfer, as well as waves and the electromagnetic spectrum to enable observations and evidence gathering.

translation.cy: Gallant ddefnyddio ystod o offer meddalwedd i greu, rheoli ac archwilio setiau data er mwyn ymchwilio elfennau ymholi.
translation.en: They can use a range of software tools to create, manage and interrogate datasets to investigate lines of inquiry.

translation.cy: Enghreifftiau yn unig yw'r rhain.
translation.en: These are illustrations only.

translation.cy: Wrth ddatblygu sgiliau codio, gall dysgwyr hefyd ddeall a gwerthuso sut mae prosesau cyfrifiadurol wedi newid, ac yn parhau i newid y ffordd rydyn ni'n byw, yn gweithio ac yn astudio.
translation.en: In developing coding skills, learners can also understand and evaluate how computational process have changed, and continue to change, the way we live, work and study.

translation.cy: Yn y ddau Faes defnyddir dulliau creadigol i archwilio cysyniadau a defnyddiau, yn ogystal â datblygu medrusrwydd â dwylo, cywirdeb, manylrwydd, a chrefftwaith sy’n cefnogi cynhyrchu.
translation.en: In both Areas creative approaches are applied to explore concepts and materials, as well as the development of learners' manual dexterity, accuracy, precision and craftsmanship supporting production.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau
translation.en: Humanities

translation.cy: Gall gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg gynnig datrysiadau ac ymatebion i’r heriau mae dynoliaeth yn eu hwynebu yn y byd modern.
translation.en: Science and technology can offer solutions and responses to the challenges that humanity faces in the modern world.

translation.cy: Themau trawsgwricwlaidd
translation.en: Cross-curricular themes

translation.cy: Mae’r rhain yn cynnwys datrys problemau, creadigrwydd ac arloesedd, dadansoddi data a gwybodaeth, a’r gallu i resymu a meddwl yn rhesymegol.
translation.en: These include problem-solving, creativity and innovation, interpreting data and information, reasoning ability and the ability to think logically.

translation.cy: sicrhau dealltwriaeth gyffredin o gynnydd
translation.en: ensuring a shared understanding of progression

translation.cy: Mae’r canllawiau hyn yn manylu ar yr agweddau hynny ar y trefniadau asesu yr ydym yn bwriadu iddynt fod yn statudol i ysgolion, yn ogystal â’r agweddau hynny y bydd angen i ysgolion roi sylw dyledus iddynt wrth gynllunio eu cwricwlwm ysgol.
translation.en: This guidance details those aspects of the assessment arrangements that we intend to be statutory for schools, as well as those aspects to which schools will need to have due regard when designing and planning their school curriculum.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru wedi ymrwymo i greu system addysg gynhwysol i helpu i sicrhau bod pob person ifanc yn cael mynediad at addysg o safon uchel ac yn cyrraedd eu potensial llawn.
translation.en: The Welsh Government is committed to creating an inclusive education system to help ensure that all young people have access to a high standard of education and reach their full potential.

translation.cy: Sut i ddefnyddio’r canllawiau hyn
translation.en: How to use this guidance

translation.cy: Dylai penaethiaid ddefnyddio’r canllawiau asesu fel sail ar gyfer trafodaethau a dysgu proffesiynol o fewn eu hysgolion.
translation.en: Headteachers should use the assessment guidance as a basis for professional discussions and learning within their schools.

translation.cy: Caiff canllawiau statudol ar wahân eu cyhoeddi yn 2021 i gefnogi unedau cyfeirio disgyblion a phobl sy’n gyfrifol am ddarparu addysg heblaw yn yr ysgol.
translation.en: Separate statutory guidance to support PRUs and those responsible for the provision of EOTAS will also be published in 2021.

translation.cy: Mae asesu yn chwarae rhan sylfaenol o ran sicrhau bod pob dysgwr unigol yn cael ei gefnogi a’i herio’n briodol.
translation.en: Assessment plays a fundamental role in ensuring each individual learner is supported and challenged accordingly.

translation.cy: i ble mae angen iddynt fynd o ran eu dysgu
translation.en: where they need to go in their learning

translation.cy: Y prif gyfranogwyr yn y broses ddysgu, y mae asesu yn rhan sylfaenol ohoni, yw arweinwyr, ymarferwyr, dysgwyr, rhieni/gofalwyr a phartneriaid allanol.
translation.en: The main participants in the learning process, of which assessment is a fundamental part, are leaders, practitioners, learners, parents/carers and external partners.

translation.cy: galluogi ymarferwyr i ddatblygu’r wybodaeth a’r sgiliau sydd eu hangen i gyflawni eu rôl asesu yn effeithiol
translation.en: enabling practitioners to develop the knowledge and skills necessary to carry out their role in assessment effectively

translation.cy: sicrhau bod sylw dyledus wedi’i roi i’r gofynion statudol a’r canllawiau ar gyfer asesu, a bod ymarferwyr yn ystyried hyn wrth gynllunio dysgu ac addysgu ac yn eu harferion dyddiol.
translation.en: ensuring that due regard has been paid to the statutory requirements and guidance for assessment, and that practitioners are taking account of this in planning learning and teaching and within daily practice.

translation.cy: Dylai ymarferwyr gefnogi a herio dysgwyr yn effeithiol i sicrhau eu bod yn gwneud cynnydd.
translation.en: Practitioners should support and challenge learners effectively to ensure they each make progress.

translation.cy: cymryd rhan mewn deialog gydag arweinwyr a chyd-ymarferwyr i sicrhau bod ganddynt ddarlun clir o’r cynnydd sy’n cael ei wneud o fewn eu hysgol
translation.en: engaging in dialogue with leaders and fellow practitioners to ensure they have a clear picture of the progress being made within their school

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn eu helpu i ddatblygu gwybodaeth, sgiliau a dealltwriaeth, a’u cymhwyso mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau.
translation.en: This will help them to develop knowledge, skills and understanding, and apply them in different contexts.

translation.cy: Dylid datblygu’r gyd-ddealltwriaeth hon trwy ddysgu proffesiynol ac fel proses barhaus o fewn ac ar draws ysgolion – ac mae deialog broffesiynol yn agwedd sylfaenol ar hyn.
translation.en: This shared understanding should be developed through both professional learning and as an ongoing process both within and across schools, of which professional dialogue is a fundamental aspect.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn rhan o’r rhyngweithio sy’n digwydd bob dydd fel rhan o’r dysgu a’r addysgu, ac mae’n adeiladu ar y rhyngweithiadau hynny, e.e. dysgwr i ddysgwr, dysgwr i ymarferydd ac ymarferydd i arweinydd.
translation.en: This forms part of, and builds upon, the interactions which take place on a daily basis as part of learning and teaching, e.g. learner to learner, learner to practitioner and practitioner to leader.

translation.cy: Dylai ysgolion sicrhau bod deilliannau’r broses hon yn cael eu hystyried fel rhan o’u proses hunanwerthuso barhaus a’u bod yn cael eu defnyddio i fyfyrio ar eu proses o gynllunio’r cwricwlwm.
translation.en: Schools should ensure that the outcomes of this process are considered as part of their ongoing self-evaluation process and are used to reflect upon their curriculum design and planning process.

translation.cy: I gefnogi’r broses hon a sicrhau lles dysgwyr:
translation.en: To support this process and ensure the well-being of learners:

translation.cy: Wrth ddatblygu’r prosesau hyn, dylid ystyried defnyddio amrywiaeth eang o ddulliau cyfathrebu gwahanol, e.e. wyneb yn wyneb, digidol, ysgrifenedig, ac ati.
translation.en: When developing these processes, consideration should be given to using a wide variety of different communication means, e.g. face-to-face, digital, written, etc.

translation.cy: Dylid hefyd rannu gwybodaeth am unrhyw gymorth, ymyriadau neu anghenion ychwanegol.
translation.en: Information on any support, interventions or additional needs required for the learner’s development should also be shared.

translation.en: Consent of a person who had parental responsibility for the child immediately before the child died, or where no such person exists, the consent of a person in a qualifying relationship to the child at that time.

translation.en: Examples of the types of relevant material that may be specified are composite tissues and other types of material the removal and use of which is considered to be novel.

translation.en: An appointment may be general or limited to consent in relation to such one or more transplantation activities as may be specified in the appointment.

translation.cy: Pan fo person wedi penodi person neu bersonau o dan adran 4 o Ddeddf Meinweoedd Dynol 2004 i ymdrin â’r mater o gydsynio mewn perthynas â gweithgaredd a wneir at ddibenion trawsblannu, mae’r person i’w drin hefyd fel un sydd wedi gwneud penodiad o dan yr adran hon mewn perthynas â’r gweithgaredd.
translation.en: Where a person has appointed a person or persons under section 4 of the Human Tissue Act 2004 to deal after death with the issue of consent in relation to an activity done for the purpose of transplantation, the person is also to be treated as having made an appointment under this section in relation to the activity.

translation.cy: Argymhellwn y dylid ad-drefnu gwasanaethau anhwylderau bwyta yn helaeth ar draws Cymru, a buddsoddi ynddyn nhw, er mwyn eu cydweddu â chyfres glir o egwyddorion.
translation.en: We recommend a major reorganisation of, and investment in, the eating disorder services across Wales to align it with a clear set of principles.

translation.cy: Dylai’r gwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta weithio gyda gwasanaethau rheoli pwysau ym mhob Bwrdd Iechyd i ddatblygu cysylltiadau a llwybrau er mwyn canfod a thrin pobl ag anhwylder gorfwyta mewn pyliau.
translation.en: The eating disorder service should work together with weight management services in each Health Board to develop relationships and pathways to detect and treat people with binge eating disorder.

translation.cy: O gofio’r heriau mawr yn ymwneud yn benodol â diabetes a’r risgiau meddygol uchel sy’n gysylltiedig â rheoli cleifion â diabetes ac anhwylderau bwyta, argymhellwn y dylid cael tîm isarbenigol amlddisgyblaethol cenedlaethol oddi mewn i’r gwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta cenedlaethol a chanddo arbenigedd deuol mewn diabetes ac anhwylderau bwyta.
translation.en: Given the major diabetes-specific challenges and high medical risks involved in managing patients who have diabetes and eating disorders we recommend a national multidisciplinary subspecialist team within the national eating disorder service which has dual expertise in diabetes and eating disorders.

translation.cy: Ni chaiff defnydd digonol ei wneud o rôl teuluoedd yn y gwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta presennol.
translation.en: The role of the families in the current eating disorder service is under-utilised.

translation.cy: Yng ngwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta Cymru dylid ystyried anghenion a safbwyntiau teuluoedd y plant a’r bobl ifanc, a hefyd yr oedolion, sydd ag anhwylderau bwyta.
translation.en: The needs and perspectives of families of both children and young people and adults with eating disorders should be considered in the eating disorder service for Wales.

translation.cy: Roedd y cyhoedd o’r farn fod hyn yn arwain at wanio llawer ar yr arbenigedd a’r gofal a geir yn y gwasanaeth.
translation.en: The public felt that this results in a very diluted service of expertise and care.

translation.cy: Bydd yr adolygiad hwn yn ailystyried yr angen am gael uned yng Nghymru ar gyfer cleifion mewnol sy’n oedolion, ar ôl i effeithiau’r Dull Ysgol Gyfan, ynghyd ag effeithiau cysylltiadau gwell gyda gofal sylfaenol ac asiantaethau eraill, ymyrraeth gynnar ac allgymorth, gael eu cyflawni.
translation.en: This review will revisit and reconsider the need for an adult inpatient unit in Wales, once the impact of the Whole School Approach, better relationships with primary care and other agencies, early intervention and outreach have been achieved.

translation.cy: Byddwn wedyn yn cuddio’ch manylion.
translation.en: We will then redact them before publishing.

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl y bydd yr enwau a’r cyfeiriadau y byddwn wedi’u cuddio yn cael eu cyhoeddi’n ddiweddarach, er nad yw hynny’n debygol o ddigwydd yn aml iawn.
translation.en: Names or addresses we redact might still get published later, though we do not think this would happen very often.

translation.cy: Mae Deddf Rhyddid Gwybodaeth 2000 a Rheoliadau Gwybodaeth Amgylcheddol 2004 yn caniatáu i'r cyhoedd gael gweld gwybodaeth a gedwir gan lawer o gyrff cyhoeddus, gan gynnwys Llywodraeth Cymru.
translation.en: The Freedom of Information Act 2000 and the Environmental Information Regulations 2004 allow the public to ask to see information held by many public bodies, including the Welsh Government.

translation.cy: Mae hynny’n cynnwys gwybodaeth sydd heb ei chyhoeddi.
translation.en: This includes information which has not been published.

translation.cy: Water Lane

translation.cy: I gael rhagor o fanylion am yr wybodaeth y mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn ei chadw ac am y defnydd a wneir ohoni, neu os ydych am arfer eich hawliau o dan y Rheoliad Diogelu Data Cyffredinol, gweler y manylion cyswllt isod:
translation.en: For further details about the information the Welsh Government holds and its use, or if you want to exercise your rights under the GDPR, please see contact details below:

translation.cy: Rwy’n falch o’r ymateb y mae cymunedau Cymru ac awdurdodau cyhoeddus wedi’i wneud ers cyhoeddi ein cynllun Ffoaduriaid a Cheiswyr Lloches diwethaf yn 2016.
translation.en: I am proud of the response that Welsh communities and public authorities have made since our last Refugee and Asylum Seeker plan was published in 2016.

translation.cy: Llywodraeth y DU sy’n gyfrifol am bolisi lloches, sy’n cynnwys gwneud penderfyniadau ar geisiadau am loches, darparu cymorth a llety i geiswyr lloches, a gweithredu cynlluniau adsefydlu ffoaduriaid.
translation.en: The UK Government is responsible for asylum policy, which includes asylum application decision making, the provision of support and accommodation for asylum seekers, and the operation of refugee resettlement schemes.

translation.cy: Mae hawliau dynol wedi’u hymwreiddio yn holl weithgarwch Llywodraeth Cymru.
translation.en: Human rights are embedded in all of the actions of the Welsh Government.

translation.cy: Llywodraeth y DU yn hytrach na Llywodraeth Cymru sy’n gyfrifol am loches a mewnfudo.
translation.en: Responsibility for asylum and immigration rests with the UK Government rather than the Welsh Government.

translation.cy: Mae’r pum ffordd o weithio a nodir yn Neddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol yn sail i’n dulliau o fynd i’r afael ag anghydraddoldeb a sicrhau Cymru decach.
translation.en: The five ways of working set out in the Well-Being of Future Generations Act underpin our approach to tackling inequality and ensuring a fairer Wales.

translation.cy: Mae’r rhain yn cynnwys digartrefedd, cyflyrau iechyd meddwl, llety gwael a’r risg o amddifadedd.
translation.en: These include homelessness, mental health conditions, poor accommodation and the risk of destitution.

translation.cy: Mae’r cynllun drafft hwn yn ceisio pennu cyfeiriad polisi Llywodraeth Cymru mewn perthynas â’r cymunedau hyn tan ddiwedd tymor y Cynulliad hwn.
translation.en: This draft plan seeks to set Welsh Government policy direction relating to these communities until the end of this Assembly term.

translation.cy: Mae cymunedau yng Nghymru yn rhoi croeso ysbrydoledig i lawer o ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches eisoes, fel a welir yn yr ymgyrch ‘Croeso i Ffoaduriaid’ a thwf sefydliadau Nawdd Cymunedol.
translation.en: Welsh communities already provide an inspiring welcome to many refugees and asylum seekers, exemplified by the ‘Refugees Welcome’ campaign and the growth of Community Sponsorship organisations.

translation.cy: Gwyddom fod ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches yn wynebu heriau sylweddol wrth iddynt gyrraedd y DU ond ni chaiff llawer o’r dystiolaeth a fyddai’n ein helpu ni i sicrhau ein bod ni’n targedu cymorth yn y ffordd orau wedi’i chasglu hyd yma.
translation.en: We know refugees and asylum seekers face considerable challenges upon their arrival in the UK but much of the evidence which would help us to ensure we best target support is not yet collected.

translation.cy: Felly, byddwn yn sefydlu grŵp tystiolaeth i wella gwaith casglu a rhannu data gyda’r rhai sydd yn y sefyllfa orau i gynorthwyo’r unigolion hyn.
translation.en: Therefore, we will establish an evidence group to improve data collection and sharing with those who are best placed to support these individuals.

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod y canllawiau sy’n sail i’r Strategaethau Atal Digartrefedd lleol yn ystyried pa mor agored i’r posibilrwydd o ddigartrefedd y mae ffoaduriaid newydd;
translation.en: Ensure the guidance underpinning local Homelessness Prevention Strategies takes account of the vulnerability of new refugees to homelessness;

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod hyfforddiant landlordiaid Rhentu Doeth Cymru yn cynnwys esboniad o’r gwiriadau Hawl i Rentu a sut i wirio statws ffoaduriaid yn hawdd er mwyn atal gwahaniaethu (unwaith y bydd y dyddiad cyflwyno’n hysbys);
translation.en: Ensure Rent Smart Wales landlords’ training includes an explanation of the Right to Rent checks and how to easily check the status of refugees to prevent discrimination (once the rollout date is known);

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn:
translation.en: Welsh Government will:

translation.cy: cyflogwr, gan ddangos tegwch, ymddygiad agored a thryloywder er mwyn rhoi cyfle i gymaint o bobl â phosibl wneud cais;
translation.en: Welsh Government as an employer, demonstrating fairness, openness and transparency to allow as many people as possible the chance to apply;

translation.cy: Gweithio tuag at atal ffoaduriaid neu geiswyr lloches rhag dod yn ddioddefwyr masnachu pobl neu gaethwasiaeth fodern
translation.en: Work towards preventing refugees or asylum seekers becoming human trafficking or modern slavery victims

translation.cy: Gweithio gyda busnesau ledled Cymru i dynnu sylw at effaith caethwasiaeth yn y gadwyn gyflenwi cyflogaeth.
translation.en: Work with businesses across Wales to highlight the impact of slavery in the employment supply chain.

translation.en: Actions

translation.cy: Cynnal gofal iechyd am ddim i ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches, gan gynnwys rhai sydd heb atebolrwydd i gronfeydd cyhoeddus;
translation.en: Maintain free healthcare for refugees and asylum seekers, including those who have No Recourse to Public Funds;

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn:
translation.en: Welsh Government will:

translation.cy: Gweithio gydag ADEW er mwyn sicrhau bod rhannu ‘Arferion Da’ wedi’i gynnwys fel eitem ar yr agenda yn nhrafodaethau’r Fforwm Cyflawni Awdurdodau Lleol ar Leiafrifoedd Ethnig o 2018 ymlaen.
translation.en: Work with ADEW to ensure ‘Good Practice’ sharing is included as a standing agenda item of discussion from 2018 at the Minority Ethnic Achievement Local Authority Forum.

translation.cy: Gweithio gyda Choleg Caerdydd a’r Fro ac Addysg Oedolion Cymru er mwyn datblygu Canolfan Ganolog Asesu ESOL Rhanbarthol (ESOL) er mwyn darparu proses brysbennu integredig ar gyfer dysgwyr sydd angen dosbarthiadau ESOL;
translation.en: Work with Cardiff and the Vale College and Adult Learning Wales to develop the Regional ESOL Assessment Central Hub (REACH) to provide an integrated triage process for learners in need of ESOL classes;

translation.cy: Mae Addysg Oedolion Cymru yn cydweithio â Choleg Caerdydd a'r Fro a nifer o ddarparwyr ESOL llai a grwpiau elusennol fel Cyngor Ffoaduriaid Cymru ac All Communities Engaged yn Nhrebiwt, er mwyn datblygu darpariaeth ESOL hyblyg (‘roll on, roll off’) fel rhan o brosiect REACH i leihau’n sylweddol y galw am lefydd ar gyrsiau ESOL ar hyn o bryd;
translation.en: Adult Learning Wales, are working collaboratively with Cardiff and Vale College, and a number of smaller ESOL providers and charitable groups such as the Welsh Refugee Council and All Communities Engaged in Butetown, to develop flexible ESOL (‘roll on, roll off’) provision as part of the REACH project to significantly reduce the current demand for places on ESOL courses.

translation.cy: Meithrin dealltwriaeth well ar draws rhwydwaith darparwyr dysgu yn y gweithle o’r rhwystrau sy’n wynebu ffoaduriaid trwy gyfarfodydd Grŵp Amrywiaeth a Chydraddoldeb Hyrwyddwr Cydraddoldeb NTFW a chreu cyfleoedd i weithio mewn partneriaeth;
translation.en: Develop greater understanding across the Work Based Learning provider network of the barriers that face refugees through the NTFW Equality Champion’s  Equality and Diversity Group meetings and create opportunities for partnership working;

translation.cy: Gwasanaethau Cymdeithasol a Llesiant (Cymru) 2014 a’r gwasanaeth Eiriolwyr Masnachu Plant Annibynnol;
translation.en: 2014 and the Independent Child Trafficking Advocacy service;

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod y Gweithdrefnau Diogelu Cenedlaethol diweddaraf yn ymwybodol o ac yn sensitif i wahaniaethau diwylliannol ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches wrth ymdrin â materion amddiffyn plant.
translation.en: Ensure that the updated National Protection Procedures are aware of and sensitive to the cultural differences of refugees and asylum seekers when dealing with child protection issues.

translation.cy: Monitro tensiynau cymunedol wrth gynnig ardaloedd gwasgaru newydd
translation.en: - 	Monitor community tension as new dispersal areas are proposed.

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn:
translation.en: Welsh Government will:

translation.cy: Bydd gwybodaeth am hawliau yn cael ei rhannu i ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches drwy 7 sefydliad partner y Rhaglen Hawliau Lloches rhwng 2017 a 2020;
translation.en: Knowledge of rights will be communicated to refugees and asylum seekers via the 7 partner organisations of the Asylum Rights Programme between 2017 and 2020;

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod gwybodaeth sy’n cael ei darparu i ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches yn esbonio’r hawliau i gwyno, ac yn rhoi sicrwydd i unigolion na fydd cwynion yn effeithio’n negyddol ar hawliau lloches neu statws ymfudo;
translation.en: Ensure information provided to refugees and asylum seekers explains rights to make complaints and reassures individuals that complaints will not impact negatively on asylum claims or immigration status;

translation.cy: - 	Ceisio nodi bylchau mewn cyngor a chymorth eiriolaeth (gan gynnwys cyngor cyfreithiol) ledled Cymru a gweithio gyda phartneriaid i geisio canfod atebion i’r bylchau hyn.
translation.en: Seek to identify gaps in advice and advocacy support (including legal advice) across Wales and work with partners to identify solutions to these gaps.

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn:
translation.en: Welsh Government will:

translation.cy: Gweithio gyda Chyngor Gweithredu Gwirfoddol Cymru, Cynghorau Gwirfoddol Sirol a phartneriaid eraill er mwyn nodi a hyrwyddo cyfleoedd i ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches gael cyfleoedd i wirfoddoli er mwyn goresgyn unigrwydd, cefnogi integreiddio mwy effeithiol a chaffael iaith anffurfiol;
translation.en: Work with the Wales Council for Voluntary Action, County Voluntary Councils and other partners to identify and promote opportunities for refugees and asylum seekers to access volunteering opportunities to combat isolation, support more effective integration and informal language acquisition;

translation.cy: Hybu dealltwriaeth o dreftadaeth a diwylliant Cymru i ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches
translation.en: Promote understanding of Welsh culture and heritage to refugees and asylum seekers

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod cleientiaid ‘Portffolio’r Celfyddydau’ Cyngor Celfyddydau Cymru yn cynnwys cyfeiriad at ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches yn eu cynlluniau cydraddoldeb ac yna monitro effaith hyn.
translation.en: Ensure that Arts Council Wales ‘Arts Portfolio Wales’ clients Include specific reference to refugees and asylum seekers in their equalities plans and then monitor the impact of this.

translation.cy: Ymroi i ddarparu mynediad cyfartal i’r rhyngrwyd i ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches yng Nghymru
translation.en: Endeavour to provide equal access to the internet for refugees and asylum seekers in Wales.

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches yn ymwybodol o’r ffaith fod gwasanaethau’r rhyngrwyd ar gael mewn adeiladau cyhoeddus, fel llyfrgelloedd;
translation.en: Ensure refugees and asylum seekers are made aware of the availability of internet services in public buildings, such as libraries;

translation.cy: Gall poen parhaus effeithio ar unrhyw un o unrhyw oedran, ar unrhyw adeg, ac mae'n broblem iechyd arwyddocaol ar gyfer cyfran sylweddol o'r boblogaeth.
translation.en: Persistent pain can affect anyone of any age, at any time and is a significant health problem for a substantial proportion of the population.

translation.cy: Amcangyfrifir bod rhwng 11% a 20% o oedolion yn cael eu heffeithio, gyda symptomau sy'n amrywio o anghysur ysgafn i boen gwanychol.
translation.en: It is estimated that between 11% and 20% of adults are affected, with symptoms ranging from mild discomfort to debilitating pain.

translation.cy: Chronic Pain Service Provision in Wales:Five years after the launch of Design for Pain(2014) http://www.welshpainsociety.org.uk/documents/cpspiw.pdf(cyrchwyd ar 22 Ionawr 2018)
translation.en: Chronic Pain Service Provision in Wales: Five years after the launch of Design for Pain. 2014 http://www.welshpainsociety.org.uk/documents/cpspiw.pdf(accessed on 22 January 2018)

translation.cy: Gall byw gyda phoen parhaus gael effaith negyddol ar ansawdd bywyd unigolyn a'i allu i weithredu, nid yn unig yn gorfforol ond yn seicolegol, yn gymdeithasol, ac yn economaidd hefyd.
translation.en: Living with persistent pain can negatively impact on a person’s quality of life and ability to function, not only physically, but also psychologically, socially and economically.

translation.cy: Dylent alluogi gwasanaethau sydd eisoes yn bodoli i sicrhau ansawdd eu gwasanaeth a datblygu opsiynau rheoli priodol yn ôl yr angen.
translation.en: It should enable existing services to quality assure their service and develop appropriate management options as needed.

translation.cy: Mae'r canllawiau hyn yn cynnig arweiniad cyffredinol i helpu unigolion i ystyried y dewis o ran dulliau effeithiol a'u galluogi i wneud penderfyniadau gwybodus o ran eu gofal a'u cymorth.
translation.en: This guidance provides general signposting for individuals to help consider the choice of effective approaches and enable them to make informed decisions about their care and support.

translation.cy: Maent hefyd yn cynnig ffocws ar gyfer byrddau iechyd Cymru ac awdurdodau eraill i wella amrywiaeth ac ansawdd y gwasanaethau ar gyfer pobl sy'n byw gyda phoen parhaus, ac yn cyfeirio at wybodaeth a pholisïau a chyfeiriad cyfredol iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: It also provides a focus for Welsh health boards and other authorities to improve the range and quality of services for people living with persistent pain, and signposting to information and the current policies and direction of health and social care in Wales.

translation.cy: Craidd y strategaeth hon yw cydnabod bod gwasanaethau cyhoeddus a phartneriaid y trydydd sector am weithio ar y cyd tuag at gyflawni nodau cyffredin, gan ganolbwyntio ar anghenion y bobl, ym mhob cam o'u bywydau ac ym mhob rhan o Gymru.
translation.en: The heart of this strategy is a recognition that public services and third sector partners want to work together towards common objectives, to focus on the needs of people, at all stages of their lives and in all parts of Wales.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn pwysleisio bod angen i wasanaethau fod yn ataliol, yn hawdd cael mynediad atynt, ac o ansawdd uchel.
translation.en: It also emphasises that services need to be preventative, easy to access and of high quality.

translation.cy: Bydd bod yn glir o ran yr hyn sy'n achosi poen pobl a bod yn glir a chyson pan na fydd angen llawdriniaethau neu ymyriadau yn helpu pobl i ddeall eu cyflyrau yn well.
translation.en: Being clear on the cause of people’s pain and being clear and consistent when operations or interventions are not required will help people better understand their conditions.

translation.cy: Mae'n bwysig bod yn effro o ran sut y gallai pobl sydd â phoen parhaus ddehongli negeseuon megis 'mae eich asgwrn cefn yn chwalu'n friwsion' neu 'mae'n llawn arthritis', 'mae gennych nerf wedi'i wasgu', neu 'mae eich disgiau wedi mynd', a cheisio osgoi termau efallai na fyddant o fudd i unigolion ac yn niweidiol i'w syniad ohonynt eu hunain a'u teimlad o reolaeth.
translation.en: It is important to be aware how people  with persistent pain may interpret phrases such as ‘your spine is crumbling’ or ‘it’s full of arthritis’, ‘you’ve got a trapped nerve’, or ‘your discs have gone’, and to avoid terms that individuals might find unhelpful, and damaging to their self-identity and feeling of control.

translation.cy: Gall teimlo fel nad yw pobl yn eich credu effeithio ar gyfranogiad unigolyn mewn bywyd bob dydd.
translation.en: Not feeling believed can have an impact on a person’s participation in everyday life.

translation.cy: Y gynghrair therapiwtig
translation.en: Therapeutic Alliance

translation.cy: Bydd sgyrsiau gwell rhwng cleifion a chlinigwyr, fel partneriaid, gyda chefnogaeth gwybodaeth ddibynadwy a pherthnasol, yn caniatáu penderfyniadau gwell (ar y cyd) ar gyfer y ddwy ochr.
translation.en: Better conversations between patients and clinicians, as partners, supported by reliable and relevant information will enable better (shared) decision making for both.

translation.cy: Wrth ystyried y llwybr gorau i helpu pobl, mae penderfynyddion cychwynnol iechyd (ffactorau sy'n effeithio ar bobl yn gynharach yn eu bywydau neu nad oedd llawer o reolaeth gan unigolyn drostynt) yn gallu rhoi awgrymiadau o ran y posibilrwydd o wella.
translation.en: When considering the best path to help people, the upstream determinants of health (factors which effect people earlier in their lives or that a person had little control over) can give pointers to the potential for improvement.

translation.cy: Mae'n rhaid i'r wybodaeth a'r cyngor a roddir i bobl sy'n byw gyda phoen parhaus sicrhau bod y darllenydd yn gallu deall a defnyddio'r wybodaeth mewn modd effeithiol.
translation.en: The information and advice provided to people living with persistent pain must ensure the reader has the ability to digest and utilise the information effectively.

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd angen i weithwyr iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol ystyried galluedd, cymhwysedd a llythrennedd unigolyn wrth ystyried pam efallai nad yw unigolion yn cydnabod neu'n ymateb i ohebiaeth neu'n rhoi gwybodaeth yn unol â hynny.
translation.en: Health and social care professionals may need to reflect on a person’s competency, capacity and literacy when considering why individuals may not be responding or reacting to correspondence or providing information accordingly.

translation.cy: Dylid ystyried dulliau eraill o gyfathrebu.
translation.en: Alternative methods of communication should be considered.

translation.cy: Diben yr adran hon yw darparu ffynonellau o arweiniad dibynadwy ar gyfer gweithwyr iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol proffesiynol er mwyn iddynt allu datblygu dulliau gwneud penderfyniadau ar y cyd a chynnig dewis i bobl sy'n byw gyda phoen.
translation.en: The aim of this section is to provide health and social care professionals with sources of reliable guidance so they can develop shared decision making tools and provide people living with pain with choice.

translation.cy: Daeth Swyddfa Archwilio Cymru i'r casgliad fod y cynllun ar gyfer cyflyrau parhaus yn glir ar lefel genedlaethol ond fod angen gwelliant ar lefelau lleol.
translation.en: The Wales Audit Office concluded whilst the plan for persistent conditions is clear at a national level, improvement is required at local levels.

translation.cy: Anogir byrddau iechyd i ystyried y dull hwn ymhellach ac i ystyried dulliau cyfannol ar gyfer rheoli poen, sy'n annog hunanreoli effeithiol ochr yn ochr ag opsiynau llawdriniaethol ac opsiynau eraill lle bo hynny'n briodol.
translation.en: Health boards are encouraged to give further consideration to this approach and to consider holistic approaches to pain management which encourages effective self-management alongside surgical and other options where appropriate.

translation.cy: Mae gwasanaethau arbenigol yn cynnig mathau o driniaeth nad ydynt ar gael i feddygon teulu, ond sy'n llywio triniaeth pobl sydd â phoen sy'n derbyn gofal yn y gymuned.
translation.en: Specialist services provide treatment modalities not available to GPs, but inform the treatment of people experiencing pain who are looked after in the community.

translation.cy: Mae'n gofyn am adeiladu perthnasau a chanolbwyntio ar y canlyniadau gorau posibl ar gyfer y defnyddiwr gwasanaeth.
translation.en: It requires building relationships and focusing on the best possible outcomes for the service user.

translation.cy: Creu newid trawsnewidiol drwy rannu pŵer a chyfrifoldeb
translation.en: Create transformative change through share power and shared responsibility

translation.cy: CAM GWEITHREDU
translation.en: ACTION

translation.cy: Dylai byrddau iechyd fabwysiadu egwyddorion cydgynhyrchu er mwyn sicrhau bod pobl yn cael eu cynnwys yn llawn mewn penderfyniadau sy'n effeithio ar eu gofal.
translation.en: Health boards should adopt the principles of co-production to ensure people are fully involved in decisions that affect their care.

translation.cy: yn sicrhau bod gofal bob amser yn cael ei seilio ar dystiolaeth o'r hyn sy'n gweithio a bod y canlyniadau yn cael eu cyhoeddi'n agored ac yn dryloyw;
translation.en: ensure care will always be based on the evidence of what works and the results published openly and transparently;

translation.cy:  Beth ydw i’n gallu ei wneud fy hunan?
translation.en: What can I do myself?

translation.cy: Dylai gweithwyr iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol proffesiynol weithredu egwyddorion gofal iechyd darbodus wrth wneud penderfyniadau am eu rhaglenni rheoli neu driniaeth.
translation.en: Health and social care professionals should apply the principles of Prudent Healthcare when making decisions about their management or treatment programmes.

translation.cy: Pan fydd unigolyn yn cael diagnosis o boen parhaus am y tro cyntaf, mae angen iddo ef neu hi, a'r bobl sy'n berthnasol yn ei fywyd, ddeall pa opsiynau rheoli sydd ar gael a beth yw'r manteision a'r anfanteision mewn perthynas â phob un o'r rhain.
translation.en: When persistent pain is first diagnosed a person, and the people relevant in their lives, need to understand what management options are available and what the pros and cons of each option entail.

translation.cy: Gall cynlluniau hunanreoli gael eu datblygu gan unigolion i gynnwys pecyn cymorth o dechnegau sydd wedi'u teilwra at eu sefyllfa unigryw eu hunain.
translation.en: Self-management plans can be developed by individuals to include a tool kit of techniques which are tailored to their own unique situation.

translation.cy: Gall y rhain gael eu darparu mewn nifer o ffyrdd, o gyrsiau wythnosol i raglenni preswyl, yn ogystal ag ar-lein, ond mae pob un ohonynt yn cynnwys datblygu dulliau allweddol ar gyfer rheoli cyflyrau.
translation.en: These can be delivered in a variety of ways from weekly courses to residential programmes and also online but they all include the development of key condition management approaches.

translation.cy: Mae hunanreoli effeithiol hefyd yn bwysig er mwyn atal problemau eilaidd megis iselder a gorbryder.
translation.en: Effective self-management is also important for preventing secondary problems such as depression and anxiety.

translation.cy: Enghraifft o reolaeth trwy boenladdwyr a arweinir gan fferyllwyr
translation.en: and particular medications e.g. proton pump inhibitors or benzodiazepines.

translation.cy: Roedd bwriad hefyd i leihau’r cyffuriau cwsg a’r gwrthiselyddion wrth i gwsg a hwyliau’r unigolyn wella am ei fod yn symud mwy.
translation.en: Reductions were also made in hypnotic prescribing and anti-depressant as sleep and mood improved with increased activity.

translation.cy: Mae'r adran hon yn cynnig modelau trosfwaol ac enghreifftiau ymarferol i gefnogi'r gwaith o ddatblygu gwasanaethau poen sy'n cyd-fynd ag anghenion y rhai sy'n byw gyda phoen parhaus, gan gefnogi cydnerthedd a bod yn effro i heriau'r dyfodol.
translation.en: This section provides overarching models and practice examples to support the development of pain services which are aligned to the needs of those living with persistent pain, supporting resilience and mindful of future challenges.

translation.cy: Mae presgripsiynu cymdeithasol yn fecanwaith sy'n gweithredu i gysylltu pobl yn systematig â gwasanaethau llesiant a leolir yn y gymuned.
translation.en: Social prescribing is a mechanism that acts to systematically link people to community-based wellbeing services.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cael rhagor o wybodaeth, mae Conffederasiwn GIG Cymru wedi darparu gwybodaeth am bresgripsiynu cymdeithasol, ynghyd â diffiniad ohono ac esboniad o ran sut mae'n cysylltu â GIG Cymru.16
translation.en: For further the Welsh NHS Confederation has provided informationand a definition of social prescribing and its link to the NHS in Wales.16

translation.cy: Cynhaliwyd profion dro ar ôl dro, gadawodd apwyntiadau yn teimlo fel nad oedd y gweithwyr proffesiynol meddygol yn ei gredu, ac ni chafodd ei boen gwanychol ei drin mewn unrhyw ffordd ystyrlon.
translation.en: Tests were repeated and he left appointments feeling medical professionals did not believe him and his debilitating pain was never addressed in any meaningful way.

translation.cy: Cwblhaodd Claf B y rhaglen rheoli poen bio-seicogymdeithasol gwerthfawr ac effeithiol yn ddiweddar.
translation.en: Person B recently completed the worthwhile and effective bio-psychosocial Pain Management Programme.

translation.cy: Roedd y dulliau hyn yn rhoi rhyddhad dros dro, os o gwbl.
translation.en: These methods provided temporary relief if any.

translation.cy: Esboniodd y gweithwyr proffesiynol gofal iechyd y cwrs mewn ffordd glir a phroffesiynol, ac roeddent yn hawdd mynd atynt o'r cychwyn.
translation.en: The health care professionals communicated the course in a clear and professional manner and were approachable from the beginning.

translation.cy: Dysgodd Claf B i osgoi rhagdybiaethau o ran yr hyn mae pobl eraill yn ei gredu neu'n teimlo, ac unrhyw beth a allai ddigwydd yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Person B learnt to avoid assumptions regarding what others are thinking or feeling or assuming what will happen in the future.

translation.cy: Mae'n dweud ei bod hi'n dod yn gymdeithasol unwaith eto'n araf deg ac yn mwynhau gwneud mwy o weithgareddau.
translation.en: She advises she is slowly becoming sociable again and is enjoying doing more activities.

translation.cy: Gwasanaethau Mabwysiadu
translation.en: Adoption Services

translation.cy: Gallwch ymateb i’r ymgynghoriad hwn drwy lenwi a dychwelyd y ffurflen ymateb i ymgynghoriad sydd ar ddiwedd y ddogfen hon erbyn hanner nos ar y dyddiad cau.
translation.en: You can respond to this consultation by completing and returning, by midnight on the closing date, the consultation response form at the back of this document.

translation.cy: Er mwyn dangos bod yr ymgynghoriad wedi’i gynnal yn briodol, mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn bwriadu cyhoeddi crynodeb o'r ymatebion i'r ddogfen hon.
translation.en: In order to show that the consultation was carried out properly, the Welsh Government intends to publish a summary of the responses to this document.

translation.cy: Os caiff eich manylion chi eu cyhoeddi fel rhan o'r ymateb i'r ymgynghoriad, caiff yr adroddiadau hyn eu cadw am gyfnod amhenodol.
translation.en: If your details are published as part of the consultation response then these published reports will be retained indefinitely.

translation.cy: Rhagair
translation.en: Foreword

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, fel y gwelwyd gyda gwasanaethau maethu, rydym yn credu y dylai gwasanaethau mabwysiadu awdurdodau lleol fod yn gymwys i gael yr un lefel o reoleiddio â gwasanaethau mabwysiadu rheoleiddiedig (gan gynnwys cymdeithasau mabwysiadu ac asiantaethau cymorth mabwysiadu), er mwyn sicrhau cysondeb rhwng pob math o ddarparwr gwasanaethau mabwysiadu.
translation.en: However, as with fostering services, we consider that the same level of regulation should apply to local authority adoption services as to regulated adoption services (including adoption societies and adoption support agencies), to ensure consistency between all types of adoption service provider.

translation.cy: Yn ystod y pedair blynedd diwethaf rydym wedi gweld fframwaith cyfreithiol newydd yn cael ei greu ar gyfer gwasanaethau cymdeithasol yng Nghymru wrth i ddau ddarn pwysig o ddeddfwriaeth gael eu pasio.
translation.en: The past four years have seen the creation of a new legal framework for social services in Wales, with the passing of two landmark pieces of legislation.

translation.cy: Cam 1 (2016/17) – roedd Cam 1 yn cynnwys rheoliadau sy'n ymwneud â'r system newydd o reoleiddio'r gweithlu sy'n ofynnol gan y Ddeddf.
translation.en: Phase 1 (2016/17) included regulations relating to the new system of workforce regulation required by the Act.

translation.cy: Roedd y cam hwn hefyd yn cynnwys rheoliadau a chanllawiau statudol mewn perthynas â’r gofynion a’r safonau a ddisgwylir gan ddarparwyr gwasanaethau ac unigolion cyfrifol cartrefi gofal (gan gynnwys cartrefi plant), llety diogel ar gyfer plant, canolfannau preswyl i deuluoedd a gwasanaethau cymorth cartref.
translation.en: This phase also included regulations and statutory guidance relating to the requirements and standards expected of service providers and responsible individuals of care homes (including children’s homes), secure accommodation for children, residential family centres and domiciliary support services.

translation.cy: Mae’r ymgynghoriad hwn yn rhan o weithredu Cam 3.
translation.en: This consultation forms part of Phase 3 of implementation.

translation.cy: yn gosod gofynion newydd ar ddarparwyr gwasanaethau mabwysiadu rheoleiddiedig ac unigolion cyfrifol mewn perthynas â'r gwasanaethau hynny, o dan adrannau 27 a 28 o Ddeddf 2016
translation.en:  place new requirements on regulated adoption service providers and responsible individuals in relation to those services under sections 27 and 28 of the 2016 Act

translation.cy: Arolygiaeth Gofal Cymru (hyd at Ionawr 2018) oedd Arolygiaeth Gofal a Gwasanaethau Cymdeithasol Cymru.
translation.en: Care Inspectorate Wales was (until January 2018) the Care and Social Services Inspectorate Wales.

translation.cy: Y fframwaith rheoleiddio newydd o dan Ddeddf 2016
translation.en: The new regulatory framework under the 2016 Act

translation.cy: cymdeithas fabwysiadu o fewn ystyr “adoption society” yn Neddf Mabwysiadu a Phlant 2002 (p.38) sy’n sefydliad gwirfoddol o fewn ystyr y Ddeddf honno, neu
translation.en: an adoption society within the meaning of the Adoption and Children Act 2002 (c.38) which is a voluntary organisation within the meaning of that Act, or

translation.cy: asiantaeth cymorth mabwysiadu o fewn yr ystyr a roddir i “adoption support agency” gan adran 8 o’r Ddeddf honno".
translation.en: an adoption support agency within the meaning given by section 8 of that Act”.

translation.cy: Er nad oes darpariaeth ar gyfer rheoleiddio gwasanaethau mabwysiadu awdurdodau lleol yn Neddf 2016 (maent yn parhau o dan Ddeddf Mabwysiadu a Phlant 2002), un o’n hamcanion polisi yw cymhwyso'r un set o safonau (monitro a rheolaeth) ar draws gwasanaethau mabwysiadu llywodraeth leol a gwasanaethau mabwysiadu rheoleiddiedig yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Even though regulation of local authority adoption services is not provided for within the 2016 Act (they remain under the Adoption and Children Act 2002), it our policy objective to apply the same set of standards (monitoring and control) across local authority and regulated adoption services in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae cod ymarfer drafft, ynghyd â chanllawiau statudol ar gyfer gwasanaethau mabwysiadu o dan Ddeddf 2016, wedi'u cynnwys at ddibenion ymgynghori yma.
translation.en: A draft code of practice, combined with statutory guidance for regulated adoption services under the 2016, is included for consultation here.

translation.cy: I gael crynodeb cynhwysfawr o'r hyn y mae'r Rheoliadau drafft yn eu gwneud, darllenwch y nodyn esboniadol ar dudalennau 1 i 5.
translation.en: For a comprehensive summary of what these draft Regulations do please read their explanatory note on pages 1 to 5.

translation.en: Replace, under the 2016 Act, the Adoption Support Agencies (Wales) Regulations 2005.
